data.source_sentence: 조명에 사용되는 일반적인 백색 발광 다이오드는 청색 발광 다이오드 위에 황색 형광체를 입힌 구조가 보편적이나 발광 스펙트럼상 짙은 적색 성분이 부족해서 조명의 연색성이 떨어지는 문제가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A general white light emitting diode used for lighting generally has a structure in which a yellow phosphor is coated on a blue light emitting diode, but there is a problem in that the color rendering property of lighting is deteriorated due to the lack of a deep red component in the emission spectrum.
data.target_sentence: A general white light emitting diode used for lighting generally has a structure in which a yellow phosphor is coated on a blue light emitting diode, but there is a problem in that the color rendering property of lighting is deteriorated due to the lack of a deep red component in the emission spectrum.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 백색 발광 다이오드의 연색 특성을 개선하기 위해 적색 양자점 조명을 백색 조명의 확산판에 적용한 후 광학 시뮬레이션을 이용해 광구조를 최적화하고자 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, in order to improve the color rendering characteristics of white light emitting diodes, red quantum dot illumination was applied to the diffuser plate of white illumination and then the optical structure was optimized using optical simulation.
data.target_sentence: In this study, in order to improve the color rendering characteristics of white light-emitting diodes, red quantum dot illumination was applied to the diffuser plate of white illumination, and then the optical structure was optimized using optical simulation.

data.source_sentence: 대부분의 조건에서 연색지수는 90을 넘었고 이는 적색 양자점 필름의 적용이 일반적인 백색 발광 다이오드의 연색 특성을 개선하는 데 효과적인 방법임을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: The color rendering index exceeded 90 under most conditions, indicating that the application of a red quantum dot film is an effective method for improving the color rendering characteristics of a general white light emitting diode.
data.target_sentence: The color rendering index exceeded 90 under most conditions, indicating that the application of a red quantum dot film is an effective method for improving the color rendering characteristics of a general white light-emitting diode.

data.source_sentence: 일반 조명용 광원으로도 LED는 긴 수 명, 저전력, 다양한 자유도 등 많은 장점을 가지고 있어 빠른 속도로 기존의 조명을 대체해 가고 있다.

data.target_sentence: As a light source for general lighting, LED has many advantages, such as a long lifespan, low power, and various degrees of freedom, rapidly replacing conventional lighting.

data.source_sentence: 백색 LED는 일반적으로 InGaN 계열 청색 LED 위에 파장변환 물질을 올려 백색을 구현한다.

data.source_sentence: YAG는 심홍색(deep red) 대역의 성분이 부족해 순도가 높은 적색을 포함한 물체의 색을 제대로 표현하기 힘들고 디스플레이의 색 재현성(color gamut) 측면에서도 문제가 있다.

data.source_sentence: 다른 방법 중 하나는 기존의 백색 LED에 적색 양자점(quantum dot)을 추가해 부족한 적색 스펙트럼 영역의 세기를 보완하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Another method is to supplement the insufficient intensity of the red spectrum region by adding red quantum dots to the existing white LED.
data.target_sentence: Another method is to supplement the insufficient intensity of the red spectrum region by adding red quantum dots to the existing white LED.

data.source_sentence: 양자점은 그 자체로 혹은 기존 형광체와 의 조합으로 조명의 특성을 개선하기 위해 활용되어 왔다[9-20].

data.target_sentence: Quantum dots have been utilized to improve the characteristics of lighting either in themselves or in combination with existing phosphors [9-20].

data.source_sentence: 양자점은 크기가 수 나노미터 정도인 반도체 입자로서 양자국한 효과(quantum confinement effect)에 의해 발광 파장이 양자점의 크기에 의해 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: Quantum dots are semiconductor particles with a size of several nanometers, and the emission wavelength is determined by the size of the quantum dots due to the quantum confinement effect.
data.target_sentence: Quantum dots are semiconductor particles with a size of several nanometers, and the emission wavelength is determined by the size of the quantum dots due to the quantum confinement effect.

data.source_sentence: 이뿐 아니라 양자점은 크기 조절을 통한 발광 스펙트럼의 조정이 비교적 자유로워 조명용 발광 재료로 활발히 연구되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, quantum dots have been actively studied as light emitting materials for lighting because they are relatively free to adjust the emission spectrum through size control.
data.target_sentence: In addition, quantum dots have been actively studied as light-emitting materials for lighting because they are relatively free to adjust the emission spectrum through size control.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 재료는 필름 형태로 가공되어 백라이트에 들어가는 방식이 일반적이고 조명 분야에서도 양자점 필름의 적용에 대한 연구가 활발해지고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 이미징 기술을 초고속 피노타이핑 시스템에 적용하기 위해, 전체 식물 모습을 위에서 측정할 수 있도록 실험 셋업을 구성하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to apply the hyperspectral imaging technology to the ultrafast pinotyping system, the experimental setup was configured so that the whole plant appearance could be measured from above.
data.target_sentence: In order to apply the hyperspectral imaging technology to the ultrafast phenotyping system, the experimental setup was configured so that the whole plant appearance could be measured from above.

data.source_sentence: 대상 유묘의 100 cm 위의 높이에 장착된 초분광 카메라를 사용하여 총 12개의 전체 식물초분광 데이터를 한 번의 측정으로 동시에 획득하였다.
data.mt_sentence: A total of 12 total plant hyperspectral data were simultaneously obtained in one measurement using a hyperspectral camera mounted at a height of 100 cm above the target seedling.
data.target_sentence: A total of 12 total plant hyperspectral data were simultaneously obtained in one measurement using a hyperspectral camera mounted at the height of 100 cm above the target seedling.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3에 보인 바와 같이, 할로겐 램프를 대상 식물에서 50 cm 위에 장착하여 빛을 조사하였고, 광원 부분에는 별도의 흰색 레퍼런스 패널을 추가하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Figure 3, a halogen lamp was mounted 50 cm above the target plant to irradiate light, and a separate white reference panel was added to the light source.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 3, a halogen lamp was mounted 50 cm above the target plant to irradiate light, and a separate white reference panel was added to the light source.

data.source_sentence: 위의 실험 구성도를 통해 획득한 초분광 영상의 예시를 그림 4에 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: An example of the hyperspectral image obtained through the above experimental configuration diagram is shown in Figure 4.
data.target_sentence: An example of the hyperspectral image obtained through the above experimental configuration diagram is shown in Figure 4.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 이미지 스캐닝 후 흰색 레퍼런스 패널과 대상 샘플들의 원 데이터(raw data)를 통해 잎의 반사율(reflectance)을 아래 식 (1)과 같이 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After scanning the hyperspectral image, the reflectance of the leaf was calculated as shown in Equation (1) below through raw data of the white reference panel and the target samples.
data.target_sentence: After scanning the hyperspectral image, the reflectance of the leaf was calculated as shown in Equation (1) below through raw data of the white reference panel and the target samples.

data.source_sentence: 빛의 영향을 받는 환경 조건을 최소화하기 위해, 유묘에서 얻은 초분광 데이터를 흰색 패널에서 얻은 데이터와 비교하여 정규화함으로써 잎의 분광 특성을 정확히 추출할 수 있도록 보정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to minimize the environmental conditions affected by light, the hyperspectral data obtained from the seedlings were compared with the data obtained from the white panel and normalized so that the spectral characteristics of the leaves could be accurately extracted.
data.target_sentence: In order to minimize the environmental conditions affected by light, the hyperspectral data obtained from the seedlings were compared with the data obtained from the white panel and normalized so that the spectral characteristics of the leaves could be accurately extracted.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 기술을 사용한 비파괴 안토시아닌 측정법의 정확도를 알기 위해, 식물을 분쇄한 뒤 UV-spectrometer로 분석한 결과와 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to find out the accuracy of the non-destructive anthocyanin measurement method using hyperspectral technology, it was compared with the results of analysis with UV-spectrometer after grinding plants.
data.target_sentence: In order to find out the accuracy of the non-destructive anthocyanin measurement method using hyperspectral technology, it was compared with the results of the analysis with a UV-spectrometer after grinding plants.

data.source_sentence: 잎 조직의 안토시아닌 함량은 [10]에 설명된 과정을 통하여 분석되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The anthocyanin content of leaf tissue was analyzed through the procedure described in [10].
data.target_sentence: The anthocyanin content of leaf tissue was analyzed through the procedure described in [10].

data.source_sentence: 파종 후 1주일 된 정식 전의 유묘 하나당 질량은 매우 작아 측정이 어렵기 때문에 8개의 유묘 조직을 모아서 분석 샘플을 만들었다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the mass of each seedling before planting, one week after sowing, is very small and difficult to measure, eight seedling tissues were collected to prepare an analysis sample.
data.target_sentence: Since the mass of each seedling before planting, one week after sowing is very small and difficult to measure, eight seedling tissues were collected to prepare an analysis sample.

data.source_sentence: 안토시아닌의 함량이 다른 네 가지 품종의 분석을 하기 위해, 품종별로 24개 유묘의 반사율의 평균을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to analyze the four varieties with different anthocyanin content, the average of the reflectivity of 24 seedlings for each variety was calculated.
data.target_sentence: In order to analyze the four varieties with different anthocyanin content, the average of the reflectivity of 24 seedlings for each variety was calculated.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 기술을 통한 분석과 파괴적 분석에 의해 추정된 안토시아닌 함량은 청경채의 품종에 따라 달라지는 함량의 차이를 비슷하게 나타냈다.
data.mt_sentence: The anthocyanin content estimated by analysis through hyperspectral technology and destructive analysis showed similar differences in content depending on the variety of bok choy.
data.target_sentence: The anthocyanin content estimated by analysis through hyperspectral technology and destructive analysis showed similar differences in content depending on the variety of bok choy.

data.source_sentence: 이 결과는 비파괴 방식인 초분광 기술을 사용하여 청경채 품종의 유묘 조직에서 발생한 안토시아닌 함량의 차이를 측정할 수 있음을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: This result indicates that the difference in anthocyanin content generated in the seedling tissue of bok choy cultivar can be measured using the hyperspectral technique, which is a non-destructive method.
data.target_sentence: This result indicates that the difference in anthocyanin content generated in the seedling tissue of bok choy cultivar can be measured using the hyperspectral technique, which is a non-destructive method.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 품종 사이에서 나타나는 안토시아닌 함량의 차이는 잎 조직의 색소 발현과 관련이 있는 것으로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference in anthocyanin content among various cultivars seems to be related to the pigment expression of leaf tissue.
data.target_sentence: The difference in anthocyanin content among various cultivars seems to be related to the pigment expression of leaf tissue.

data.source_sentence: “레드 쵸이” 품종은 중간 수준의 안토시아닌 함량을 보였으며, 유묘의 잎에서 부분적으로 보라색과 붉은색이 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: The “Red Choy” variety showed a moderate level of anthocyanin content, and partial purple and red color in the leaves of the seedlings.
data.target_sentence: The “Red Choy” variety showed a moderate level of anthocyanin content and partial purple and red color in the leaves of the seedlings.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 기술 분석과 파괴적 분석 데이터 간의 이러한 비슷한 결과는 초분광 기술을 고처리량 식물 피노타이핑 시스템에 적용할 수 있음을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: These similar results between hyperspectral technique analysis and destructive analysis data indicate that hyperspectral technique can be applied to high-throughput plant pinotyping systems.
data.target_sentence: These similar results between hyperspectral technique analysis and destructive analysis data indicate that the hyperspectral technique can be applied to high-throughput plant phenotyping systems.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상 기술을 통한 비파괴 분석 후, 정확도를 입증하기 위해 기존의 측정 방법인 유묘 분쇄 후 UV-spectrometer로 측정하는 파괴적 측정 결과와 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After non-destructive analysis through hyperspectral imaging technology, the results were compared with destructive measurement results measured with a UV-spectrometer after seedling crushing, a conventional measurement method, to verify accuracy.
data.target_sentence: After non-destructive analysis through hyperspectral imaging technology, the results were compared with destructive measurement results measured with a UV-spectrometer after seedling crushing, a conventional measurement method, to verify accuracy.

data.source_sentence: 그 결과, 네 가지 청경채 품종 모두에서 초분광 분석과 파괴적 측정을 통한 안토시아닌 함량이 매우 유사한 수준으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result, the anthocyanin content through hyperspectral analysis and destructive measurement was found to be very similar in all four bok choy varieties.
data.target_sentence: As a result, the anthocyanin content through hyperspectral analysis and destructive measurement was found to be very similar in all four bok choy varieties.

data.source_sentence: 초분광 영상 기술을 통해 총 96개의 유묘를 24분이라는 짧은 시간 동안 측정하여 분석할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through hyperspectral imaging technology, a total of 96 seedlings can be measured and analyzed in a short time of 24 minutes.
data.target_sentence: Through hyperspectral imaging technology, a total of 96 seedlings can be measured and analyzed in a short time of 24 minutes.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 광도가 약한 광원과 저성능 초분광 카메라 등의 제한된 조건에서 실험이 진행되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, the experiment was conducted under limited conditions such as a light source with weak luminous intensity and a low-performance hyperspectral camera.
data.target_sentence: In this study, the experiment was conducted under limited conditions, such as a light source with weak luminous intensity and a low-performance hyperspectral camera.

data.source_sentence: 눈부심 방지를 위한 확산판의 투과율과 연색지수 향상을 위한 양자점 필름의 농도가 고출력 직하형 백색 LED 조명의 광특성에 미치는 영향을 조사했다.
data.mt_sentence: We investigated the effect of the transmittance of diffusion plates to prevent glare and the concentration of quantum dot films to improve the color index on the light characteristics of high-power direct-under-the-ground white LED lights.
data.target_sentence: We investigated the effect of the transmittance of diffusion plates to prevent glare and the concentration of quantum dot films to improve the color index on the light characteristics of high-power direct-under-the-ground white LED lights.

data.source_sentence: 확산판의 투과율이 감소할 경우 조명의 휘도는 줄어들었고 색좌표, 상관색 온도는 별다른 변화를 보이지 않았으며 연색지수는 약간 상승했다.
data.mt_sentence: When the transmittance of the diffuser plate decreased, the luminance of the lighting decreased, the color coordinates and the correlated color temperature did not show any significant change, and the color rendering index slightly increased.
data.target_sentence: When the transmittance of the diffuser plate decreased, the luminance of the lighting decreased, the color coordinates and the correlated color temperature did not show any significant change, and the color rendering index slightly increased.

data.source_sentence: 시야각에 따른 광특성의 편차는 거의 없었고 휘도 분포는 람버시안 분포에 가까웠다.
data.mt_sentence: There was little variation in the optical characteristics according to the viewing angle, and the luminance distribution was close to the Lambertian distribution.
data.target_sentence: There was little variation in the optical characteristics according to the viewing angle, and the luminance distribution was close to the Lambertian distribution.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 농도가 증가할 경우 스펙트럼 상 적색 성분이 늘어나면서 이 성분의 비중을 표현하는 색좌표 x가 증가했고 상관색 온도는 약 6000 K에서 4000 K 부근으로 현저히 감소했다.
data.mt_sentence: When the concentration of the quantum dot film was increased, the red component in the spectrum increased, the color coordinate x expressing the specific gravity of this component increased, and the correlated color temperature significantly decreased from about 6000 K to around 4000 K.
data.target_sentence: When the quantum dot film concentration was increased, the red component in the spectrum increased, the color coordinate x expressing the specific gravity of this component increased, and the correlated color temperature significantly decreased from about 6000 K to around 4000 K.

data.source_sentence: 아울러 조명의 구조를 최적화하면 연색지수가 95까지 증가함을 확인했다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, it was confirmed that the color rendering index increased to 95 when the lighting structure was optimized.
data.target_sentence: In addition, it was confirmed that the color rendering index increased to 95 when the lighting structure was optimized.

data.source_sentence: 최근 일반 조명 시장에서 영역을 급속히 확대하고 있는 백색 발광다이오드(light emitting diode, LED)는 높은 광효율, 다양한 디자인 요소, 환경 친화적인 속성으로 인해 인기를 끌고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, white light emitting diodes (LEDs), which are rapidly expanding their scope in the general lighting market, are gaining popularity due to their high luminous efficiency, various design elements, and environmentally friendly properties.
data.target_sentence: Recently, white light emitting diodes (LEDs), which are rapidly expanding their scope in the general lighting market, are gaining popularity due to their high luminous efficiency, various design elements, and environmentally friendly properties.

data.source_sentence: 백색 LED는 보통 청색 LED 칩 위에 황색 형광체를 코팅해 백색광 스펙트럼을 구현한다.
data.mt_sentence: A white LED usually implements a white light spectrum by coating a yellow phosphor on a blue LED chip.
data.target_sentence: A white LED usually implements a white light spectrum by coating a yellow phosphor on a blue LED chip.

data.source_sentence: LED는 사용 목적에 따라 디스플레이용 LED, 일반 가정용 LED, 그리고 공장을 포함한 대형 건물용 고출력 LED 등 다양한 종류로 나뉜다.
data.mt_sentence: LEDs are divided into various types depending on the purpose of use, such as LED for display, LED for general households, and LED for high power for large buildings including factories.
data.target_sentence: LEDs are divided into various types depending on the purpose of use, such as LEDs for display, LEDs for general households, and LEDs for high power for large buildings, including factories.

data.source_sentence: 특히 디스플레이용 LED의 경우 최근 청색 LED에 반치폭이 작은 녹색 및 적색 양자점(quantum dot) 필름을 적용해 색재현성(color gamut)을 넓히는 방식으로 활용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, LED for display has recently been used as a way to expand color gamut by applying green and red quantum dot films with small half width to blue LEDs.
data.target_sentence: In particular, LED for display has recently been used as a way to expand color gamut by applying green and red quantum dot films with small half width to blue LEDs.

data.source_sentence: 연색지수란 조명이 비추는 물체의 색이 자연스럽게 연출되는 정도를 정량화한 수치다.
data.mt_sentence: The color rendering index is a numerical value that quantifies the degree to which the color of an object illuminated by light is rendered naturally.
data.target_sentence: The color rendering index is a numerical value that quantifies the degree to which the color of an object illuminated by light is rendered naturally.

data.source_sentence: 디스플레이용 백라이트의 경우에는 양자점 필름 형태로 가공, 청색 LED에서 이격해 사용한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of backlight for display, it is processed in the form of a quantum dot film and used separately from the blue LED.
data.target_sentence: In the case of backlight for display, it is processed in the form of a quantum dot film and used separately from the blue LED.

data.source_sentence: 조명의 경우 형광체와 양자점을 섞어 함께 코팅하는 경우도 있지만 양자점 필름이나 캡의 형태로 가공, LED 칩으로부터 이격해서 적용하기도 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of lighting, phosphors and quantum dots are mixed and coated together, but in some cases, they are processed in the form of a quantum dot film or cap, and applied at a distance from the LED chip.
data.target_sentence: In the case of lighting, phosphors and quantum dots are mixed and coated together, but in some cases, they are processed in the form of a quantum dot film or cap and applied at a distance from the LED chip.

data.source_sentence: 후자의 경우에는 열에 의한 양자점의 열화 속도가 느려 장기신뢰성을 확보할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the latter case, the degradation rate of the quantum dots due to heat is slow, so that long-term reliability can be secured.
data.target_sentence: In the latter case, the degradation rate of the quantum dots due to heat is slow so long-term reliability can be secured.

data.source_sentence: 양자점의 적절한 적용은 백색 LED 조명의 광특성 및 성능 개선을 이끌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Appropriate application of quantum dots can lead to improved optical properties and performance of white LED lighting.
data.target_sentence: Appropriate application of quantum dots can lead to improved optical properties and performance of white LED lighting.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 양자점 필름이 적용된 상용화된 고출력 백색 LED 조명의 투광부의 투과율 변화에 따른 광특성의 조사 결과를 발표한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we present the results of investigation of the optical characteristics according to the change in transmittance of the light transmitting part of a commercial high-power white LED lighting to which a quantum dot film is applied.
data.target_sentence: In this study, we present the results of the investigation of the optical properties according to the change in transmittance of the light transmitting part of a commercial high-power white LED lighting to which a quantum dot film is applied.

data.source_sentence: 고출력 조명의 경우 인간 눈에 불편함을 줄 수 있는 글래어(glare) 현상을 방지하고 적절한 밝기를 유지하기 위해 확산판을 사용하는 경우가 많다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of high-power lighting, diffusion plates are often used to prevent glare phenomena that can cause inconvenience to human eyes and maintain proper brightness.
data.target_sentence: In the case of high-power lighting, diffusion plates are often used to prevent glare phenomena that can cause inconvenience to human eyes and maintain proper brightness.

data.source_sentence: 확산판의 재질, 두께, 투과율 등의 여러 광학적 조건에 의해 광 효율이나 조명의 색감 등의 광학적 특성들이 변할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Optical characteristics such as light efficiency and color sense of lighting may change due to various optical conditions such as material, thickness, transmittance, etc. of the diffusion plate.
data.target_sentence: Optical characteristics such as luminous efficiency and color sense of lighting may change due to various optical conditions such as material, thickness, transmittance, etc. of the diffusion plate.

data.source_sentence: 휘도, 연색지수 및 색좌표의 변화와 투과도의 상관성에 대해 집중적으로 분석하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The correlation between changes in luminance, color rendering index, and color coordinates and transmittance was intensively analyzed.
data.target_sentence: The correlation between changes in luminance, color rendering index, and color coordinates and transmittance was intensively analyzed.

data.source_sentence: 아울러 본 실험 결과와 이전에 진행된 시뮬레이션 결과의 비교 분석을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, a comparative analysis is performed between the results of this experiment and the simulation results performed previously.
data.target_sentence: In addition, a comparative analysis is performed between the results of this experiment and the simulation results performed previously.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 재질인 트리아진 에폭시 레진(triazine epoxy resin)에 대한 양자점-실리카 혼합물의 비는 2.5, 5.0, 7.5 wt%였다.
data.mt_sentence: The ratio of the quantum dot-silica mixture to the triazine epoxy resin, which is the material of the quantum dot film, was 2.5, 5.0, and 7.5 wt%.
data.target_sentence: The ratio of the quantum dot-silica mixture to the triazine epoxy resin, which is the material of the quantum dot film, was 2.5, 5.0, and 7.5 wt%.

data.source_sentence: 양자점-레진 혼합물은 롤-투-롤(roll-to-roll) 슬롯 다이(slot die) 코팅을 통해 PET (Poly-ethylene Terephthalate) 위에 30 µm의 두께로 코팅되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The quantum dot-resin mixture was coated with a thickness of 30 µm on PET (Poly-ethylene Terephthalate) through roll-to-roll slot die coating.
data.target_sentence: The quantum dot-resin mixture was coated with a thickness of 30 µm on PET (Poly-ethylene Terephthalate) through roll-to-roll slot die coating.

data.source_sentence: 사용된 양자점 필름의 사진은 그림 1(b)에 제시되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: A photograph of the quantum dot film used is presented in Fig. 1(b).
data.target_sentence: A photograph of the quantum dot film used is presented in Fig. 1(b).

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 구체적인 제작 공정에 대해서는 S. C. Hong etal.에 기술되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The specific fabrication process of the quantum dot film is described in SC Hong et al.
data.target_sentence: The specific fabrication process of the quantum dot film is described in SC Hong et al.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서 사용한 확산판은 폴리카보네이트 재질로서 두께는 2.0, 3.0, 4.5 mm다.

data.source_sentence: 표 1은 세 종류의 확산판의 전광선투과율(total transmittance), 탁도(haze), 확산 투과율(dif-fuse transmittance), 평행 투과율(parallel transmittance)을 비교한 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Table 1 compares total transmittance, haze, diff-use transmittance, and parallel transmittance of the three types of diffusion plates.
data.target_sentence: Table 1 compares total transmittance, haze, diff-use transmittance, and parallel transmittance of the three types of diffusion plates.

data.source_sentence: 전광선 투과율은 확산 투과율과 평행 투과율의 합이고 탁도는 확산 투과율을 전광선 투과율로 나눈 수치로 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: Total light transmittance is the sum of diffuse transmittance and parallel transmittance, and turbidity is defined as a value obtained by dividing diffuse transmittance by total light transmittance.
data.target_sentence: Total light transmittance is the sum of diffuse transmittance and parallel transmittance, and turbidity is defined as a value obtained by dividing diffuse transmittance by total light transmittance.

data.source_sentence: 같은 재질에 두께만 다르기 때문에 세 확산판의 탁도는 모두 동일하지만 확산판의 두께가 증가함에 따라 확산판의 투과율이 줄어듦을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Because only the thicknesses of the three diffusion plates are different from the same material, the turbidity of the three diffusion plates is the same, but as the thickness of the diffusion plates increases, the transmittance of the diffusion plates decreases.
data.target_sentence: Because only the thicknesses of the three diffusion plates are different from the same material, the turbidity of the three diffusion plates is the same, but as the thickness of the diffusion plates increases, the transmittance of the diffusion plates decreases.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1(c)에 세 확산판의 사진이 제시되어 있다.

data.target_sentence: A photograph of the three diffusion plates is shown in Figure 1(c).

data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that as the thickness of the diffusion plate increases, the transmittance decreases, and the image of the hole under the diffusion plate is blurred.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that as the thickness of the diffusion plate increases, the transmittance decreases, and the image of the hole under the diffusion plate is blurred.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름은 그림 1(a)와 같이 확산판의 하부 표면에 부착되었다.

data.source_sentence: 이 구조를 선택한 이유는 시야각에 따른 색상 편차가 거의 존재하지 않기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: The reason for choosing this structure is that there is little color variation according to the viewing angle.
data.target_sentence: The reason for choosing this structure is that there is little color variation according to the viewing angle.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(a)는 사용한 양자점에 대해 약 460 nm 파장의 청색광을 여기광으로 사용해 측정한 양자점의 광발광(pho-toluminescence) 스펙트럼이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2(a) shows the pho-toluminescence spectrum of the quantum dots measured using blue light with a wavelength of about 460 nm as excitation light.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2(a) shows the pho-toluminescence spectrum of the quantum dots measured using blue light with a wavelength of about 460 nm as excitation light.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 피크 파장이 약620–630 nm인 적색 피크가 형성됨을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, it can be confirmed that a red peak having a peak wavelength of about 620–630 nm is formed.
data.target_sentence: Through this, it can be confirmed that a red peak having a peak wavelength of about 620–630 nm is formed.

data.target_sentence: Figure 2(b)–2(d) shows the emission spectrum of high-power LED lighting measured for a total of 12 combinations.

data.source_sentence: 0 wt%는 양자점 필름이 적용되지 않은 경우로서 깊은 적색(deep red) 영역의 스펙트럼 성분이 부족하다.
data.mt_sentence: 0 wt% is a case where the quantum dot film is not applied, and the spectral component of the deep red region is insufficient.
data.target_sentence: 0 wt% is a case where the quantum dot film is not applied, and the spectral component of the deep red region is insufficient.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름의 농도가 올라가면서 약 630 nm 파장의 성분이 현저히 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: As the concentration of the quantum dot film increases, the component of about 630 nm wavelength significantly increases.
data.target_sentence: As the concentration of the quantum dot film increases, the component of about 630 nm wavelength significantly increases.

data.source_sentence: 아울러 확산판의 두께가 증가하면 투과도 감소에 의해 스펙트럼의 세기가 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, as the thickness of the diffusion plate increases, the intensity of the spectrum decreases due to a decrease in transmittance.
data.target_sentence: In addition, as the thickness of the diffusion plate increases, the intensity of the spectrum decreases due to a decrease in transmittance.

data.source_sentence: 양자점 필름이 충분히 여기되기 위해서는 여기 광원(청색 및 녹색광)이 양자점 필름을 통과할 횟수가 높아야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order for the quantum dot film to be sufficiently excited, the number of times that the excitation light source (blue and green light) passes through the quantum dot film must be high.
data.target_sentence: In order for the quantum dot film to be sufficiently excited, the number of times that the excitation light source (blue and green light) passes through the quantum dot film must be high.

data.source_sentence: 확산판의 투과율이 낮으면 확산 반사율도 올라가면서 확산판과 하부 반사판 사이에 수직으로 형성되는 광학 공동(optical cavity)의 효과도 커져 양자점 필름에 대한 여기광의 다중 통과 확률이 올라간다.
data.mt_sentence: When the transmittance of the diffuser plate is low, the diffuse reflectance also increases and the effect of an optical cavity formed vertically between the diffuser plate and the lower reflector increases, so that the multiple passage probability of the excitation light through the quantum dot film increases.
data.target_sentence: When the transmittance of the diffusion plate is low, the diffuse reflectance also increases, and the effect of an optical cavity formed vertically between the diffusion plate and the lower reflector increases so that the multiple passage probability of the excitation light through the quantum dot film increases.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2는 투과율이 41–58% 정도인 확산판의 적용을 통해 광학 공동 내 빛의 다중 반사가 강해지면서 양자점 필름이 충분히 여기될 수 있음을 보여준다.

data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows that the quantum dot film can be sufficiently excited as multiple reflections of light in the optical cavity become stronger through the application of a diffusion plate with a transmittance of about 41–58%.

data.source_sentence: 그림 3(a)–3(d)는 총 12가지 조명 구조에 대해 측정된 휘도의 각도 의존성을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 3(a)–3(d) shows the angular dependence of measured luminance for a total of 12 lighting structures.
data.target_sentence: Figure 3(a)–3(d) shows the angular dependence of measured luminance for a total of 12 lighting structures.

data.source_sentence: 조명의 발광 특성은 람버시안(Lambertian) 분포에 가깝다.

data.target_sentence: The light emitting characteristic of the light is close to the Lambertian distribution.

data.source_sentence: 동일한 양자점 필름을 적용한 조명의 경우 확산판 두께가 증가하면 투과도가 감소해 휘도도 떨어지는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of lighting with the same quantum dot film, it was found that as the thickness of the diffusion plate increased, the transmittance decreased and the luminance decreased.

data.source_sentence: 반면에 동일한 확산판 두께에 대해 양자점 필름의 농도가 올라가는 경우 높은 농도의 양자점에 의한 다중 여기, 다중 산란으로 빛의 투과도가 감소하며 휘도도 떨어지는 걸로 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, when the concentration of the quantum dot film increases for the same thickness of the diffusion plate, the light transmittance decreases and the luminance appears to decrease due to multiple excitation and multiple scattering by the high concentration of quantum dots.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, when the concentration of the quantum dot film increases for the same thickness of the diffusion plate, the light transmittance decreases, and the luminance appears to decrease due to multiple excitations and scattering by the high concentration of quantum dots.

data.source_sentence: 이런 결과는 이미 선행 연구를 통해 확인된 바 있지만 본 연구에서는 확산판의 투과도가 상당히 변화해도 연색지수의 개선 효과는 그대로 유지된다는 것을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Although this result has already been confirmed through previous studies, this study shows that even if the transmittance of the diffuser plate is significantly changed, the improvement effect of the color rendering index is maintained.
data.target_sentence: Although this result has already been confirmed through previous studies, this study shows that even if the transmittance of the diffusion plate is significantly changed, the improvement effect of the color rendering index is maintained.

data.source_sentence: 연색지수는 다양한 물체의 색감이 자연스럽게 연출되는 정도를 정량화한 지표로서 태양광이나 백열등의 스펙트럼처럼 다양한 파장 성분이 고르게 분포해 있는 경우 최대가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The color index is an index that quantifies the degree to which various objects' colors are naturally expressed, and is maximized when various wavelength components are evenly distributed, such as spectra such as sunlight and incandescent light.
data.target_sentence: The color rendering index is an index that quantifies the degree to which various objects' colors are naturally expressed and is maximized when various wavelength components are evenly distributed, such as spectra such as sunlight and incandescent light.

data.source_sentence: 결과는 선행연구에서 진행한 시뮬레이션 결과와 정성적으로 비슷하다.

data.target_sentence: Looking at the structure of Figure 1(a), the side of the light is inclined at an angle of about 131°, and a reflective film is attached to it.

data.source_sentence: 이 경사면에 부딪힌 빛의 상당 부분이 양자점 필름에 수직으로 입사하면서 양자점의 추가 여기에 기여해 색좌표 x가 커진 것으로 판단된다.

data.source_sentence: PBM 치료법에 대한 연구는 주로 레이 저, 발광다이오드(LED)를 광원으로 사용하였고, 유기발광다이오드(OLED)가 가지는 장점에도 불구하고 PBM 치료법에 사용된 사례는 제한적이 다.
data.mt_sentence: Research on PBM therapy mainly used lasers and light emitting diodes (LEDs) as light sources, and despite the advantages of organic light emitting diodes (OLEDs), the cases used for PBM therapy are limited.
data.target_sentence: Research on PBM therapy mainly used lasers and light emitting diodes (LEDs) as light sources, and despite the advantages of organic light emitting diodes (OLEDs), the cases used for PBM therapy are limited.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 PBM 현상을 이용하여 모발의 성장을 촉진하고, 콜라겐 합성을 촉진하며, 지방 축적을 감소시키는 효과를 관측한 연구결과도 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, research results have also been reported that observed the effects of using PBM to promote hair growth, promote collagen synthesis, and reduce fat accumulation.
data.target_sentence: Recently, research results have also been reported that observed the effects of using PBM to promote hair growth, promote collagen synthesis, and reduce fat accumulation.

data.source_sentence: 이로 인해 PBM에 의한 치료효과를 이용하는 의료기기뿐만 아니라 PBM에 의한 효과를 이용하는 미용기기도 다수 개발되어 시장에 출시되었다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, not only medical devices that use treatment effects by PBM, but also beauty devices that use effects by PBM have been developed and released in the market.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, not only medical devices that use treatment effects by PBM, but also beauty devices that use effects by PBM have been developed and released in the market.

data.source_sentence: OLED를 이용한 PBM 치료법의 효과를 분석하는 연구로서 기존에는 상처 치유 및 세포 재생 효과에 대한 연구가 주로 이루어졌으나, 최근에는 피부 개선, 피부 진정 등의 미용적 측면의 효과에 대한 연구도 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As a study to analyze the effectiveness of PBM therapy using OLED, studies on wound healing and cell regeneration effects have been mainly conducted in the past, but recently, studies on beauty effects such as skin improvement and skin calming are also being conducted.
data.target_sentence: As a study to analyze the effectiveness of PBM therapy using OLED, studies on wound healing and cell regeneration effects have been mainly conducted in the past, but recently, studies on beauty effects such as skin improvement and skin calming are also being conducted.

data.source_sentence: 기존에 주로 PBM 치료법에 사용한 적색, 근적외선 파장의 광원 외에 자외선, 400–600nm 파장대역의 가시광선 광원을 이용한 PBM 치료법에 대한 연구도 이루어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to light sources of red and near-infrared wavelengths, which have been mainly used for PBM treatment, research on PBM treatment using ultraviolet light and visible light sources in the wavelength band of 400–600 nm is also being conducted.
data.target_sentence: In addition to light sources of red and near infrared wavelengths, which have been mainly used for PBM treatment, research on PBM treatment using ultraviolet light and visible light sources in the wavelength band of 400–600 nm is also being conducted.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구는 보건복지부 지정 공용기관생명윤리위원회 심의를 거쳐 연구윤리승인을 받아 시행되었다(승인번호: P01-202106-31-007).

data.target_sentence: All experiments were conducted under light irradiation conditions in which cytotoxicity did not appear.

data.source_sentence: 향후 OLED 조명 모듈의 저비용 양산공정이 확립되고 신뢰성이 향상된다면 피부미용을 위한 다양한 웨어러블 기기에 활용될 것으로 기대한다.

data.source_sentence: 수직 이방성을 가지는 나노선에서 수평 자기장 펄스에 의한 복수의 키랄성을 가지는 자구벽들의 이동에 관한 체계적인 연구를 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: A systematic study is conducted on the movement of magnetic sphere walls having a plurality of chiral properties by horizontal magnetic field pulses in a nano wire having vertical anisotropy.
data.target_sentence: A systematic study is conducted on the movement of magnetic sphere walls having a plurality of chiral properties by horizontal magnetic field pulses in a nano wire having vertical anisotropy.

data.source_sentence: 자구벽의 이동 방향은 횡축 자기장 펄스의 방향, 자구벽의 방향 및 쟐로쉰스키-모리야 상호작용의 부호에 의존한다.
data.mt_sentence: The direction of movement of the magnetic domain wall depends on the direction of the transverse magnetic field pulse, the direction of the magnetic domain wall, and the sign of the Zhaloshinsky-Moriya interaction.
data.target_sentence: The direction of movement of the magnetic domain wall depends on the direction of the transverse magnetic field pulse, the direction of the magnetic domain wall, and the sign of the ZhaloshinskyMoriya interaction.

data.source_sentence: 레이스트랙 메모리로의 응용 가능성을 판정하기 위하여 연속적인 자기장 펄스에 의하여 복수의 자구벽이 일정하게 이동하는지 여부에 대해서 시뮬레이션을 수행한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to determine the applicability of the racetrack memory, a simulation is performed on whether a plurality of magnetic domain walls are constantly moved by successive magnetic field pulses.
data.target_sentence: In order to determine the applicability of the racetrack memory, a simulation is performed on whether a plurality of magnetic domain walls is constantly moved by successive magnetic field pulses.

data.source_sentence: 차세대 비휘발성 메모리 분야 및 인공지능 논리회로 분야로의 응용 가능성에 대해서 논의한다.
data.mt_sentence: The potential of application to the next-generation non-volatile memory field and artificial intelligence logic circuit field will be discussed.
data.target_sentence: The potential of application to the next-generation non-volatile memory field and artificial intelligence logic circuit field will be discussed.

data.source_sentence: 기술이 발전함에 따라서 자구벽 이동 소자의 기반이 되는 자성체 나노선(magneticnanowire)은 수평 자기 이방성 물질에서 수직 자기 이방성(perpendicular magnetic anisotropy) 물질로 변화하게 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: As technology advances, magnetic nanowires, which are the basis of magnetic domain wall moving devices, have changed from a horizontal magnetic anisotropy material to a perpendicular magnetic anisotropy material.
data.target_sentence: As technology advances, magnetic nanowires, which are the basis of magnetic domain wall moving devices, have changed from a horizontal magnetic anisotropy material to a perpendicular magnetic anisotropy material.

data.source_sentence: 키랄성이란 서로 다른 두 개의 자구와 그 사이에 존재하는 자구벽의 스핀방향이 특정 방향으로 꼬이는 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Chirality means that the spin directions of two different magnetic domains and the magnetic domain wall existing between them are twisted in a specific direction.
data.target_sentence: Chirality means that the spin directions of two different magnetic domains and the magnetic domain wall existing between them are twisted in a specific direction.

data.source_sentence: 이 방향은 시스템이 가지고 있는 DMI의 방향에 따라서 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: This direction is determined by the direction of the DMI that the system has.
data.target_sentence: This direction is determined by the direction of the DMI that the system has.

data.source_sentence: 문제는 키랄성을 가지는 자구벽을 효과적으로 이동시켜서 이를 기반으로 다양한 메모리 소자 또는 논리회로에 응용하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The problem is to effectively move the magnetic domain wall having chirality and apply it to various memory devices or logic circuits based on this.
data.target_sentence: The problem is to effectively move the magnetic domain wall having chirality and apply it to various memory devices or logic circuits based on this.

data.source_sentence: 가장 기본적인 자구벽 이동 방법으로는 외부 자기장을 인가하는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The most basic way to move the magnetic domain wall is to apply an external magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The most basic way to move the magnetic domain wall is to apply an external magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 수직 자기 이방성을 가지는 나노선의 경우 자구의 방향과 동일한 방향으로 자기장을 인가하여 자구벽을 이동시키는 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a nanowire having perpendicular magnetic anisotropy, it is a method of moving the magnetic domain wall by applying a magnetic field in the same direction as that of the magnetic domain.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a nanowire having perpendicular magnetic anisotropy, it is a method of moving the magnetic domain wall by applying a magnetic field in the same direction as that of the magnetic domain.

data.source_sentence: 수직 자기 이방성을 만들기 위하여 기본적으로 강자성체-중금속 이종 접합 구조를 사용하는데 계면에서 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용이 만들어지고, 상기 시스템에 전류를 인가할 때 계면에서 스핀 전류(spincurrent)가 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to create vertical magnetic anisotropy, a ferromagnetic-heavy metal heterogeneous bonding structure is basically used, and a strong spin-orbit interaction is generated at an interface, and a spin current is generated at the interface when a current is applied to the system.
data.target_sentence: In order to create perpendicular magnetic anisotropy, a ferromagnetic-heavy metal heterogeneous bonding structure is basically used, and strong spin-orbit interaction is generated at an interface, and a spin current is generated at the interface when a current is applied to the system.

data.source_sentence: 이 스핀 전류는 키랄성 자구벽을 제어하는데 매우 효과적인 것으로 알려져 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This spin current is known to be very effective in controlling the chiral domain wall.
data.target_sentence: This spin current is known to be very effective in controlling the chiral domain wall.

data.source_sentence: 최근에 횡축 자기장 펄스(transverse magnetic field pulse) 인가 자구벽 이동 및 자화 반전(magnetization reversal) 기술이 발표되어 주목을 받고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, a technique of moving a magnetic domain wall applying a transverse magnetic field pulse and magnetization reversal has been announced and is attracting attention.
data.target_sentence: Recently, a technique of moving a magnetic domain wall applying a transverse magnetic field pulse and magnetization reversal has been announced and is attracting attention.

data.source_sentence: 외부 자기장 외에 열적 요동에 의한 자기장, 자기 변형에 의한 자기장, DMI에 의한 자기장 등이 포함될 수 있으며, 마지막으로 α는 감쇠상수를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition to the external magnetic field, a magnetic field due to thermal fluctuations, a magnetic field due to magnetostriction, a magnetic field due to DMI, etc. may be included. Finally, α means an attenuation constant.
data.target_sentence: In addition to the external magnetic field, a magnetic field due to thermal fluctuations, a magnetic field due to magnetostriction, a magnetic field due to DMI, etc., may be included. Finally, α means an attenuation constant.

data.source_sentence: 횡축 자기장 펄스에 의한 자구벽 이동 현상 또는 자화 반전 현상의 핵심은 LLG 방정식에서 설명하듯이 세차운동 토크(precession torque)와 감쇠 토크(damping torque)의 경쟁이다.
data.mt_sentence: The core of the magnetic domain wall movement phenomenon or the magnetization reversal phenomenon caused by the transverse magnetic field pulse is the competition between the precession torque and the damping torque, as described in the LLG equation.

data.source_sentence: 자성 물질에서 스커미온이 발견될 수 있다는 것은 1970년대에 2차원 하이젠베르크(Heisenberg) 격자 모형에서 예측되었다.

data.source_sentence: 이것은 하이젠베르크 교환 상호작용(Heisenberg exchangeinteraction)은 스핀을 균일하게 배열하는 역할을 해서 자기 스커미온과 같이 비균일한 스핀 배열이 에너지적으로 안정화되지 않기 때문이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is because the Heisenberg exchange interaction serves to uniformly arrange the spins, so that non-uniform spin arrangements such as magnetic skyrmions are not energetically stabilized.

data.source_sentence: 클럭 신호(clock signal)에 맞추어 신호를 동기 처리할 수 있음을 보여, 더 큰 스케일 논리 회로를 구성할 수 있는 가능성을 암시하고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 전술한 스커미온을 이용한 소자들은 폰 노이만 체계(vonNeumann architecture)에서 동작하는 컴퓨팅(computing) 방법이다.
data.mt_sentence: The devices using the aforementioned skirmions are computing methods that operate in a vonNeumann architecture.
data.target_sentence: The devices using the aforementioned skyrmions are computing methods that operate in a vonNeumann architecture.

data.source_sentence: 전통적인 폰 노이만 체계는 정보 저장과 정보 처리 명령이 순차적으로 처리되는 과정에서 병목 현상이 발생하는 태생적인 한계를 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The traditional von Neumann system has an inherent limitation in that a bottleneck occurs in the process of sequentially processing information storage and information processing commands.
data.target_sentence: The traditional von Neumann system has an inherent limitation in that a bottleneck occurs in the process of sequentially processing information storage and information processing commands.

data.source_sentence: 다음은 뉴로모픽 소자를 개발하기 위해 스커미온을 이용한 연구들을 소개하겠다.
data.mt_sentence: Next, we will introduce studies using skirmions to develop neuromorphic devices.

data.source_sentence: 2017년, AAA는 스커미온을 이용해 뉴로모픽 컴퓨팅을 위한 시냅스(synapse) 소자를 미소자기 전사모사를 통해 만들었다.

data.target_sentence: In 2017, AAA created a synapse device for neuromorphic computing through micromagnetic transcription using Skyrmion.

data.mt_sentence: Since the TMR signal is changed when the skirmion is in the TMR part, the skirmion can be used as a neuromodulator that regulates synaptic weight.
data.target_sentence: Since the TMR signal is changed when the skyrmion is in the TMR part, the skyrmion can be used as a neuromodulator that regulates synaptic weight.

data.source_sentence: 2017년, AAA는 나노 도선의 물성에 구배(gradient)를 주어 스커미온의 움직임을 제어하여 뉴런의 누설-축적-발화(leaky-integrate-fire) 기능을 모사하였다.

data.source_sentence: 축적 컴퓨팅은 실시간으로 변하는 데이터를 학습할 때 특징적인 입력 신호를 높은 차원으로 투사하여 신경망의 연결 복잡성을 줄이기 위해 고안된 개념이다.
data.mt_sentence: Accumulated computing is a concept designed to reduce the connectivity complexity of neural networks by projecting characteristic input signals in high dimensions when learning real-time changing data.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 축적의 역할이 중요한데, 축적은 학습을 할 때는 단기기억을 가진 채 고정되고 입출력에 따라 정보가 계속 순환될 수도 있어야 한다.

data.target_sentence: In OPA, where optical antennas are placed aperiodically, only one main lobe is formed, enabling a wide steering range, but signal quality is degraded due to noise caused by the side lobe.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구를 통해 비주기적인 OPA에서 고품질의 신호를 얻기 위한 최적의 안테나 배열을 구하는 데 있어서 PSO, GA, PSA의 최적화 알고리즘이 유용하게 활용될 수 있음을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this study, we demonstrate that optimization algorithms of PSO, GA, and PSA can be usefully utilized in obtaining the optimal antenna arrangement for obtaining high-quality signals in aperiodic OPA.
data.target_sentence: Through this study, we demonstrate that optimization algorithms of PSO, GA, and PSA can be usefully utilized in obtaining the optimal antenna arrangement for obtaining high-quality signals in aperiodic OPA.

data.source_sentence: 라이다는 레이저를 통해 목표까지의 거리, 속도, 방향 등의 특성을 분석하는 기술로 레이저의 강점을 활용하여 정밀한 스캔이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: LIDAR is a technology that analyzes characteristics such as distance, speed, and direction to a target through a laser, and enables precise scanning by utilizing the strength of the laser.
data.target_sentence: LIDAR is a technology that analyzes characteristics such as distance, speed, and direction to a target through a laser, and enables precise scanning by utilizing the strength of the laser.

data.source_sentence: OPA는 위상을 제어할 수 있는 수십–수백 채널의 광 안테나(optical antenna)들을 1차원 또는 2차원으로 배열한 구조로, 각 광 안테나에서 빛의 위상을 조절함으로써 원하는 각도로 빛을 방출할 수 있는 광학 구조이다.
data.mt_sentence: OPA is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional arrangement of optical antennas of tens–hundreds of channels capable of controlling phases, and is an optical structure capable of emitting light at a desired angle by adjusting the phase of light from each optical antenna.
data.target_sentence: OPA is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional arrangement of optical antennas of tens–hundreds of channels capable of controlling phases, and is an optical structure capable of emitting light at a desired angle by adjusting the phase of light from each optical antenna.

data.source_sentence: 그렇지만 2차원 OPA는 구조가 복잡하고 조향 각도의 범위가 제한적이어서 현재는 주로 1차원 OPA에 대한 연구가 활발하게 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: However, the two-dimensional OPA has a complicated structure and the range of the steering angle is limited, so research on the one-dimensional OPA is being actively conducted.
data.target_sentence: However, the two-dimensional OPA has a complicated structure and the range of the steering angle is limited, so research on the one-dimensional OPA is being actively conducted.

data.source_sentence: 비주기적인 OPA에서는 최적의 안테나 배열을 얻기 위해서 최적화 알고리즘이 활용되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In aperiodic OPA, an optimization algorithm has been used to obtain an optimal antenna arrangement.
data.target_sentence: In aperiodic OPA, an optimization algorithm has been used to obtain an optimal antenna arrangement.

data.source_sentence: PSA는 벡터들의 집합인 패턴을 통해 목적 함수를 계산하고 패턴 크기를 조정하거나 더 나은 값을 가지는 위치로 업데이트하면서 최적해를 탐색한다.
data.mt_sentence: The PSA computes the objective function through the pattern, which is a set of vectors, and explores the optimal solution by resizing the pattern or updating it to a position with a better value.
data.target_sentence: The PSA computes the objective function through the pattern, which is a set of vectors and explores the optimal solution by resizing the pattern or updating it to a position with a better value.

data.source_sentence: 각 최적화 알고리즘에 대해서는 3장에서 자세하게 설명할 예정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Each optimization algorithm will be described in detail in Chapter 3.
data.target_sentence: Each optimization algorithm will be described in detail in Chapter 3.

data.source_sentence: 3장에서는 본 연구에서 활용할 최적화 알고리즘인 PSO, GA, PSA에서의 최적화 방법에 대해서 소개한다.
data.mt_sentence: Chapter 3 introduces optimization methods in PSO, GA, and PSA, which are optimization algorithms to be used in this study.
data.target_sentence: Chapter 3 introduces optimization methods in PSO, GA, and PSA, which are optimization algorithms to be used in this study.

data.source_sentence: 4장에서는 각 최적화 알고리즘을 적용하여 비주기적 OPA를 설계하고 원장 계산을 통해 각 알고리즘별로 SLL 값을 비교 분석한다.
data.mt_sentence: In Chapter 4, each optimization algorithm is applied to design a aperiodic OPA, and SLL values are compared and analyzed for each algorithm through ledger calculation.

data.source_sentence: OPA에서 원거리장의 전기장 분포는 기본적으로 다중 슬릿에서 빛의 간섭 현상으로 모델링을 할 수 있다.

data.mt_sentence: In Equation (7), x is the position of the particles, and x′ is the position to be updated.
data.target_sentence: In Equation (7), x is the position of the particles, and x′ is the position to be updated.

data.source_sentence: W는 관성으로 절댓값이 커질수록 새로운 속도 v′이 이전 속도 v와 비슷하다.
data.mt_sentence: W is inertia, and as the absolute value increases, the new velocity v′ is similar to the previous velocity v.
data.target_sentence: W is inertia, and as the absolute value increases, the new velocity v′ is similar to the previous velocity v.

data.source_sentence: W, y1, y2의 값을 적절하게 조절하지 못하면 군집이 불안정해진다.
data.mt_sentence: If the values of W, y1, and y2 are not properly adjusted, the cluster becomes unstable.
data.target_sentence: If the values of W, y1, and y2 are not properly adjusted, the cluster becomes unstable.

data.source_sentence: 움직이는 입자의 개수 조정도 최적화 결과에 영향을 미친다.
data.mt_sentence: Adjustment of the number of moving particles also affects the optimization results.
data.target_sentence: Adjustment of the number of moving particles also affects the optimization results.

data.source_sentence: 128차원 공간에 있는 5,000개의 입자의 위치가 PSO 최적화를 통해 SLL이 최소화된 지점으로 수렴하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The positions of 5,000 particles in 128-dimensional space converge to the point where the SLL is minimized through PSO optimization.
data.target_sentence: The positions of 5,000 particles in 128-dimensional space converge to the point where the SLL is minimized through PSO optimization.

data.source_sentence: GA는 다윈(Darwin)의 적자생존을 기본 개념으로 분석하는 알고리즘으로 진화를 모방한 알고리즘이며, 그림 6에 GA의 알고리즘을 도식적으로 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: GA is an algorithm that analyzes Darwin's survival of the fittest as a basic concept and mimics evolution, and is schematically illustrated in Figure 6.
data.target_sentence: GA is an algorithm that analyzes Darwin's survival of the fittest as a basic concept and mimics evolution, and is schematically illustrated in Figure 6.

data.source_sentence: 교차는 두 부모의 유전자 정보 중 임의의 부분을 바꾸어 다음세대에 배치해 정보를 병합하며, 더 나은 결과를 가질 수도 그렇지 않을 수도 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Crossover changes any part of the genetic information of both parents and places them on the next generation to merge the information, which may or may not have better results.
data.target_sentence: Crossover changes any part of the genetic information of both parents and places them on the next generation to merge the information, which may or may not have better results.

data.source_sentence: 유전 알고리즘 역시 elite와 세대 수 및 인구 수, 선택 방법, 교차 또는 변이 비율을 조정해 최적화 성능을 달리할수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Genetic algorithms can also vary optimization performance by adjusting elite and number of households and populations, selection methods, cross-sections or mutation ratios.
data.target_sentence: Genetic algorithms can also vary optimization performance by adjusting the elite and number of households and populations, selection methods, cross-sections, or mutation ratios.

data.source_sentence: GA는 초기 인구를 생성하고, 인구들이 갖는 목적함수 값을 계산하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: GA creates the initial population and calculates the objective function values of the populations.
data.target_sentence: GA creates the initial population and calculates the objective function values of the populations.

data.source_sentence: 그림 7은 선택, 교차, 변이 과정을 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 7 shows the selection, crossover, and mutation processes.
data.target_sentence: Figure 7 shows the selection, crossover, and mutation processes.

data.source_sentence: 검색공간이 매우 넓기 때문에 해당 과정들이 적절하게 이루어져야 가까운 지역 최적해(local optimal)로 수렴하는 것을 줄일 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the search space is very wide, the convergence to the local optimal solution can be reduced if the corresponding processes are properly performed.
data.target_sentence: Since the search space is very wide, the convergence to the local optimal solution can be reduced if the corresponding processes are properly performed.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 초기에 2,000 set의 OPA를 무작위적으로 생성하였는데, 이는 128개의 유전자를 가진 인구의 수를 2,000으로 두고 GA를 적용한 것을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, 2,000 sets of OPAs were initially generated randomly, meaning that GA was applied with the number of populations with 128 genes at 2,000.
data.target_sentence: In this study, 2,000 sets of OPAs were initially generated randomly, meaning that GA was applied with the number of populations with 128 genes at 2,000.

data.source_sentence: PSA는 패턴 중심을 시작점으로 하고, 벡터들의 집합인 패턴(pattern)을 따라 조사(polling)를 진행한다.
data.mt_sentence: The PSA has a pattern center as a starting point and polls along a pattern, which is a set of vectors.
data.target_sentence: The PSA has a pattern center as a starting point and polls along a pattern, which is a set of vectors.

data.source_sentence: 패턴의 길이는 기본적으로 1이고, 이 패턴의 길이를 메시 크기(mesh size)라고 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The length of the pattern is basically 1, and the length of this pattern is called the mesh size.
data.target_sentence: The length of the pattern is basically 1, and the length of this pattern is called the mesh size.

data.source_sentence: 최적화를 진행하는 변수의 개수가 N개일 때 패턴의 방향 개수에 따라 기본적으로 2N개를 사용하는 방법과 N+1개의 방향을 사용하는 방법이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the number of variables to be optimized is N, there are basically 2N methods and N+1 directions depending on the number of directions of the pattern.
data.target_sentence: When the number of variables to be optimized is N, there are basically 2N methods and N+1 directions depending on the number of directions of the pattern.

data.source_sentence: 이는 시작점, 초기 메시 크기, 메시의 확장 및 감소 비율에 따라 다르게 최적화가 가능하다는 특징이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This is characterized by being optimized differently according to the starting point, the initial mesh size, and the expansion and reduction ratio of the mesh.
data.target_sentence: This is characterized by being optimized differently according to the starting point, the initial mesh size, and the expansion and reduction ratio of the mesh.

data.source_sentence: 패턴 검색 알고리즘은 시작점을 설정할 수 있으므로 다른 최적화 알고리즘과 함께 사용이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the pattern search algorithm can set a starting point, it can be used with other optimization algorithms.
data.target_sentence: Since the pattern search algorithm can set a starting point, it can be used with other optimization algorithms.

data.source_sentence: OPA의 최적화에 PSA를 적용할 때에는 OPA를 구성하는 각 안테나의 위치를 무작위로 생성하여 시작점으로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: When applying the PSA to the optimization of OPA, the position of each antenna constituting the OPA was randomly generated and set as a starting point.
data.target_sentence: When applying the PSA to the optimization of OPA, the position of each antenna constituting the OPA was randomly generated and set as a starting point.

data.source_sentence: 방식으로 알고리즘이 반복되고 최적의 SLL를 갖는 OPA 정보를 찾아나간다.
data.mt_sentence: In this way, the algorithm iterates and finds the OPA information with the optimal SLL.
data.target_sentence: This way, the algorithm iterates and finds the OPA information with the optimal SLL.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 128개의 안테나로 구성된 OPA의 최적화를 수행하므로 N이 128, 즉 2N = 256개의 방향을 가지고 초기 메시 크기가 0.3인 패턴을 사용하여 최적화를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, since the OPA consisting of 128 antennas is optimized, the optimization was performed using a pattern in which N has 128 directions, i.e., 2N = 256 and the initial mesh size is 0.3.
data.target_sentence: In this study, since the OPA consisting of 128 antennas is optimized, the optimization was performed using a pattern in which N has 128 directions, i.e., 2N = 256, and the initial mesh size is 0.3.

data.source_sentence: 3장에서 소개한 최적화 알고리즘들을 비주기적인 OPA에 적용하여 신호 품질이 우수한 최적 안테나 배열을 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The optimization algorithms introduced in Chapter 3 were applied to aperiodic OPA to obtain an optimal antenna array with excellent signal quality.
data.target_sentence: The optimization algorithms introduced in Chapter 3 were applied to aperiodic OPA to obtain an optimal antenna array with excellent signal quality.

data.source_sentence: 모든 조향 각도에서 SLL을 계산하면 시간이 너무 오래 걸리므로, 본 연구에서는 각도별로 최적화 알고리즘을 적용하여 최소 SLL값을 가지는 OPA 배열을 구하고 다른 각도들에서 SLL 값의 변화를 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Since calculating SLL at all steering angles takes too long, this study obtained an OPA array with minimum SLL values by applying an optimization algorithm for each angle and investigated changes in SLL values at other angles.
data.target_sentence: Since calculating SLL at all steering angles takes too long, this study obtained an OPA array with minimum SLL values by applying an optimization algorithm for each angle and investigated changes in SLL values at other angles.

data.source_sentence: ψ는 빔이 ψ의 각도에서 형성될 때 최적화 알고리즘으로 찾은 최적 OPA 배열에 대한 각도를 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: Ψ means the angle for the optimal OPA arrangement found by the optimization algorithm when the beam is formed at the angle of ψ.

data.source_sentence: q는 주어진 OPA 배열에 대해서 식 (5)로 주어진 빔의 조향 각도를 의미한다.

data.target_sentence: Q denotes the steering angle of the beam given by Eq. (5) for a given OPA arrangement.

data.target_sentence: Figure 9 shows the results of calculating the minimum SLL obtained for each of the three optimization algorithms for the optimization angle ψ.

data.source_sentence: PSO와 GA의 경우 조향 각도에 따라 SLL값이 서서히 증가하는 경향을 보이는 반면, PSA는 조향 각도에 거의 관계없이 −13.8 dB 정도의 일정한 SLL값을 보인다는 특징이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of PSO and GA, the SLL value tends to gradually increase according to the steering angle, whereas the PSA has a characteristic that shows a constant SLL value of about -13.8 dB regardless of the steering angle.
data.target_sentence: In the case of PSO and GA, the SLL value tends to gradually increase according to the steering angle, whereas the PSA has a characteristic that shows a constant SLL value of about -13.8 dB regardless of the steering angle.

data.source_sentence: 그림 11(b)에서와 같이 80°에서 최적화한 OPA의 경우에는 q에 관계없이 side lobe의 세기가 낮게 유지되어 모든 각도에 서 우수한 신호 품질을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Fig. 11(b), in the case of OPA optimized at 80°, the strength of the side lobe is kept low regardless of q, so that excellent signal quality can be obtained from all angles.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 11(b), in the case of OPA optimized at 80°, the strength of the side lobe is kept low regardless of q, so that excellent signal quality can be obtained from all angles.

data.source_sentence: 경향이 다른 최적화 알고리즘에서도 해당하는지 확인하기 위하여 GA와 PSA로 최적화한 OPA에 대하여 조향 각도에 따른 SLL을 계산하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to confirm that the tendency is also applicable to other optimization algorithms, SLL according to the steering angle was calculated for OPA optimized with GA and PSA.
data.target_sentence: In order to confirm that the tendency is also applicable to other optimization algorithms, SLL according to the steering angle was calculated for OPA optimized with GA and PSA.

data.source_sentence: 이 경우에도 기본적으로 그림 10의 PSA에서와 마찬가지로 최적화 각도 ψ가 작을 때에는 특정 조향 각도 이상에서 SLL이 급격하게 증가하는 경향을 보인다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case as well, basically, as in the PSA of Fig. 10, when the optimization angle ψ is small, the SLL tends to increase sharply above a certain steering angle.
data.target_sentence: In this case as well, basically, as in the PSA of Fig. 10, when the optimization angle ψ is small, the SLL tends to increase sharply above a certain steering angle.

data.source_sentence: GA의 경우에는 ψ가 45° 이상일 때에는 모든 조향 각도에서 SLL이 낮게 유지가 되고, PSO의 경우에도 ψ가 45° 이상일 때에는 큰 조향 각도에서도 SLL이 급격하게 증가하지는 않는다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of GA, when ψ is 45° or more, the SLL is kept low at all steering angles, and even in the case of PSO, when ψ is 45° or more, the SLL does not increase sharply even at large steering angles.
data.target_sentence: In the case of GA, when ψ is 45° or more, the SLL is kept low at all steering angles, and even in the case of PSO, when ψ is 45° or more, the SLL does not increase sharply even at large steering angles.

data.source_sentence: 그림 13은 각 알고리즘의 최적화 각도별 OPA 배치를 사용해 SLL을 모든 조향 각도에서 평균한 값을 보여준다.

data.source_sentence: 그림 10과 12의 결과에서 예측할 수 있듯이 최적화 각도가 작을수록 특정 조향 각도 이상에서 SLL 값이 급격히 증가하므로 평균 SLL 값이 높아지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: As can be predicted from the results of Figures 10 and 12, the smaller the optimization angle, the higher the average SLL value because the SLL value increases rapidly above a certain steering angle.
data.target_sentence: As can be predicted from the results of Figures 10 and 12, the smaller the optimization angle, the higher the average SLL value because the SLL value increases rapidly above a certain steering angle.

data.mt_sentence: In particular, in the case of PSA, as the optimization angle decreases, the average SLL increases rapidly, and the average beam quality deteriorates.
data.target_sentence: In particular, in the case of PSA, as the optimization angle decreases, the average SLL increases rapidly, and the average beam quality deteriorates.

data.source_sentence: PSO와 GA의 경우에도 최적화 각도가 40° 이하에서는 최적화 각도가 감소할수록 SLL이 증가하는 경향을 보인다.

data.source_sentence: 반면 45° 이상의 각도에서는 3가지 알고리즘 모두 대부분의 조향 각도에서 SLL이 낮게 유지되어 평균 SLL도 −13 dB 이 하의 값을 보이게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: On the other hand, at an angle of 45° or higher, all three algorithms maintain low SLL at most steering angles, resulting in an average SLL of -13 dB or less.
data.target_sentence: On the other hand, at an angle of 45° or higher, all three algorithms maintain low SLL at most steering angles, resulting in an average SLL of -13 dB or less.

data.source_sentence: PSA의 경우 30° 이하의 작은 최적화 각도에서 OPA를 최적화할 경우 평균 SLL이 상당히 크게 증가했지만 45° 이상의 최적화 각도에서는 가장 낮은 평균 SLL값을 보인다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 비주기적 OPA에서 side-lobe이 최소화된 우수한 신호 품질을 얻기 위한 최적화 방법들을 비교 조사하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, optimization methods for obtaining excellent signal quality with minimized side-lobe in aperiodic OPA were compared and investigated.
data.target_sentence: In this study, optimization methods for obtaining excellent signal quality with minimized side-lobe in aperiodic OPA were compared and investigated.

data.source_sentence: 최적화를 수행한 각도(ψ)에서의 SLL은 PSA가 PSO나 GA에 비해 좀 더 낮은 SLL값을 보여 신호 품질이 가장 우수하였다.

data.source_sentence: 제작된 박막의 굴절률과 두께 오차로 인하여, 제작된 회절격자의 회절 효율은 설계보다 낮은 값을 나타내었다.

data.source_sentence: 최근 고출력 레이저를 국방 분야에 응용하기 위한 다양한 개발이 주요 국방 선진국에서 치열하게 전개되고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 특히 최근 이스칸데르 미사일, 초음속 미사일 등이 개발되면서 보다 짧은 시간에 위협을 제거하기 위하여 높은 출력을 가지는 레이저 요격 시스템의 필요성이 더더욱 증가하고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구팀은 무편광에서 간단한 구조로 고효율 유전체 다층박막 회절격자를 설계하는 방법을 제시하고, 그 예시를 발표하였다.

data.target_sentence: When a reflector is manufactured using a multilayer dielectric thin film having a λ/4 optical thickness, the bandwidth of the reflector is given by Equation (1).

data.target_sentence: Accordingly, studies related to evaluating human exposure to EMF of induction heating devices have been steadily progressing abroad.

data.source_sentence: 공간평균기법을 적용하여 산업용 유도가열기기에 대해 직업인 노출량 평가를 수행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: By applying the spatial average technique, occupational exposure evaluation was performed for industrial induction heating devices.
data.target_sentence: By applying the spatial average technique, occupational exposure evaluation was performed for industrial induction heating devices.

data.source_sentence: ICNIRP 등의 국제기구에서 제정한 전자기장 인체보호 기준에서 정의하고 있는 노출 기준은 크게 기본한계(basic restrictions)와 기준레벨(reference levels)로 나눌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Exposure standards defined in the electromagnetic field protection standards established by international organizations such as ICNIRP can be broadly divided into basic restrictions and reference levels.
data.target_sentence: Exposure standards defined in the electromagnetic field protection standards established by international organizations such as ICNIRP can be broadly divided into basic restrictions and reference levels.

data.source_sentence: 기본 한계는 신경세포 자극, 조직 온도 상승 등 인체에 실질적 영향을 줄 수 있는 물리량이며 인체 내부에서 발생하는 유도전류밀도, 유도전기장, SAR(Specific Absorption Rate, 전자파흡수율) 등이 포함된다.
data.mt_sentence: The basic limit is a physical quantity that can have a substantial effect on the human body, such as nerve cell stimulation and tissue temperature rise, and includes induced current density, induced electric field, and SAR (Specific Absorption Rate) generated inside the human body.
data.target_sentence: The basic limit is a physical quantity that can have a substantial effect on the human body, such as nerve cell stimulation and tissue temperature rise, and includes induced current density, induced electric field, and SAR (Specific Absorption Rate) generated inside the human body.

data.source_sentence: 기준 레벨은 실용적인 노출량 평가를 위해 인체가 위치할 자유공간에서 측정한 전기장/자기장 강도, 전력밀도 등 기본 한계보다 측정이 용이한 물리량으로 정의된다.
data.mt_sentence: The reference level is defined as a physical quantity that is easier to measure than basic limits such as electric/magnetic field strength and power density measured in a free space where the human body will be located for practical exposure evaluation.
data.target_sentence: The reference level is defined as a physical quantity that is easier to measure than basic limits such as electric/magnetic field strength and power density measured in a free space where the human body will be located for practical exposure evaluation.

data.source_sentence: 기준 레벨은 그 적용이 간단하여 전자기장 인체노출량평가에 널리 쓰이고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the reference level is simple to apply, it is widely used in evaluating the amount of human exposure of electromagnetic fields.
data.target_sentence: Since the reference level is simple to apply, it is widely used in evaluating the amount of human exposure of electromagnetic fields.

data.source_sentence: 유도가열 조리기에 의한 EMF 기본 한계(인체유도전류밀도) 노출량 평가는 인체 내부에서 발생하는 해당 물리량의 특성때문에 계측기를 이용해 직접 측정하고 평가하는 것이 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: Evaluation of EMF basic limits (human induced current density) exposure by induction heating cookers is difficult to measure and evaluate directly using instruments due to the nature of the corresponding physical quantity generated inside the human body.

data.source_sentence: 하이퍼써미아 장치는 개발된 자성 나노입자의 특성을 반영하여 개발이 되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Hyperthermia devices should be developed by reflecting the characteristics of the developed magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: Hyperthermia devices should be developed by reflecting the characteristics of the developed magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 자성 나노입자의 특성이 고려된 장치가 개발되더라도 자성 나노입자의 발열량을 제어할 수 있어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Even if a device that considers the characteristics of magnetic nanoparticles is developed, it is necessary to control the amount of heat generated by magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: Even if a device that considers the characteristics of magnetic nanoparticles is developed, it is necessary to control the amount of heat generated by magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 상용화된 하이퍼써이마 장치는 온도 제어가 불가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Up to now, commercialized hyperthermia devices cannot control temperature.
data.target_sentence: Up to now, commercialized hyperthermia devices cannot control temperature.

data.source_sentence: 향후 개발될 하이퍼써미아 장치는 정상세포의 손상을 최소화하며 온도 제어가 가능한 시스템으로 개발이 되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Hyperthermia devices to be developed in the future should be developed as a system that minimizes damage to normal cells and can control temperature.
data.target_sentence: Hyperthermia devices to be developed in the future should be developed as a system that minimizes damage to normal cells and can control temperature.

data.source_sentence: FFR을 적용하여 하이퍼써미아 장치를 개발하는 경우 시스템의 볼륨이 커지며 전력 소모가 매우 커지게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When developing hyperthermia devices by applying FFR, the volume of the system increases and the power consumption becomes very large.
data.target_sentence: When developing hyperthermia devices by applying FFR, the volume of the system increases, and the power consumption becomes very large.

data.source_sentence: FFR을 이용하여 MPI 기능까지 보유하게 되면 암 추적, 진단, 치료를 동시에 할 수 있는 새로운 시스템이 구현될 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Having MPI functions using FFR will implement a new system that can track, diagnose, and treat cancer at the same time.
data.target_sentence: Having MPI functions using FFR will implement a new system that can track, diagnose, and treat cancer at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 최종적으로 표적형 진단과 치료가 동시에 가능한 새로운 개념의 차세대 테라노스틱스 시스템 개발이 가능할 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Finally, it will be possible to develop a new concept of next-generation terranostix system that enables targeted diagnosis and treatment at the same time.
data.target_sentence: Finally, it will be possible to develop a new concept of a next generation theranostics system that enables targeted diagnosis and treatment at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 특히 마이크로/나노 로봇제어 기술을 적용하면 자성 나노입자의 움직임 및 위치 제어가 가능하기 때문에 FFR만을 사용하는 것보다 부작용을 최소화하며 고정밀의 타겟팅과 발열제어가 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, since it is possible to control the movement and position of magnetic nanoparticles by applying micro/nano robot control technology, side effects are minimized compared to using FFR alone, and high-precision targeting and heat generation control are possible.
data.target_sentence: In particular, since it is possible to control the movement and position of magnetic nanoparticles by applying micro/nano robot control technology, side effects are minimized compared to using FFR alone, and high-precision targeting and heat generation control are possible.

data.source_sentence: 편광상태의 제어, 측정 및 분석에 기반한 타원법(ellipsom-etry)은 그 고유한 장점으로 인하여 물질의 광학적 물성의 연구나 표면의 상태 또는 박막의 정밀 측정 등에 매우 유용하다.
data.mt_sentence: The ellipsom-etry based on the control, measurement and analysis of polarization state is very useful for the study of optical properties of a material or precise measurement of a surface state or thin film due to its unique advantage.
data.target_sentence: The ellipsom-etry based on the control, measurement, and analysis of polarization state is very useful for the study of optical properties of a material or precise measurement of a surface condition or thin film due to its unique advantage.

data.source_sentence: 위상변조 방식을 적용한 MME도 개발되어 물질의 이방성 연구, 마이크로초 단위의 높은 시간분해능을 필요로 하는 연구 등에 적용된 바가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: MME to which the phase modulation method is applied has also been developed and applied to anisotropy studies of materials and studies that require high time resolution in microseconds.
data.target_sentence: MME, to which the phase modulation method is applied, has also been developed and applied to anisotropy studies of materials and studies that require high time resolution in microseconds.

data.target_sentence: The accuracy of the MME measurement was improved by observing the effect of the exercise and suggesting a measurement theory taking this into account.

data.mt_sentence: It should be noted that A ≠ 0 to obtain the inverse matrix in Equation (7).
data.target_sentence: It should be noted that A ≠ 0 to obtain the inverse matrix in Equation (7).

data.source_sentence: 식 (11)에서 p, g 그리고 dc는 광흡수 위상지연자의 흡수상수들과 위상지연각으로 이상적인 위상지연자의 경우 p = 1, g =p/4가 된다.

data.target_sentence: In Equation (11), p, g, and dc are the absorption constants of the light absorption phase retarder and the phase retarder angle, and for the ideal phase retarder, p=1 and g=p/4.

data.mt_sentence: The absorption constant g has the following relationship with tc, which is the electric field transmission ratio of the fast and slow axes.
data.target_sentence: The absorption constant g has the following relationship with tc, which is the electric field transmission ratio of the fast and slow axes.

data.mt_sentence: Figure 2 shows these characteristics of the complex phase retarder well.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2 shows these characteristics of the complex phase retarder well.

data.mt_sentence: These six polarization states form mutually independent Stokes vectors.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 MP(2A)와 MC(2C)는 각각 방위각이 A인 검광자의 뮬러행렬과 방위각이 C인 위상지연자의 뮬러행렬로서 이들은 각각 아래 식과 같이 나타난다.

data.source_sentence: 불완전한 위상지연자를 보정기로 사용하는 경우에도 시료의 뮬러행렬을 측정할 수 있게 하는 자유형 구동방식의 뮬러행렬타원계를 제시한다.
