data.source_sentence: 헤드마운트 디스플레이(head-mounted display, HMD)는 사람의 눈앞 근거리에 위치하고 눈을 덮는 공간 내부에 배치되기 때문에 일반적인 디스플레이와 다른 특성을 필요로 한다.
data.mt_sentence: A head-mounted display (HMD) requires different characteristics from a general display because it is located close to the person's eyes and is placed inside the space that covers the eyes.
data.target_sentence: A head-mounted display (HMD) requires different characteristics from a general display because it is located close to the person's eyes and is placed inside the space that covers the eyes.

data.source_sentence: 2–3인치 내외의 작은 화면에 고화질을 구현해야 하기 때문에 4K 이상의 고해상도가 필요하고, 고정된 위치 때문에 좁은 시야각이 필요하며, 휴대성을 위해 저소비 전력 구동이 필요하다(그림 1).
data.mt_sentence: A high resolution of 4K or higher is required because high-definition is to be implemented on a small screen of about 2-3 inches, a narrow viewing angle is required due to a fixed location, and low power consumption is required for portability (Figure 1).
data.target_sentence: A high resolution of 4K or higher is required because high-definition is to be implemented on a small screen of about 2-3 inches, a narrow viewing angle is required due to a fixed location, and low power consumption is required for portability (Figure 1).

data.source_sentence: HMD 내부는 밀폐된 공간이므로 시야각 이외의 방향에서의 불필요한 빛의 누설을 최소화해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the inside of the HMD is an enclosed space, unnecessary light leakage from directions other than the viewing angle should be minimized.
data.target_sentence: Since the inside of the HMD is an enclosed space, unnecessary light leakage from directions other than the viewing angle should be minimized.

data.source_sentence: LGP 하부의 산란 패턴 형상과 LGP의 출광 분포의 상관관계를 도출하고, 협시야각에 적합한 산란 패턴 형상을 결정하였으며, LGP 상부에 역프리즘 필름을 추가하여 LGP의 빛이 정면으로 향하도록 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The correlation between the scattering pattern shape under LGP and the emission distribution of LGP was derived, and the scattering pattern shape suitable for the angle of view was determined, and an inverse prism film was added to the upper part of LGP so that the light of LGP was directed forward.
data.target_sentence: The correlation between the scattering pattern shape under LGP and the emission distribution of LGP was derived, the scattering pattern shape suitable for the angle of view was determined, and an inverse prism film was added to the upper part of LGP so that the light of LGP was directed forward.

data.source_sentence: 결과 는 역프리즘 구조의 BLU를 최적화함으로써 협시야각 특성이 개선된 HMD용으로의 활용 가능성을 제시한다.
data.mt_sentence: The results suggest the possibility of utilization for HMD with improved angina-visual characteristics by optimizing BLU of inverse prism structure.
data.target_sentence: The results suggest the possibility of utilization for HMD with improved angina-visual characteristics by optimizing BLU of inverse prism structure.

data.source_sentence: LED 근방의 빛 에너지가 크기 때문에, 산란 패턴의 크기와 간격을 위치에 따라 조절하면 LGP 상면에 출광되는 빛의 분포를 균일하게 만들 수 있다(그림 2(a), 그림 3(b)).
data.mt_sentence: Due to the large light energy near the LED, the size and spacing of the scattering pattern can be adjusted according to the location to make the distribution of light emitted on the top of the LGP uniform (Fig. 2(a) and Fig. 3(b).
data.target_sentence: Due to the large light energy near the LED, the size and spacing of the scattering pattern can be adjusted according to the location to make the distribution of light emitted on the top of the LGP uniform (Fig. 2(a) and Fig. 3(b).

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(b)는 LGP 위에 확산 시트, 프리즘 시트 2장으로 구성된 일반적인 BLU 구조이고, 그림 2(c)는 LGP 위에 역프리즘 시트 1장이 추가된 구조이다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 2(b) is a general BLU structure composed of a diffusion sheet and two prism sheets on LGP, and Figure 2(c) is a structure in which one inverted prism sheet is added on top of LGP.
data.target_sentence: Figure 2(b) is a general BLU structure composed of a diffusion sheet and two prism sheets on LGP, and Figure 2(c) is a structure in which one inverted prism sheet is added on top of LGP.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(d)–2(f)는 위 구조의 BLU에 대해 측정된 휘도 분포도를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Figures 2(d)–2(f) show the measured luminance distribution for the BLU of the above structure.
data.target_sentence: Figures 2(d)–2(f) show the measured luminance distribution for the BLU of the above structure.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(d)에서 아래쪽 경계부에 등간격으로 보이는 붉은색 반점은 실측과정에서 LED의 빛이 LGP를 통하지 않고 직접 측정된 결과이다.
data.mt_sentence: In Figure 2(d), the red spots that appear to be equally spaced at the lower boundary are the result of direct measurement of the light of the LED during the actual measurement process without going through LGP.
data.target_sentence: In Figure 2(d), the red spots that appear to be equally spaced at the lower boundary are the result of direct measurement of the light of the LED during the actual measurement process without going through LGP.

data.source_sentence: 그림 2(e)와 그림 2(f)를 비교하면 역프리즘을 적용한 방식이 효율이 높을 뿐만 아니라, 시야각 분포가 상하는 좁고 좌우가 넓은 특징을 보이기 때문에 HMD에 더 적합한 방식임을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Comparing Fig. 2(e) and Fig. 2(f), it can be seen that the method applying the inverted prism is more suitable for HMD because it has high efficiency, and the viewing angle distribution is narrow at the top and bottom and wide at the left and right.
data.target_sentence: Comparing Fig. 2(e) and Fig. 2(f), it can be seen that the method applying the inverted prism is more suitable for HMD because it has high efficiency, and the viewing angle distribution is narrow at the top and bottom and wide at the left and right.

data.source_sentence: BLU의 광분포는 각 구성 요소의 특성에 영향을 받는다.
data.mt_sentence: The light distribution of BLU is affected by the characteristics of each component.
data.target_sentence: The light distribution of BLU is affected by the characteristics of each component.

data.source_sentence: 여기서는 산란 패턴의 형상을 구형(sphere)을 기반으로 하고 그 절단면의 위치에 따라 볼록한 정도를 가변하였고, 그 형상을 D, h로 나타내었다(그림 3).
data.mt_sentence: Here, the shape of the scattering pattern is based on a sphere, and the degree of convexity is varied according to the position of the cut surface, and the shape is indicated by D and h (Fig. 3).
data.target_sentence: Here, the shape of the scattering pattern is based on a sphere, and the degree of convexity is varied according to the position of the cut surface, and the shape is indicated by D and h (Fig. 3).

data.source_sentence: 동일한 단면적을 갖도록 일정한 D값에 대해서 h값을 다르게 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The h value was set differently for a constant D value to have the same cross-sectional area.
data.target_sentence: The h value was set differently for a constant D value to have the same cross-sectional area.

data.source_sentence: 참고로 D/h = 2인 경우는 반구(hemi-sphere)에 해당되고, D/h값이 커질수록 산란 패턴의 형상이 납작한형태가 되며, 일반적인 LGP 구조의 경우, D/h ∼10에 해당한다.
data.mt_sentence: For reference, when D/h = 2, it corresponds to a hemi-sphere, and as the D/h value increases, the shape of the scattering pattern becomes flatter, and in the case of a general LGP structure, it corresponds to D/h ∼10. do.

data.mt_sentence: When N = 107 rays were used, the relative error converged within 5%.
data.target_sentence: When N = 107 rays were used, the relative error converged within 5%.

data.source_sentence: 열처리 동안에 Cu-첨가 자석에서 일어나는 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 결정구조 변화 분석을 통해, 보자력 향상에 필수적인 Nd-산화물의 결정구조 및 이의 안정화 기구를 밝혔다.
data.mt_sentence: Through the analysis of the crystal structure change of the Nd-rich triple point phase and the grain boundary phase occurring in the Cu-added magnet during heat treatment, the crystal structure of Nd-oxide essential for improving the coercive force and its stabilization mechanism were revealed.
data.target_sentence: Through the analysis of the crystal structure change of the Ndrich triple point phase and the grain boundary phase occurring in the Cuadded magnet during heat treatment, the crystal structure of Ndoxide, which is essential for improving the coercive force and its stabilization mechanism were revealed.

data.source_sentence: SEM, EPMA 및 HR-TEM을 이용한 면밀한 미세구조 분석을 통해 Cu-첨가 자석의 구조/화학적 결점을 파악함으로써, 이를 효율적으로 보완할 수 있는 금속 원소 첨가 공정을 개발하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The structure/chemical defects of Cu-added magnets were identified through close microstructure analysis using SEM, EPMA, and HR-TEM, and a metal element addition process was developed to compensate them efficiently.
data.target_sentence: The structure/chemical defects of Cu-added magnets were identified through close microstructure analysis using SEM, EPMA, and HR-TEM, and a metal element addition process was developed to compensate for them efficiently.

data.source_sentence: 잔류자화의 감소를 최소화하면서 Cu-첨가 자석의 보자력을 성공적으로 향상시켰다.
data.mt_sentence: We have successfully improved the coercive force of Cu-added magnets while minimizing the reduction in residual magnetization.
data.target_sentence: We have successfully improved the coercive force of Cuadded magnets while minimizing the reduction in residual magnetization.

data.source_sentence: 최근의 세계적 이슈인 ‘탄소중립’의 실현을 가속화하기 위해, 모빌리티 산업계에서는 기존 내연기관이 아닌 전기모터에 의해 구동되는 ‘환경 친화형 모빌리티’ 개발에 역량을 집중시키고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: To accelerate the realization of 'carbon neutrality', a recent global issue, the mobility industry is concentrating its capabilities on the development of 'environmentally friendly mobility' driven by an electric motor rather than an existing internal combustion engine.

data.mt_sentence: It is that the crystal structure of the triple point phase with low aggregation degree of Cu, which should be formed of h-Nd2O3, is transformed into c-Nd2O3 due to the solid solution of Al.
data.target_sentence: It is that the crystal structure of the triple point phase with a low aggregation degree of Cu, which should be formed of h-Nd2O3, is transformed into c-Nd2O3 due to the solid solution of Al.

data.source_sentence: Cu-첨가 자석의 미세구조적 결점이었던 Cu의 응집도가 낮은 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 구조/화학적 특성이, Al-Cu 동시 첨가를 통한 Al의 선택적 고용으로 인해 효율적으로 개선될 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: Structural/chemical properties of the Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase with low cohesiveness of Cu, which were microstructural defects of Cu-added magnets, could be efficiently improved due to the selective dissolution of Al through the simultaneous addition of Al-Cu.
data.target_sentence: The structural/chemical properties of the Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase with low cohesiveness of Cu, which were microstructural defects of Cu-added magnets, could be efficiently improved due to the selective dissolution of Al through the simultaneous addition of Al-Cu.

data.source_sentence: Nd-Fe-B계 영구 자석은 자기 특성이 우수하여 산업 전반에 사용되고 있지만 희토류 자원 수급 및 가격 문제는 지속적으로 대두되고 있는 실정이다.
data.mt_sentence: Although Nd-Fe-B-based permanent magnets have excellent magnetic properties and are used throughout the industry, the problems of supply and demand and price of rare earth resources are continuously emerging.
data.target_sentence: Although Nd-Fe-B-based permanent magnets have excellent magnetic properties and are used throughout the industry, the problems of supply and demand and the price of rare earth resources are continuously emerging.

data.source_sentence: 최근 친환경 자동차 시장의 급격한 성장과 함께 Nd-Fe-B계 영구 자석에 사용되는 희토류 자원 수급 불안정성은 더욱 심화되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: With the recent rapid growth of the eco-friendly automobile market, the instability in supply and demand of rare earth resources used in Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets is intensifying.
data.target_sentence: With the recent rapid growth of the eco-friendly automobile market, the instability in supply and demand of rare earth resources used in Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets is intensifying.

data.source_sentence: 현재 산업의 발달과 함께 인간의 에너지 소비는 급속하게 증가하고 있으며, 이와 더불어 매장된 화석에너지의 자원 부족 및 과도한 사용으로 인한 기후변화 문제가 지속적으로 대두되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: With the development of industry, human energy consumption is rapidly increasing, and in addition, climate change problems due to insufficient resources and excessive use of buried fossil energy continue to emerge.
data.target_sentence: With the development of industry, human energy consumption is rapidly increasing, and in addition, climate change problems due to insufficient resources and excessive use of buried fossil energy continue to emerge.

data.source_sentence: 최근 이러한 에너지 및 환경 문제를 해결하기 위해 기존에 사용하던 화석에너지를 친환경 에너지로 대체하는 방향으로 산업은 변화되고 있고, 특히, 하이브리드/전기 자동차와 같은 친환경 모빌리티 산업이 크게 성장하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to solve these energy and environmental problems, the industry is changing in the direction of replacing fossil energy with eco-friendly energy. In particular, eco-friendly mobility industries such as hybrid/electric vehicles are growing significantly.
data.target_sentence: In order to solve these energy and environmental problems, the industry is changing in the direction of replacing fossil energy with eco-friendly energy, and in particular, eco-friendly mobility industries such as hybrid/electric vehicles are growing significantly.

data.source_sentence: 친환경 자동차의 핵심 부품 중 하나인 모터의 고효율화/소형화를 위해서 고특성 영구자석이 필수적으로 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: High-characteristic permanent magnets are essential for high efficiency/minimization of motors, which are one of the core components of eco-friendly vehicles.
data.target_sentence: High-characteristic permanent magnets are essential for high efficiency/minimization of motors, which are one of the core components of eco-friendly vehicles.

data.source_sentence: 전기 자동차에 사용되는 구동 모터의 경우, 작동 중 온도가 약200°C까지 상승할 수 있기 때문에, 고온에서도 높은 자속 밀도를 유지할 수 있는 영구자석의 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a driving motor used in an electric vehicle, since the temperature may rise to about 200°C during operation, a permanent magnet capable of maintaining a high magnetic flux density even at a high temperature is required.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a driving motor used in an electric vehicle, since the temperature may rise to about 200°C during operation, a permanent magnet capable of maintaining a high magnetic flux density even at a high temperature is required.

data.source_sentence: 내열 특성이 취약하여 사용 온도가 상승하면 자석의 보자력이 급격하게 감소되어 영구자석으로서 제 기능을 발휘하지 못한다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to its weak heat resistance, when the operating temperature rises, the coercive force of the magnet is sharply reduced, so that it cannot function properly as a permanent magnet.
data.target_sentence: Due to its weak heat resistance, when the operating temperature rises, the coercive force of the magnet is sharply reduced so that it cannot function properly as a permanent magnet.

data.source_sentence: 현재 고효율 모터에 사용되는 Nd-Fe-B 영구자석은 보자력을 향상시키기 위해 Dy, Tb와 같은 중희토류 금속을 첨가하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets currently used in high-efficiency motors contain heavy rare earth metals such as Dy and Tb to improve coercive force.
data.target_sentence: Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets currently used in high-efficiency motors contain heavy rare earth metals such as Dy and Tb to improve the coercive force.

data.source_sentence: Dy 또는 Tb가 첨가되면 주상의 Nd 일부가 Dy 또는 Tb로 치환되면서 자기 이방성 에너지가 향상되어 보자력이 증가하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: When Dy or Tb is added, a part of Nd of the columnar is substituted with Dy or Tb, thereby improving magnetic anisotropic energy and increasing self-resisting force.
data.target_sentence: When Dy or Tb is added, a part of Nd of the columnar is substituted with Dy or Tb, thereby improving magnetic anisotropic energy and increasing self-resisting force.

data.source_sentence: Dy와 Tb는 Fe와 반강자성 결합(antiferromagnetic coupling)을 하기 때문에 잔류자화와 최대 자기에너지적이 오히려 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Because Dy and Tb have an antiferromagnetic coupling with Fe, residual magnetization and maximum magnetic energy are rather reduced.
data.target_sentence: Because Dy and Tb have an antiferromagnetic coupling with Fe, residual magnetization and maximum magnetic energy are rather reduced.

data.source_sentence: 최근에는 첨가되는 중희토류 금속 양을 저감하거나 중희토류 금속을 사용하지 않고도기존과 동일한 특성을 지니는 자석을 개발하고자 하는 연구가 많이 수행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, many studies have been conducted to develop magnets having the same characteristics as the existing ones without reducing the amount of heavy rare earth metals added or using heavy rare earth metals.
data.target_sentence: Recently, many studies have been conducted to develop magnets having the same characteristics as the existing ones without reducing the amount of heavy rare earth metals added or using heavy rare earth metals.

data.source_sentence: 고특성 Nd-Fe-B 자석의 수요가 급격하게 증가됨에 따라 향후 Nd의 불안정한 수급 또한 예상된다.
data.mt_sentence: As the demand for high-performance Nd-Fe-B magnets is rapidly increasing, unstable supply and demand for Nd is also expected in the future.
data.target_sentence: As the demand for high-performance Nd-Fe-B magnets is rapidly increasing, unstable supply and demand for Nd is also expected in the future.

data.source_sentence: 이에 최근 Nd 저감형 영구자석을 개발하기 위한 연구가 주목받고 있으며, Ce은 Nd를 저감하기 위해 활용되는 대표적인 금속이다.
data.mt_sentence: Accordingly, research to develop Nd-reducing permanent magnets has recently attracted attention, and Ce is a representative metal used to reduce Nd.
data.target_sentence: Accordingly, research to develop Nd-reducing permanent magnets has recently attracted attention, and Ce is a representative metal used to reduce Nd.

data.source_sentence: 현재 Ce의 가격은 Nd 가격의 약 1/40 수준으로 Nd의 일부를 Ce으로 대체할 경우 희토류 자원 수급 문제뿐만 아니라 부품의 가격 경쟁력 확보도 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The current price of Ce is about 1/40 of that of Nd, and if a part of Nd is replaced with Ce, it is possible to secure price competitiveness of parts as well as supply and demand problems of rare earth resources.
data.target_sentence: The current price of Ce is about 1/40 of that of Nd, and if a part of Nd is replaced with Ce, it is possible to secure price competitiveness of parts as well as supply and demand problems of rare earth resources.

data.source_sentence: Ce2Fe14B 상의 포화자화(Ms), 큐리온도(Tc), 이방성 자계(HA)등 고유 자기 특성은 Nd2Fe14B 자석에 비해 매우 낮아 치환양이 증가할수록 자석의 특성은 크게 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Intrinsic magnetic characteristics such as saturated magnetization (Ms), curie temperature (Tc), and anisotropic magnetic field (HA) on Ce2Fe14B are much lower than those of Nd2Fe14B magnets, and thus the characteristics of the magnets are greatly reduced as the displacement amount increases.
data.target_sentence: Intrinsic magnetic characteristics such as saturated magnetization (Ms), curie temperature (Tc), and anisotropic magnetic field (HA) on Ce2Fe14B are much lower than those of Nd2Fe14B magnets, and thus the characteristics of the magnets are greatly reduced as the displacement amount increases.

data.source_sentence: 고특성 중희토류 배제형 또는 Nd 저감형 영구자석을 개발하기 위해서는 결정립 크기, 입계상 구조 및 조성 등 미세조직을 정밀하게 제어하는 기술이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to develop a rare earth exclusion type or Nd reduction type permanent magnet among high characteristics, a technology for precisely controlling microstructures such as grain size, grain boundary structure and composition is required.
data.target_sentence: In order to develop a rare earth exclusion type or Nd reduction type permanent magnet among high characteristics, a technology for precisely controlling microstructures such as grain size, grain boundary structure, and composition is required.

data.source_sentence: 소결 자석에서 결정립 미세화를 통한 보자력 증강에는 한계가 있음을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: This means that there is a limit to the enhancement of coercive force through grain refinement in sintered magnets.
data.target_sentence: This means that there is a limit to the enhancement of coercive force through grain refinement in sintered magnets.

data.source_sentence: 초기 분말의 미세조직(결정립 크기, 조성 등), 공정 온도, 변형량, 변형속도 등에 따라 자기 특성이 크게 달라질 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetic characteristics of the initial powder may be significantly changed according to a microstructure (grain grain size, composition, etc.), a process temperature, a deformation amount, a deformation speed, and the like.
data.target_sentence: The magnetic characteristics of the initial powder may be significantly changed according to a microstructure (grain size, composition, etc.), a process temperature, a deformation amount, deformation speed, and the like.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2는 공정 단계별 자석의 SEM 이미지와 모식도를 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the SEM image and schematic diagram of the magnet for each process step.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 2 shows the SEM image and schematic diagram of the magnet for each process step.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 자석의 결정립 이방화와 관련하여 두 가지 메커니즘이 고려되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Two mechanisms were considered regarding grain anisotropy in hot-deformed magnets.
data.target_sentence: Two mechanisms were considered regarding grain anisotropy in hot-deformed magnets.

data.source_sentence: Nd2Fe14B 주상의 탄성계수 차이에 의해 결정립 c-축이 가압방향으로 배향되는 것이라는 주장이다.
data.mt_sentence: It is argued that the c-axis of the grains is oriented in the pressing direction due to the difference in the elastic modulus of the Nd2Fe14B columnar phase.
data.target_sentence: It is argued that the c-axis of the grains is oriented in the pressing direction due to the difference in the elastic modulus of the Nd2Fe14B columnar phase.

data.source_sentence: 이 메커니즘은 AAA가 발표한 인장 변형 공정을 통한 결정립 이방화 결과를 설명할 수 없다.
data.mt_sentence: This mechanism cannot explain the grain anisotropy results through the tensile strain process published by AAA.
data.target_sentence: This mechanism cannot explain the grain anisotropy results through the tensile strain process published by AAA.

data.source_sentence: AAA 주장이 옳다고 가정하면, 인장 변형에서 결정립의 c-축이 인장 방향으로 늘어나야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming the AAA argument is correct, in tensile strain, the c-axis of the grains should stretch in the tensile direction.
data.target_sentence: Assuming that AAA's argument is correct, the c-axis of the crystal grain in tensile deformation should extend in the tensile direction.

data.source_sentence: 실제 실험 결과에서는 결정립은 단조 변형과 마찬가지로 a-축 방향으로 길게 늘어났으며 c-축은 인장 방향과 수직하게 정렬되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the actual experimental results, the grains were elongated in the a-axis direction as in forging deformation, and the c-axis was aligned perpendicular to the tensile direction.
data.target_sentence: In the actual experimental results, the grains were elongated in the a-axis direction as in forging deformation, and the c-axis was aligned perpendicular to the tensile direction.

data.source_sentence: 두 번째 메커니즘은 결정립 성장의 이방성에 기반을 두고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The second mechanism is based on the anisotropy of grain growth.
data.target_sentence: The second mechanism is based on the anisotropy of grain growth.

data.source_sentence: 판상 결정립의 변형 과정에서 인가되는 외부 압력에 의해 c-축이 가압방향에 평행하게 회전되며 배향된다고 주장하였다.
data.mt_sentence: It was argued that the c-axis is rotated and oriented parallel to the pressing direction by the external pressure applied during the deformation of the plate-shaped grains.
data.target_sentence: It was argued that the c-axis is rotated and oriented parallel to the pressing direction by the external pressure applied during the deformation of the plate-shaped grains.

data.source_sentence: 결정립계의 액상의 Nd-rich 상은 결정립 회전을 위한 윤활제역할을 하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The liquid Nd-rich phase of the grain boundary serves as a lubricant for grain rotation.
data.target_sentence: The liquid Nd-rich phase of the grain boundary serves as a lubricant for grain rotation.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 공정 중 변형률 및 변형 속도에 따른 자석의 미세 조직과 자기 특성 변화를 살펴보았다.
data.mt_sentence: Changes in the microstructure and magnetic properties of magnets according to strain and strain rate during the hot deformation process were investigated.
data.target_sentence: The changes in the microstructure and magnetic properties of magnets according to strain and strain rate during the hot deformation process were investigated.

data.source_sentence: 변형초기에는 변형 속도가 느릴수록 시료에 응력이 작게 걸리는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the early stage of deformation, it can be seen that the slower the deformation speed, the smaller the stress is applied to the sample.
data.target_sentence: In the early stage of deformation, it can be seen that the slower the deformation speed, the smaller the stress is applied to the sample.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 변형률, 변형시간 및 변형 속도에 따른 자기 특성변화를 나타낸 그래프이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 is a graph showing changes in magnetic properties according to strain, strain time, and strain rate.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 4 is a graph showing changes in magnetic properties according to the strain, strain time, and strain rate.

data.source_sentence: 변형 속도에 따른 자기 특성 변화를 면밀히 분석하기 위해 TEM을 통해 제조된 자석의 미세조직을 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to closely analyze the change in magnetic properties according to the strain rate, the microstructures of magnets manufactured through TEM were compared.
data.target_sentence: In order to closely analyze the change in magnetic properties according to the strain rate, the microstructures of magnets manufactured through TEM were compared.

data.source_sentence: 어두운 콘트라스트가 주상이고 밝은 콘트라스트는 Nd-rich 상을 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: The dark contrast represents the main phase and the bright contrast represents the Nd-rich phase.
data.target_sentence: The dark contrast represents the main phase, and the bright contrast represents the Nd-rich phase.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 빠르게 변형을 진행한 시료의 경우 자석 내부 Nd-rich 상이 입계를 따라 연속적이고 균일하게 분포하고 있는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: First, in the case of a sample that was quickly deformed, it could be verified that the Nd-rich phase in the magnet is continuously and uniformly distributed along the grain boundary.
data.target_sentence: First, in the case of a sample that was quickly deformed, it could be verified that the Nd-rich phase in the magnet is continuously and uniformly distributed along the grain boundary.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 자석의 자기 특성을 저하시키는 원인 중 하나가 초기 분말 계면에서 관찰되는 수 마이크로 크기의 비정상 결정립 성장이다.
data.mt_sentence: One of the causes of degrading the magnetic properties of hot-deformed magnets is the growth of abnormal grains of several microns observed at the initial powder interface.
data.target_sentence: One of the causes of degrading the magnetic properties of hot-deformed magnets is the growth of abnormal grains of several microns observed at the initial powder interface.

data.source_sentence: 분말 계면에서 나타나는 비정상 결정립 성장은 일반적으로 hot-press 단계에서 생성되기 시작하여 열간변형 공정 중 더 크게 성장하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The abnormal grain growth at the powder interface generally starts to be generated in the hot-press step and grows larger during the hot deformation process.
data.target_sentence: The abnormal grain growth at the powder interface generally starts to be generated in the hotpress step and grows larger during the hot deformation process.

data.source_sentence: Hot-press 단계에서 성장된 결정립은 열간 변형 공정 후에도 기존 구형의 형상 및 등방성 배향을 유지하여 제조된 자석의 잔류자화가 다소 감소한다(Fig. 6).
data.mt_sentence: The crystal grains grown in the hot-press stage maintain the existing spherical shape and isotropic orientation even after the hot deformation process, so that the residual magnetization of the manufactured magnet is somewhat reduced (Fig. 6).
data.target_sentence: The crystal grains grown in the hot-press stage maintain the existing spherical shape and isotropic orientation even after the hot deformation process so that the residual magnetization of the manufactured magnet is somewhat reduced (Fig. 6).

data.source_sentence: 공정 온도를 낮추게 되면 상기 언급한 분말 계면에서의 결정립 성장이 나타나지않는다.
data.mt_sentence: When the process temperature is lowered, grain growth at the above-mentioned powder interface does not appear.
data.target_sentence: When the process temperature is lowered, grain growth at the aforementioned powder interface does not appear.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 온도 제어를 통한 결정립 성장 억제와 높은 결정립 배향도를 동시에 확보하기 위해 고안된 2단계 변형 공정이 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A two-stage deformation process designed to suppress grain growth through hot deformation temperature control and ensure high grain orientation at the same time has been reported.
data.target_sentence: A two stage deformation process designed to suppress grain growth through hot deformation temperature control and ensure high grain orientation at the same time has been reported.

data.source_sentence: 분말 계면 결정립성장을 억제할 수 있는 또 다른 방법으로, WC, Nb와 같은 고융점 내화 물질 첨가하는 방법이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As another method for suppressing the grain growth at the powder interface, there is a method of adding a high melting point refractory material such as WC or Nb.
data.target_sentence: As another method for suppressing the grain growth at the powder interface, there is a method of adding a high melting point refractory material such as WC or Nb.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형자석 제조 시 분말 계면에는 다량의 Nd-rich 응집체가 형성된다.
data.mt_sentence: When manufacturing a hot deformed magnet, a large amount of Nd-rich aggregates are formed at the powder interface.
data.target_sentence: When manufacturing a hot deformed magnet, a large amount of Nd-rich aggregates are formed at the powder interface.

data.source_sentence: 실제 WC가 첨가된 자석에서 비정상 결정립성장이 나타나지 않았으며(Fig. 8), 첨가하지 않은 자석에 비해 보자력과 잔류자화가 모두 향상되는 결과를 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: In fact, no abnormal grain growth was observed in the magnet to which WC was added (Fig. 8), and both the coercive force and the residual magnetization were improved compared to the magnet without the addition of WC.
data.target_sentence: In fact, no abnormal grain growth was observed in the magnet to which WC was added (Fig. 8), and both the coercive force and the residual magnetization were improved compared to the magnet without the addition of WC.

data.source_sentence: 이와 유사하게, 초기 합금 제조 시 미량의 Nb 금속을 첨가한 연구도 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Similarly, studies have been reported in which trace amounts of Nb metal were added during initial alloy preparation.

data.source_sentence: Nd-Fe-B와 같은 영구 자성 소재뿐만 아니라 위상학적 자기 스핀 텍스쳐인 자기 스커미온 등은 기초 과학 및 응용 측면에서 많은 주목을 받고있다.
data.mt_sentence: Permanent magnetic materials such as Nd-Fe-B as well as magnetic skyrmions, which are topological magnetic spin textures, are attracting a lot of attention in terms of basic science and applications.
data.target_sentence: Permanent magnetic materials such as Nd-Fe-B, as well as magnetic skyrmions, which are topological magnetic spin textures, are attracting a lot of attention in terms of basic science and applications.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 자성 재료의 자기 특성의 이해를 위해 자구 변화의 이해가 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: To understand the magnetic properties of various magnetic materials, it is important to understand the magnetic domain change.
data.target_sentence: It is important to understand the magnetic domain change to understand the magnetic properties of various magnetic materials.

data.source_sentence: 자기 스핀이 변화하는 자화 과정은 벡터로 표현이 되며 국부적인 변화가 고려되어야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization process in which the magnetic spin changes is expressed as a vector and local changes should be considered.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization process in which the magnetic spin changes is expressed as a vector and local changes should be considered.

data.source_sentence: 이 중에서 로렌츠 투과전자현미경 분석은 분해능이 높으며, 분석 시간이 신속하여 자기 구조 연구에 광범위하게 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Among them, Lorentz transmission electron microscopy analysis is widely used for magnetic structure studies because of its high resolution and fast analysis time.
data.target_sentence: Among them, Lorentz transmission electron microscopy analysis is widely used for magnetic structure studies because of its high resolution and fast analysis time.

data.source_sentence: 우선 투과전자현미경은 재료의 구조, 화학 조성 등의 분석에서0.1~1.0 nm 수준의 분해능을 갖으며, 자기 구조 이미징에는 2~20 nm 수준의 분해능을 보이는 장점이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: First, the transmission electron microscope has the advantage of having a resolution of 0.1 to 1.0 nm in the analysis of material structure and chemical composition, and showing a resolution of 2 to 20 nm in magnetic structure imaging.
data.target_sentence: First, the transmission electron microscope has the advantage of having a resolution of 0.1 to 1.0 nm in the analysis of the material structure and chemical composition and showing a resolution of 2 to 20 nm in magnetic structure imaging.

data.source_sentence: 투과전자현미경의 일반적인 관찰 모드는 고배율 및 고분해능의 영상을 얻기 위해 강한 세기의 대물렌즈를 이용하여 초점 거리를 최소화한다.
data.mt_sentence: The general observation mode of the transmission electron microscope is to minimize the focal length by using an objective lens of strong intensity to obtain images with high magnification and high resolution.
data.target_sentence: The general observation mode of the transmission electron microscope is to minimize the focal length by using an objective lens of strong intensity to obtain images with high magnification and high resolution.

data.source_sentence: 이 경우 시료 주위에는 약 2~3 T의 강한 자기장이 작용하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, a strong magnetic field of about 2 to 3 T acts around the sample.
data.target_sentence: In this case, a strong magnetic field of about 2 to 3 T acts around the sample.

data.source_sentence: 실제 시료의 자기 구조 정보를 관찰하기 위해서는 자기장의 제어가 가능하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to observe the magnetic structure information of the actual sample, the control of the magnetic field must be possible.
data.target_sentence: In order to observe the magnetic structure information of the actual sample, the magnetic field must be controlled.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 투과전자현미경의 “free lens-control mode”를 이용하거나, 로렌츠 전용 투과전자현미경을 사용하면, 거의 자기장이 없는 환경에서 시료를 관찰할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: If you use the “free lens-control mode” of a general transmission electron microscope or use a transmission electron microscope dedicated to Lorentz, you can observe the sample in an environment where there is almost no magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: If you use the “free lens-control mode” of a general transmission electron microscope or use a transmission electron microscope dedicated to Lorentz, you can observe the sample in an environment where there is almost no magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 투과전자현미경 혹은 일반 투과전자현미경의 로렌츠 모드에서 자구를 관찰하는 원리는 전자빔이 자성 재료를 지나가기 때문에 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The principle of observing magnetic domains in the Lorentz mode of a Lorentz transmission electron microscope or a general transmission electron microscope is possible because an electron beam passes through a magnetic material.
data.target_sentence: The principle of observing magnetic domains in the Lorentz mode of a Lorentz transmission electron microscope or a general transmission electron microscope is possible because an electron beam passes through a magnetic material.

data.source_sentence: 시료 표면의 자화는 자화방향 및 수직으로 입사되는 전자빔의 방향에 모두 수직한 방향으로 로렌츠 힘을 유도한다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization of the sample surface induces a Lorentz force in both the direction of magnetization and the direction of the perpendicularly incident electron beam.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization of the sample surface induces a Lorentz force in both the direction of magnetization and the direction of the perpendicularly incident electron beam.

data.source_sentence: 시료 주위의 정전기장€과 자기장(B)에 의해 형성된 로렌츠 힘(FL)은 전자빔을 굴절시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: The Lorentz force (FL) formed by the electrostatic field € and the magnetic field B around the sample refracts the electron beam.
data.target_sentence: The Lorentz force (FL) formed by the electrostatic field € and the magnetic field B around the sample refracts the electron beam.

data.source_sentence: 로렌츠 투과전자현미경에서는 오직 시료 표면 상의 in-plane 자기 성분인 Bxy만 전자빔의 굴절에 영향을 주며, 수 밀리 라디안으로 브래그 각보다는 훨씬 작다.
data.mt_sentence: In the Lorentz transmission electron microscope, only Bxy, an in-plane magnetic component on the sample surface, affects the refraction of the electron beam, which is a few milliradians, much smaller than the Bragg angle.
data.target_sentence: In the Lorentz transmission electron microscope, only Bxy, an in-plane magnetic component on the sample surface, affects the refraction of the electron beam, which is a few milliradians, much smaller than the Bragg angle.

data.source_sentence: 표면 상이 아닌 out-of-plane 자기 성분은 전자빔의 진행에 영향을 주지 않으며, 관찰이 불가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The out-of-plane magnetic component, which is not on the surface, does not affect the progression of the electron beam, and cannot be observed.
data.target_sentence: The out-of-plane magnetic component, which is not on the surface, does not affect the progression of the electron beam and cannot be observed.

data.source_sentence: 굴절된 전자빔은 최종적으로 자구벽 주위에서 수렴하거나 나뉘어 지면서, 영상면에 자구의 자기 콘트라스트를 형성하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The refracted electron beam finally converges or splits around the magnetic domain wall to form the magnetic contrast of the magnetic domain on the image plane.
data.target_sentence: The refracted electron beam finally converges or splits around the magnetic domain wall to form the magnetic contrast of the magnetic domain on the image plane.

data.source_sentence: 자구 내자화 방향은 관찰되는 이미지와 조리개의 이동방향을 비교하여 파악할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization direction of the magnetic sphere may be determined by comparing the observed image with the movement direction of the aperture.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization direction of the magnetic domain may be determined by comparing the observed image with the movement direction of the aperture.

data.source_sentence: 포컬트 모드 이미징에서는 대물렌즈의 후방 초점면과 선택하지 않은 회절점을 가리는 조리개의 위치가 가능한 동일 평면상에 위치하여야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In focal mode imaging, the aperture positioning covering the rear focal plane of the objective lens and the undetermined diffraction point shall be on the same plane as possible.
data.target_sentence: In focal mode imaging, the aperture positioning covering the rear focal plane of the objective lens and the undetermined diffraction point shall be on the same plane as possible.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 모드에서 자기 콘트라스트의 관찰은 Fig. 1(c)에 나타낸 것과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: The observation of magnetic contrast in Fresnel mode is as shown in Fig. 1(c).
data.target_sentence: The observation of magnetic contrast in Fresnel mode is as shown in Fig. 1(c).

data.source_sentence: 자구벽에서의 자기 콘트라스트의 반전은 over- 또는 under-focus 조건으로 관찰된 이미지에서 관찰할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The reversal of magnetic contrast at the magnetic domain wall can be observed in images observed under over- or under-focus conditions.
data.target_sentence: The reversal of magnetic contrast at the magnetic domain wall can be observed in images observed under over or under focus conditions.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1(d)는 포컬트 및 프레넬 모드에서의 자기콘트라스트의 세기 비교를 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1(d) shows a comparison of the intensity of the magnetic contrast in the focal and Fresnel modes.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1(d) shows a comparison of the intensity of the magnetic contrast in the focal and Fresnel modes.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1(e), (f)는 자구벽의 자기 콘트라스트가 초점 조건에 따라 반전이 되는 것을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1(e) and (f) show that the magnetic contrast of the magnetic domain wall is inverted depending on the focal condition.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1(e) and (f) show that the magnetic contrast of the magnetic domain wall is inverted depending on the focal condition.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 모드에서는 자구벽의 콘트라스트를 명확히 하기 위해 상대적으로 큰 defocus를 유지해야 하기 때문에, 관찰된 이미지의 분해능은 프레넬 모드가 프레넬 모드보다는 다소 떨어진다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the Fresnel mode requires a relatively large defocus to clarify the contrast of the magnetic sphere wall, the resolution of the observed image is slightly lower than that of the Fresnel mode.
data.target_sentence: Since the Fresnel mode requires a relatively large defocus to clarify the contrast of the magnetic domain wall, the resolution of the observed image is slightly lower than that of the Fresnel mode.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 모드는 작동이 간편하고, 뚜렷하게 나타나는 콘트라스트가 큰 강점이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fresnel mode is easy to operate and has a great contrast that is clearly visible.
data.target_sentence: Fresnel mode is easy to operate and has a great contrast that is clearly visible.

data.source_sentence: 프레넬 로렌츠 투과전자현미경 이미지를 이용하여 자화의 방향 및 자구의 스핀 구성을 정량적으로 해석하기 위해, transport-of-intensity 방정식(TIE)이 활용된다.
data.mt_sentence: The transport-of-intensity equation (TIE) is utilized to quantitatively analyze the direction of magnetization and the spin configuration of the magnetic domain using Fresnel Lorentz transmission electron microscopy images.
data.target_sentence: The transport-of-intensity equation (TIE) is utilized to quantitatively analyze the direction of magnetization and the spin configuration of the magnetic domain using Fresnel Lorentz transmission electron microscopy images.

data.source_sentence: 이미지의 intensity는 투과한 전자 파동의 진폭과 위상 정보를 갖고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The intensity of the image contains the amplitude and phase information of the transmitted electromagnetic wave.
data.target_sentence: The intensity of the image contains the amplitude and phase information of the transmitted electromagnetic wave.

data.source_sentence: t와 nz는 각각 시료의 두께, 시료 표면에서 수직한 방향으로의 단위 벡터이다.
data.mt_sentence: T and nz are unit vectors in the direction perpendicular to the thickness of the sample and the sample surface, respectively.
data.target_sentence: T and nz are unit vectors in the direction perpendicular to the thickness of the sample and the sample surface, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 이 값은 로렌츠 투과전자현미경의 관찰 결과로 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This value can be obtained from the observation of the Lorentz transmission electron microscope.
data.target_sentence: This value can be obtained from the observation of the Lorentz transmission electron microscope.

data.source_sentence: 시료 표면에서의 자화 분포는 전자빔의 z 방향에 관한 위상 분포를 미분함으로써 얻을 수 있으며, 이 값은 다음과 같이 근사할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization distribution on the sample surface can be obtained by differentiating the phase distribution with respect to the z-direction of the electron beam, and this value can be approximated as follows.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization distribution on the sample surface can be obtained by differentiating the phase distribution with respect to the z-direction of the electron beam, and this value can be approximated as follows.

data.source_sentence: 자화 분포는 서로 다른 초점거리에서 관찰한 로렌츠 이미지와 TIE 방정식 이용하여 정량적으로 계산할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnetization distribution can be quantitatively calculated using Lorentz images and TIE equations observed at different focal lengths.
data.target_sentence: The magnetization distribution can be quantitatively calculated using Lorentz images and TIE equations observed at different focal lengths.

data.source_sentence: DPC 기법의 원리는 주사투과전자현미경과 유사하며, 단색선의 전자빔을 위한 전계 방출형 전자총, 시편을 주사할 수 있는 수렴성 전자빔으로 구성되어 있다(Fig. 3).
data.mt_sentence: The principle of the DPC technique is similar to that of a scanning transmission electron microscope, and it consists of a field emission electron gun for a monochromatic electron beam and a converging electron beam that can scan a specimen (Fig. 3).
data.target_sentence: The principle of the DPC technique is similar to that of a scanning transmission electron microscope, and it consists of a field emission electron gun for a monochromatic electron beam and a converging electron beam that can scan a specimen (Fig. 3).

data.source_sentence: 시료가 비자성체일 경우 투과 된 전자빔 디스크의 중심부는 검출기의 중앙에 위치한다.
data.mt_sentence: When the sample is a non-magnetic material, the center of the transmitted electron beam disk is located at the center of the detector.
data.target_sentence: When the sample is a non-magnetic material, the center of the transmitted electron beam disk is located at the center of the detector.

data.source_sentence: 시료가 자성체일 경우 로렌츠 힘에 의해 전자는 굴절하게 되고, 투과 전자빔의 디스크의 위치 역시 변화한다(Fig.3(b)).
data.mt_sentence: When the sample is a magnetic material, electrons are refracted by the Lorentz force, and the position of the disk of the transmitted electron beam also changes (Fig. 3(b)).
data.target_sentence: When the sample is a magnetic material, electrons are refracted by the Lorentz force, and the position of the disk of the transmitted electron beam also changes (Fig. 3(b)).

data.source_sentence: 여러 조각으로 분할되어 있는 검출기는 전자 신호를 측정하고, 각각 검출기에서 측정된 신호들의 차이를 이용하여 시료의 자기 정보를 분석하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The detector, which is divided into several pieces, measures an electronic signal and analyzes the magnetic information of the sample using the difference between the signals measured by the detector.
data.target_sentence: The detector, which is divided into several pieces, measures an electronic signal and analyzes the magnetic information of the sample using the difference between the signals measured by the detector.

data.source_sentence: DPC 분석 기법은 전자빔의 크기에 영향을 받으며, 약 2~5 nm 정도의 분해능을 갖는다.
data.mt_sentence: The DPC analysis technique is affected by the size of the electron beam and has a resolution of about 2 to 5 nm.
data.target_sentence: The DPC analysis technique is affected by the size of the electron beam and has a resolution of about 2 to 5 nm.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 4는 DPC 기법을 통해 관찰한 자기 스커미온의 자기 스핀 배열을 보여준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the magnetic spin arrangement of magnetic skyrmions observed through the DPC technique.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 4 shows the magnetic spin arrangement of magnetic skyrmions observed through the DPC technique.

data.source_sentence: 출기 이미지(Fig. 4(a))를 로렌츠 굴절에 의한 수평방향, 수직방향의 이미지들을 각각 변환한다(Fig. 4(b)).
data.mt_sentence: The extraction image (Fig. 4(a)) is converted into horizontal and vertical images by Lorentz refraction, respectively (Fig. 4(b)).
data.target_sentence: The extraction image (Fig. 4(a)) is converted into horizontal and vertical images by Lorentz refraction, respectively (Fig. 4(b)).

data.source_sentence: 이후 두 개의 로렌츠 굴절 이미지를 분석하여, 시료 표면의 자화 벡터, 강도, 스핀 배열 이미지를 얻을 수 있다(Fig. 4(c)).
data.mt_sentence: After analyzing two Lorentz refraction images, magnetization vector, intensity, and spin arrangement images of the sample surface can be obtained (Fig. 4(c)).
data.target_sentence: After analyzing two Lorentz refraction images, magnetization vector, intensity, and spin arrangement images of the sample surface can be obtained (Fig. 4(c)).

data.source_sentence: 전자 홀로그래피에서 중요한 요소는 coherent 전자빔과 얇고 균일한 투과전자현미경 시료이다.
data.mt_sentence: An important element in electron holography is a coherent electron beam and a thin, uniform transmission electron microscope sample.
data.target_sentence: An important element in electron holography is a coherent electron beam and a thin, uniform transmission electron microscope sample.

data.source_sentence: 전자 파동이 시료를 투과할 때, 투과 파동의 위상 변화는 시료의 자기 및 전기 포텐셜 정보를 갖고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When an electromagnetic wave passes through a sample, the phase change of the transmitted wave has magnetic and electrical potential information of the sample.
data.target_sentence: When an electronic wave passes through a sample, the phase change of the transmission wave has the sample's magnetic and electrical potential information.

data.source_sentence: Biprism이 후방 초점면과 영상면 사이에 위치하게 되고, 투과 파동과 기준 파동을 겹침으로써 간섭 패턴(홀로그램)이 영상면에 나타나게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The biprism is positioned between the rear focal plane and the image plane, and the interference pattern (hologram) appears on the image plane by overlapping the transmission wave and the reference wave.
data.target_sentence: The biprism is positioned between the rear focal plane and the image plane, and the interference pattern (hologram) appears on the image plane by overlapping the transmission wave and the reference wave.

data.source_sentence: 홀로그램으로부터 전자 파동은 진폭 이미지와 위상 이미지로 재구성될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: From the hologram, the electromagnetic wave can be reconstructed into an amplitude image and a phase image.
data.target_sentence: From the hologram, the electronic wave can be reconstructed into an amplitude image and a phase image.

data.source_sentence: V와 B 모두 입사 전자빔의 방향에 따라 변화하지 않기 때문에 정전기 성분과 미분을 제외하면, 시료 표면의 자기 유도 성분에 비례하는 위상 구배는 다음과 같이 표현된다.
data.mt_sentence: Since both V and B do not change with the direction of the incident electron beam, the phase gradient proportional to the magnetic induction component of the sample surface is expressed as follows, except for electrostatic and differential components.
data.target_sentence: Since both V and B do not change with the direction of the incident electron beam, the phase gradient proportional to the magnetic induction component of the sample surface is expressed as follows, except for electrostatic and differential components.

data.source_sentence: 위상 재구성 알고리즘의 결과에 따라 자기 구조의 전자 홀로그래피 이미지는 최대 1~2 nm까지의 분해능을 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the result of the phase reconstruction algorithm, the electron holographic image of the magnetic structure can obtain a resolution of up to 1~2 nm.
data.target_sentence: According to the result of the phase reconstruction algorithm, the electron holographic image of the magnetic structure can obtain a resolution of up to 1~2 nm.

data.source_sentence: 전자 홀로그래피는 일반적으로 Fourier 변환 등의 위상 정보를 홀로그램에서 재구성하기 위한 알고리즘이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Electron holography generally requires an algorithm for reconstructing phase information such as a Fourier transform from a hologram.
data.target_sentence: Electron holography generally requires an algorithm for reconstructing phase information, such as a Fourier transform from a hologram.

data.source_sentence: Fig.5(b~d)는 전자 홀로그래피를 통해 관찰한 자기 위상 이미지에서 얻은 자기 유도맵이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 5(b~d) is a magnetic induction map obtained from a magnetic phase image observed through electron holography.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 5(b~d) is a magnetic induction map obtained from a magnetic phase image observed through electron holography.

data.source_sentence: 외부 자장과 온도의 환경에서 헬리칼 자기 구조(Fig. 5(b))와 자기 스커미온(Fig. 5(c~d))을 관찰할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 특히 고온열분해법(thermal decomposition)과 수열합성법(hydrothermal reaction)은 매우 간단하고 균일한 크기의 결정성을 갖는 안정한 상(phase)을 제조하기 위한 방법으로 많이 이용되고 있지만 대부분 나노입자들 간 반데르발스 인력(van der Waals force)에 의해서 쉽게 뭉쳐서(aggregation) 단분산(monodisperse)된 나노입자를 제조하는데 어려움이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, thermal decomposition and hydrothermal reaction are widely used as methods for producing a very simple and stable phase with uniform size crystallinity, but most of the van der Waals methods between nanoparticles It is difficult to prepare nanoparticles that are easily aggregated by van der Waals force and are monodispersed.
data.target_sentence: In particular, thermal decomposition and hydrothermal reaction are widely used as methods for producing a very simple and stable phase with uniform size crystallinity, but it is difficult to produce monodispersed nanoparticles as they are easily aggregated by van der Waals forces between most nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1과 같이 Fe(acac)3 전구체와 1-hexadecanol을 계면활성제로 이용하여 다양한 반응온도(250~300°C)에서 고온열분해법을 이용하여 단분산된 서로 다른 크기를 갖는 산화철 나노입자의 합성 및 생성 메커니즘(mechanism)이 보고된 바 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As shown in Figure 1, a synthesis and generation mechanism of iron oxide nanoparticles having different sizes monodispersed by high-temperature pyrolysis at various reaction temperatures (250 to 300°C) using a Fe(acac)3 precursor and 1-hexadecanol as surfactants has been reported.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Figure 1, a synthesis and generation mechanism of iron oxide nanoparticles having different sizes monodispersed by high-temperature pyrolysis at various reaction temperatures (250 to 300°C) using a Fe(acac)3 precursor and 1-hexadecanol as surfactants has been reported.

data.source_sentence: 이는 AAA가 보고한 300°C에서 합성한 산화철 나노입자의 결정립 크기의 직경 7.8 ± 0.6 nm과 비교시 온도증가에 따른 결정립의 크기가 증가한 것으로 사료된다.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 5 K의 낮은 온도에서 300 K까지 온도를 올리면 열적요동(thermal fluctuation)에 의해서 산화철 나노입자의 고정된(blocked) 자기화 방향이 풀리면서(unblocked) 외부자장에 따라 자기화 방향이 정렬되어 자화도값이 커지는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, when the temperature is raised from a low temperature of 5 K to 300 K, the blocked magnetization direction of the iron oxide nanoparticles is unblocked due to thermal fluctuations, and the magnetization direction is aligned according to the external magnetic field. It can be seen that the magnetization value increases.
data.target_sentence: In general, when the temperature is raised from a low temperature of 5 K to 300 K, the blocked magnetization direction of the iron oxide nanoparticles is unblocked due to thermal fluctuations, and the magnetization direction is aligned according to the external magnetic field, increasing the magnetization value.

data.source_sentence: PPMS를 이용하여 ZFC/FC을 외부자기장(H = 100 Oe)의 조건에서 측정한 결과 TB가 약 26 K 확인하였고 자기이력곡선을 통해 강자성 상태(5 K)와 초상자성 상태(300 K)에서 보자력(Hc)의 차이를 통해 초상자성 전이현상을 관찰하였다.

data.source_sentence: 위성이 재난감시, 원격탐사, 지도 시스템 구축, 통신 서비스 제공 등 여러 분야에서 널리 활용됨에 따라 위성에서 취득한 대용량 데이터를 신속히 지상으로 전송하기 위한 초고속ㆍ광대역 통신 시스템에 대한 요구가 증가하고 있다.

data.source_sentence: 무선 광통신 시스템은 radio frequency (RF) 통신 시스템과 달리 넓은 대역의 주파수 자원을 별도의 규제와 승인 없이 사용할 수 있고, 짧은 파장의 광 반송파를 사용하므로 위성 탑재체의 저전력화ㆍ소형화ㆍ경량화 실현이 상대적으로 용이하다.
data.mt_sentence: Unlike radio frequency (RF) communication systems, wireless optical communication systems can use wide-band frequency resources without separate regulations and approval, and use short-wavelength optical carriers, making it relatively easy to realize low power, miniaturization, and lightness of satellite payloads.
data.target_sentence: Unlike radio frequency (RF) communication systems, wireless optical communication systems can use wide-band frequency resources without separate regulations and approval, and use short-wavelength optical carriers, making it relatively easy to realize low power, miniaturization, and lightness of satellite payloads.

data.source_sentence: 더욱 빠른 전송 속도와 높은 보안성 등 여러 장점을 제공하기 때 문에 무선 광통신은 위성 통신뿐만 아니라 심우주 통신까지 다양한 우주 임무에 활용되기 시작하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Because it provides various advantages such as faster transmission speed and high security, wireless optical communication has begun to be used for various space missions, including not only satellite communication but also deep space communication.

data.source_sentence: 유럽중기예보센터(ECMWF)가 측정한 지난 10년간의 기상 데이터를 활용하였으며, 보다 정확한 가용성 예측을 위해 액체수함량 별 최대 개수밀도(number concentration)를 예상하여 광전력의 흡수 및 산란 손실을 보수적으로 계산하였다.

data.source_sentence: 이처럼 광학 사양을 동일하게 유지하고 조리개의 위치만 변경시킨 광학계 설계 결과, 광학계의 할당 공간과 광학적 성능을 고려할 때, M2에 조리개가 위치하는 것이 비축 삼반사 망원경에 적합함을 확인하였다.

data.source_sentence: 신티그래피 영상을 위한 방사성 의약품은 양질의 화질과 적은 피폭 선량을 방출하는 핵종이 요구되며, 이에 짧은 반감기의 감마선을 방출하는 99 mTc, 123I, 201Tl, 67Ga, 111In 등 이 많이 이용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Radiopharmaceuticals for scintigraphy images require high-quality image quality and nuclide that emits a small exposure dose, and 99 mTc, 123I, 201Tl, 67Ga, and 111In, which emit gamma rays with a short half-life, are widely used.
data.target_sentence: Radiopharmaceuticals for scintigraphy images require high-quality image qualities and nuclide that emits a small exposure dose, and 99 mTc, 123I, 201Tl, 67Ga, and 111In, which emit gamma rays with a short half-life, are widely used.

data.source_sentence: 일 광자 단층 촬영은 다방향 투사를 통해 검출된 감마선의 영상재구성을 이용하여 단면 영상을 획득하는 기법으로 주로 심근, 뇌 혈류 측정 등의 생리적 영상에 활용되고 있다(Fig. 2).
data.mt_sentence: One-photon tomography is a technique for acquiring cross-sectional images using image reconstruction of gamma rays detected through multidirectional projection, and is mainly used for physiological images such as myocardial and cerebral blood flow measurements (Fig. 2).
data.target_sentence: One-photon tomography is a technique for acquiring cross-sectional images using image reconstruction of gamma rays detected through multi-directional projection and is mainly used for physiological images such as myocardial and cerebral blood flow measurements (Fig. 2).

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 핵의학에서 영상 단층법이란 체내에 투여된 방사성의약품의 분포상태를 체 축과 수직인 여러 방향에서 측정하여 영상 재구성 기술을 통해 방사성 의약품 분포를 횡단면영상화하는 횡 단층법을 의미한다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, in nuclear medicine, imaging tomography refers to a cross-sectional tomography method in which the distribution of radioactive drugs administered in the body is measured in various directions perpendicular to the body axis and cross-sectional imaging of radioactive drugs through image reconstruction technology.
data.target_sentence: In general, in nuclear medicine, imaging tomography refers to a cross-sectional tomography method in which the distribution of radioactive drugs administered in the body is measured in various directions perpendicular to the body axis and cross-sectional imaging of radioactive drugs through image reconstruction technology.

data.source_sentence: 단층 영상은 감마카메라에서 획득한 단면 영상에서 선원의 깊이 정보를 제공하고 깊이에 따라 다르게 측정되는 방사선 에너지를 중첩하는 방식을 사용하여 감마카메라를 통해 획득된 영상보다 높은 해상도와 대조도를 가지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The tomographic image has higher resolution and contrast than the image obtained through the gamma camera by providing depth information of the source in the cross-sectional image acquired by the gamma camera and superimposing the radiation energy measured differently depending on the depth.
data.target_sentence: The tomographic image has higher resolution and contrast than the image obtained through the gamma camera by providing depth information of the source in the cross-sectional image acquired by the gamma camera and superimposing the radiation energy measured differently depending on the depth.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출 단층 촬영은 동시 계측 회로를 이용하여 원자핵에서 방출된 양전자가 주변 자유 전자를 만나 두 개의 감마선을 180o 방향으로 방출하는 소멸방사선(Annihilationradiation)을 측정한대서 기인된 검사법이다(Fig. 3).
data.mt_sentence: Positron emission tomography is a test method that uses a simultaneous measurement circuit to measure annihilation radiation in which positrons emitted from an atomic nucleus meet surrounding free electrons and emit two gamma rays in the 180o direction (Fig. 3).
data.target_sentence: Positron emission tomography is a test method that uses a simultaneous measurement circuit to measure annihilation radiation in which positrons emitted from an atomic nucleus meet surrounding free electrons and emit two gamma rays in the 180o direction (Fig. 3).

data.source_sentence: 질환에 따라 조직 또는 기관에서 발생하는 조직 세포 대사의 생리학 또는 생화학적 변화를 진단 정보로 제공하여 질병의 메커니즘 및 치료 효과를 평가할 수도 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Depending on the disease, physiological or biochemical changes in tissue cell metabolism occurring in a tissue or organ may be provided as diagnostic information to evaluate disease mechanisms and therapeutic effects.
data.target_sentence: Depending on the disease, physiological or biochemical changes in tissue cell metabolism occurring in a tissue or organ may be provided as diagnostic information to evaluate disease mechanisms and therapeutic effects.

data.source_sentence: 양전자방출 핵종은 수소 하전 입자를 사이클로트론의 원형 진공관 내에서 가속시킴으로써 수소 하전 입자에 운동에너지를 가한 높은 에너지(8 Mev 이상)의 양성자를 표적 물질에 조사하여 핵 반응을 통해 얻을 수 있다(Fig. 4).
data.mt_sentence: Positron-emitting nuclides can be obtained through a nuclear reaction by irradiating high-energy (8 Mev or more) protons to a target material by accelerating hydrogen-charged particles in a circular vacuum tube of a cyclotron, applying kinetic energy to hydrogen-charged particles (Fig. 4). ).
data.target_sentence: Positron-emitting nuclides can be obtained through a nuclear reaction by irradiating high-energy (8 Mev or more) protons to a target material by accelerating hydrogen-charged particles in a circular vacuum tube of a cyclotron, applying kinetic energy to hydrogen-charged particles (Fig. 4).

data.source_sentence: 동시계수 회로는 시간 정보를 근거로 한 번의 양전자 소멸에 의해 방출된 소멸 방사선의 유∙무를 판정하여 양쪽의 검출기로부터 동일한 시간에 펄스가 입력되었을 때를 출력 신호로 발생한다.
data.mt_sentence: Simultaneous counting circuit determines the presence or absence of extinction radiation emitted by one positron annihilation based on time information, and generates an output signal when pulses are input at the same time from both detectors.
data.target_sentence: A simultaneous counting circuit determines the presence or absence of extinction radiation emitted by one positron annihilation based on time information and generates an output signal when pulses are input at the same time from both detectors.

data.source_sentence: 동시계수 회로의 정보를 바탕으로 2개의 동시계수가 된 방사선을 이용하여 동시계수선을 구하고, 그 각도와 시야 중심에서 거리를 활용하여 데이터를 작성한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the information of the simultaneous coefficient circuit, a simultaneous coefficient line is obtained using two simultaneous coefficients of radiation, and data are prepared using the angle and the distance from the center of view.
data.target_sentence: Based on the information of the simultaneous coefficient circuit, a simultaneous coefficient line is obtained using two simultaneous coefficients of radiation, and data are prepared using the angle and the distance from the center of view.

data.source_sentence: 사용된 데이터를 투영 데이터라고 하며 각 각도, 거리별로 동시계수 수를 합산한 것이 양전자 단층 촬영 영상 재구성 데이터가 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The data used is called projection data, and the sum of the number of simultaneous coefficients for each angle and distance becomes positron tomography image reconstruction data.
data.target_sentence: The data used is called projection data, and the sum of the number of simultaneous coefficients for each angle and distance becomes positron tomography image reconstruction data.

data.source_sentence: 투영 데이터는 양전자 단층 촬영 영상 재구성 수행을 위해 감도 보정과 흡수 보정, 우발동시계수 보정, 산란 보정, 계수손실보정, 방사능 감약 보정 등을 이용하여 보정된다.
data.mt_sentence: Projection data are corrected using sensitivity correction and absorption correction, accidental simultaneous coefficient correction, scattering correction, coefficient loss correction, and radioactivity reduction correction to perform positron tomography image reconstruction.
data.target_sentence: Projection data are corrected using sensitivity correction and absorption correction, accidental simultaneous coefficient correction, scattering correction, coefficient loss correction, and radioactivity reduction correction to perform positron tomography image reconstruction.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 영상 재구성에서는 중첩 적분법(Convolutionback projection method)을 수행하며, 이는 투영 데이터에 보정 함수를 중첩 적분하여 역 투영하는 방법으로 조작이 간단하고 재구성이 빠른 특징이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, in image reconstruction, a convolutionback projection method is performed, which is a method of superimposing and integrating a correction function on projection data and inversely projecting it.
data.target_sentence: In general, in image reconstruction, a convolution back projection method is performed, which is a method of superimposing and integrating a correction function on projection data and inversely projecting it.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영 영상은 감마카메라나 단일 광자 단층 촬영 영상에 비해 재현성이 우수하며 영상 내 정량적 정보와 방사능 농도와의 사이에 비례 관계를 표현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Positron tomography images have superior reproducibility compared to gamma cameras or single photon tomography images, and can express a proportional relationship between quantitative information in the image and radioactivity concentration.
data.target_sentence: Positron tomography images have superior reproducibility compared to gamma cameras or single photon tomography images, and can express a proportional relations between quantitative information in the image and radioactivity concentration.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영 영상의 부족한 해부학적 정보 제공은 국소 종양 진단의 어려움이 발생시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Insufficient anatomical information provided by positron tomography images may cause difficulties in diagnosing local tumors.
data.target_sentence: Insufficient anatomical information provided by positron tomography images may cause difficulties in diagnosing local tumors.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영과 전산화 단층 촬영은 각각 기존 임상에서 많이 사용되고 있으나, 두 기법을 통한 융합 영상 획득을 통해 더욱 정밀한 영상을 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Positron tomography and computed tomography are each widely used in existing clinical trials, but more precise images can be provided through fusion image acquisition through the two techniques.
data.target_sentence: Positron tomography and computed tomography are each widely used in existing clinical trials, but more precise images can be provided through fusion image acquisition through the two techniques.

data.source_sentence: 감마선을 이용하는 양전자 단층 촬영은 감마선을 가시광선으로 변환시켜주는 섬광체와 변환된 가시광선을 전기 신호로 변환시켜주는 광전 소자(photoelectric element)를 결합한 검출기를 통해 데이터를 획득한다.
data.mt_sentence: Positron tomography using gamma rays acquires data through a detector that combines a scintillator that converts gamma rays into visible light and a photoelectric element that converts the converted visible light into an electrical signal.
data.target_sentence: Positron tomography using gamma rays acquires data through a detector that combines a scintillator that converts gamma rays into visible light and a photoelectric element that converts the converted visible light into an electrical signal.

data.source_sentence: 대조도 분해능을 가지고 있으나 공간 분해능이 매우 떨어지는 영상이 제공된다.
data.mt_sentence: An image with contrast resolution but very poor spatial resolution is provided.
data.target_sentence: A video with contrast resolution but very poor spatial resolution is provided.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 단층 촬영만을 독립적으로 수행할 경우 전산화 단층 촬영 영상에 비해 5~6배 정도 우수한 공간 분해능을 갖는 영상을 획득할 수 있으나, 낮은 대조도 분해능으로 단독으로 병변 식별이 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: When only positron tomography is performed independently, images with 5 to 6 times better spatial resolution than computed tomography can be obtained, but lesion identification alone is difficult due to low contrast resolution.
data.target_sentence: When only positron tomography is performed independently, images with 5 to 6 times better spatial resolution than computed tomography can be obtained, but lesion identification alone is difficult due to low contrast resolution.

data.source_sentence: 이유로 두 기법을 융합하여 만들어진 하나의 융합 영상은 대조도 조절의 측면에서도 자유롭기 때문에 동일한 병변에 대한 여러 측면의 검토를 쉽게 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, a single fusion image created by fusion of two techniques can easily provide a review of multiple aspects of the same lesion because it is free from the aspect of contrast control.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, a single fusion image created by fusion of two techniques can easily provide a review of multiple aspects of the same lesion because it is free from the aspect of contrast control.

data.source_sentence: 분자 영상의 특성상 제공할 수 있는 영상 내 모든 정보를 정량적 수치로 제공하여 질병의 유무를 판단하기 때문에 영상의 진단적 가치를 높이며 의료 영상 분야에서 중요도가 높아지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Due to the nature of molecular imaging, all information within an image that can be provided is provided as a quantitative value to determine the presence or absence of a disease, thereby increasing the diagnostic value of the image and increasing its importance in the field of medical imaging.
data.target_sentence: Due to the nature of molecular imaging, all information within an image that can be provided is provided as a quantitative value to determine the presence or absence of a disease, thereby increasing the diagnostic value of the image and increasing its importance in the field of medical imaging.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출 단층촬영-자기 공명 영상은 기존 자기 공명 영상과 양전자 단층촬영의 분리된 검사에 비해 검사 시간을 단축하고 검사의 효율성을 높여 진단과 치료에 큰 발전을 가져왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging has brought great advances in diagnosis and treatment by shortening the examination time and increasing the efficiency of the examination compared to the separate examinations of conventional magnetic resonance imaging and positron tomography.
data.target_sentence: Positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging has brought significant advances in diagnosis and treatment by shortening the examination time and increasing the efficiency of the examination compared to the separate tests of conventional magnetic resonance imaging and positron tomography.

data.source_sentence: 더불어 광전자 증배관과 같은 소자는 강한 자장 내에서 동작할 수 없으므로 양전자단층 촬영을 자기 공명 영상 내에서 사용하는 부분에서 호환성의 문제가 발생하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In addition, since devices such as photomultiplier tubes cannot operate within a strong magnetic field, compatibility problems occurred in the part where positron tomography is used in magnetic resonance images.
data.target_sentence: In addition, since devices such as photomultiplier tubes cannot operate within a strong magnetic field, compatibility problems occurred in the part where positron tomography is used in magnetic resonance images.

data.source_sentence: 초기 개발 시, 자기 공명 영상 장치에서 양전자 단층 촬영 장치 동작의 영향을 최소화하기 위해 철과 같은 자기 투자율(Magnetic Permeability)이 높은 물질로 표류 자기장(Stray Magnetic Field)을 차폐하는 방식의 수동 차폐(passive shielding)기술이 제시되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In early development, passive shielding technology, which shields a stray magnetic field with a material with high magnetic permeability such as iron, is presented to minimize the effect of positron tomography device behavior in magnetic resonance imaging devices.
data.target_sentence: In early development, passive shielding technology, which shields a stray magnetic field with a material with high magnetic permeability, such as iron, is presented to minimize the effect of positron tomography device behavior in magnetic resonance imaging devices.

data.source_sentence: 이후 능동 차폐(active shield) 기술을 추가하여 표류 자기장을 더욱 최소화하여 양전자 방출-전산화 단층 촬영과 동일한 수준의 양전자단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상으로 발전시켜왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Since then, positron emission-computed tomography and positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging have been developed to the same level as positron emission-computed tomography by further minimizing the stray magnetic field by adding active shielding technology.
data.target_sentence: Since then, positron emission-computed tomography and positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging have been developed to the same level as positron emission-computed tomography by further minimizing the stray magnetic field by adding active shielding technology.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 기존의 다양한 영상 획득 방법들을 보존하고 초 고자장 환경유지를 가능하게 하는 새로운 기술이 등장하게 된 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Through this, a new technology has emerged that preserves various existing image acquisition methods and enables the maintenance of an ultra-high magnetic field environment.
data.target_sentence: Through this, new technology has emerged that preserves various existing image acquisition methods and enables the maintenance of an ultra-high magnetic field environment.

data.source_sentence: 공간적 일치를 이룬 융합 영상 제공은 가능하나 동 시간대 영상 획득의 어려움이 남게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is possible to provide a spatially matched fusion image, but it remains difficult to acquire an image at the same time.
data.target_sentence: It is possible to provide a spatially matched fusion image, but it remains difficult to acquire an image at the same time.

data.source_sentence: 동 시간대의 영상획득을 위한 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상 구성을 위해서는 자기 공명 영상 획득이 진행하면서 양전자 단층 촬영의 광전자 증배관의 작동이 동시에 이뤄져야만 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to construct a positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance image for image acquisition at the same time, the photomultiplier tube of positron tomography must be operated simultaneously while magnetic resonance image acquisition proceeds.
data.target_sentence: In order to construct a positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance image for image acquisition at the same time, the photomultiplier tube of positron tomography must be operated simultaneously while magnetic resonance image acquisition proceeds.

data.source_sentence: 최근 초 고자장 내에서 이러한 환경 유지가 가능하도록 광전자 증배관의 역할을 대신할 수 있는 반도체형 광전소자(Avalanchephotodiode, APD)가 개발되어 동 시간대의 영상 획득이 가능한 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상이 개발되기도 하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, a semiconductor-type photoelectric device (Avalanchephotodiode, APD) that can replace the role of a photomultiplier tube has been developed to maintain such an environment in an ultra-high magnetic field, and positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging that can acquire images at the same time period was also developed.
data.target_sentence: Recently, a semiconductor-type photoelectric device (Avalanche photodiode, APD) that can replace the role of a photomultiplier tube has been developed to maintain such an environment in an ultra-high magnetic field, and positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging that can acquire images at the same time period was also developed.

data.source_sentence: 이는 반도체형 광전 소자가 자기 공명 영상 내에서 직접 섬광체에 부착되어 광 섬유를 통해 두 장치의 호환성을 높이는 방식으로 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상 기술의 정교성을 높여주었다.
data.mt_sentence: This improved the sophistication of the positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging technique in such a way that a semiconductor-type optoelectronic device was attached to the scintillator directly within the magnetic resonance image to increase the compatibility of the two devices through optical fibers.
data.target_sentence: This improved the sophistication of the positron emission tomography-magnetic resonance imaging technique in such a way that a semiconductor-type optoelectronic device was attached to the scintillator directly within the magnetic resonance image to increase the compatibility of the two devices through optical fibers.

data.source_sentence: 이후 더 나은 반도체형 광전소자의 발전으로 광전자 증배관 수준의 광 증폭이 가능한 실리콘형 광전자 증배관(Silicon Photomultiplier, SiPM)과 디지털 실리콘 형 광전자 증배관(Digital SiPM)이 개발되어 온전한 디지털 양전자 단층 촬영 기술 개발도 이루어지고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since then, with the development of better semiconductor-type optoelectronic devices, a silicon-type photomultiplier (SiPM) and a digital silicon-type photomultiplier tube (Digital SiPM) that can amplify the level of light at the level of a photomultiplier tube were developed, and a complete digital positron tomography technology was developed. Development is also taking place.
data.target_sentence: Since then, with the development of better semiconductor-type optoelectronic devices, a silicon-type photomultiplier (SiPM) and a digital silicon-type photomultiplier tube (Digital SiPM) that can amplify the level of light at the level of a photomultiplier tube were developed, and the development of a comprehensive digital positron tomography technology is also taking place.

data.source_sentence: 양전자 방출 단층 촬영-자기 공명 영상의 정확한 영상 제공을 위해서는 자기 공명 영상의 균일한 자기장 및 경사 자장의 선형성을 통한 영상의 위치 정보 제공이 매우 필수적이다.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구팀의 선행 연구에서는 주로 양자점 필름의 배치 혹은 양자점의 농도에 의한 효과를 다루었다면, 본 연구에서는 양자점이 부착되는 투광부(확산판)의 투과도 및 양자점의 농도 변화에 의한 조명 특성의 변화를 다룬다.
data.mt_sentence: Whereas previous studies of this research team dealt mainly with the effect caused by the placement of quantum dot films or the concentration of quantum dots, this study deals with changes in lighting characteristics due to changes in the transmittance and concentration of quantum dots and the transmittance of the light-transmitting part (diffuser plate) to which quantum dots are attached. .

data.source_sentence: 이는 본 조명에 사용한 확산판의 확산 효과가 두께에 무관하게 충분히 커서 다양한 파장의 빛을 효율적으로 섞음으로써 시야각에 따른 광경로 차이를 효과적으로 상쇄시켰음을 의미한다.

data.source_sentence: BBB 연구소 AAA 박사에 의하여 제안된 스핀 분극전류 인가 자구벽 이동(spin-polarized current induced magneticdomain wall motion)은 기존 휘발성 메모리의 한계를 극복하고 자구벽이라는 비휘발성 소재를 사용함으로써 소모 전력을 획기적으로 줄이는 것이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin-polarized current induced magnetic domain wall motion proposed by Dr. AAA of BBB Research Institute overcomes the limitations of the existing volatile memory and dramatically reduces power consumption by using a non-volatile material called a magnetic domain wall. It is possible.
data.target_sentence: The spin-polarized current induced magnetic domain wall motion proposed by Dr. AAA of BBB Research Institute overcomes the limitations of the existing volatile memory and dramatically reduces power consumption by using a non-volatile material called a magnetic domain wall.

data.source_sentence: 뿐만 아니라 상기 두 가지 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용(spin-orbit interaction) 기반 효과들로도 해석이 불가능한 현상들이 보고되었고, 최근에 강한 스핀-궤도 상호작용을 가지는 자성 다층 박막에서 쟐로쉰스키-모리야 상호작용(Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction)이 크게 기여한다는 사실이 밝혀졌다.
