data.source_sentence: 외부 자기장이 가해졌을 때 자기장과 자기 나노 입자 사이의 힘과, 자기 나노 입자 사이에서 발생하는 힘에 의해 3차원 네트워크 구조의 부피 또는 모양이 마이크로 및 매크로 수준으로 변화한다.
data.mt_sentence: When an external magnetic field is applied, the volume or shape of the three-dimensional network structure changes at the micro and macro level by the force between the magnetic field and the magnetic nanoparticles and the force generated between the magnetic nanoparticles.
data.target_sentence: When an external magnetic field is applied, the volume or shape of the three-dimensional network structure changes at the micro and macro level by force between the magnetic field and the magnetic nanoparticles and the force generated between the magnetic nanoparticles.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문은 자기 반응성 스마트 하이드로겔의 제작 원리 및방법, 성능, 마이크로 로봇의 특성 및 응용에 대해 서술한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper describes the fabrication principles and methods, performance, and characteristics and applications of micro-robots.
data.target_sentence: This paper describes the fabrication principles and methods, performance, and characteristics and applications of microrobots.

data.source_sentence: “열 특성” 방식은 하이드로겔의 3차원 네트워크 구조 내부에 자기 나노 입자를 혼합한 뒤, 고주파 교류자기장으로 나노 입자를 발열시켜 하이드로겔의 팽윤 및 탈팽윤 거동을 제어한다.
data.mt_sentence: The “thermal properties” method controls the swelling and de-swelling behavior of the hydrogel by mixing magnetic nanoparticles inside the three-dimensional network structure of the hydrogel, and then heating the nanoparticles with a high-frequency alternating magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The “thermal properties” method controls the swelling and de-swelling behavior of the hydrogel by mixing magnetic nanoparticles inside the three-dimensional network structure of the hydrogel and then heating the nanoparticles with a high-frequency alternating magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 자기 반응성 스마트 하이드로겔의 합성법은 물리적 혼합법(Blending method), 침전법(In-situ precipitation method), 그라프팅 공중법(Grafting-Onto method)이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The self-reactive smart hydrogel synthesis method includes a physical mixing method, a precipitation method, and a grafting-onto method.
data.target_sentence: Synthesis of self-reactive smart hydrogels includes a physical blending method, an in-situ precipitation method, and a grafting-onto method.

data.source_sentence: 다양한 실험 조건에서 얻은 하이드로겔의 그래프트율을 조사한 결과 단량체의 약 95%가 무기 물질에 그래프트되어 높은 기계적 안정성과 자성을 갖는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of examining the graft rate of the hydrogel obtained under various experimental conditions, it was confirmed that about 95% of the monomer was grafted to the inorganic material, thereby having high mechanical stability and magnetism.
data.target_sentence: As a result of examining the graft rate of the hydrogel obtained under various experimental conditions, it was confirmed that about 95% of the monomer was grafted to the inorganic material, thereby having high mechanical stability and magnetism.

data.source_sentence: 실험 결과를 통해 자성 하이드로겔의 팽윤율이 비자성 하이드로겔보다 더 높아지는 것과 나노 입자의 함유량이 일정 수준 이상 증가하면 오히려 팽윤율이 감소하는 것을 확인하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The experimental results confirmed that the swelling rate of the magnetic hydrogel is higher than that of the non-magnetic hydrogel and that the swelling rate decreases when the content of the nanoparticles increases by a certain level or more.
data.target_sentence: The experimental results confirmed that the swelling rate of the magnetic hydrogel is higher than that of the nonmagnetic hydrogel and that the swelling rate decreases when the content of the nanoparticles increases by a certain level or more.

data.source_sentence: 자기 하이 드로겔의 미세 구조와 생체 적합 특성은 세포 배양에 적합한 환경을 제공하며, 외부 자기장을 인가해 세포에 자극을 주어 증식을 촉진시킬 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The microstructure and biocompatibility properties of the magnetic hydrogel provide an environment suitable for cell culture, and can stimulate cells by applying an external magnetic field to promote proliferation.
data.target_sentence: The microstructure and biocompatibility properties of the magnetic hydrogel provide an environment suitable for cell culture and stimulate cells by applying an external magnetic field to promote proliferation.

data.source_sentence: 하이드로겔 구조와 공유 결합하여 기본 섬유아세포 성장 인자(bFGF), 베타 신경 성장인자 또는 교세포 신경 성장 인자(GDNF) 등을 제공할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be covalently combined with hydrogel structures to provide basic fibroblast growth factors (bFGF), beta neural growth factors, or glioblast neural growth factors (GDNF).
data.target_sentence: It can be covalently combined with hydrogel structures to provide basic fibroblast growth factors (bFGF), beta neural growth factors, or glioblast neural growth factors (GDNF).

data.source_sentence: GO-Fe3O4는 근적외선과 고주파 교류 자기장에 의해 발열되며, 이때 발생한 열은 PNIPAM 하이드로겔의 탈팽윤을 유도해 약물 방출을 가속화한다.
data.mt_sentence: GO-Fe3O4 is heated by near-infrared and high-frequency alternating magnetic fields, and the generated heat induces de-swelling of the PNIPAM hydrogel, accelerating drug release.
data.target_sentence: GO-Fe3O4 is heated by near-infrared and high-frequency alternating magnetic fields, and the generated heat induces deswelling of the PNIPAM hydrogel, accelerating drug release.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 제안한 방법이 볼록 비구면의 전체 영역을 정밀하게 측정하는 데 유용함을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: The method proposed in this study was found to be useful in precisely measuring the entire area of a convex aspherical surface.
data.target_sentence: The method proposed in this study was found to be useful in precisely measuring the entire area of a convex aspherical surface.

data.source_sentence: 볼록한 형태의 부경은 간섭계에서 출사한 빛을 반사시킨 후 빛을 넓게 퍼트리기 때문에 주경에 비해 크기가 작아도 측정은 더 어려운 경우가 많다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the convex sub-mirror reflects the light emitted from the interferometer and spreads the light widely, it is often more difficult to measure even though the size is smaller than the main mirror.

data.source_sentence: 특히 볼록 비구면경 측정을 위한 정합법 연구에 관해서는 BBB 대학교에서 직경 1.4 m 비축 볼록비구면경을 측정하기 위해 피조 간섭계를 구성하고 정합법을 적용한 결과가 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: In particular, regarding the study of the matching method for measuring the convex aspheric mirror, it was reported that the result of applying the matching method after constructing a constructive interferometer to measure the 1.4 m diameter off-axis convex aspheric mirror was reported at the University of Arizona.

data.source_sentence: 논문의 2장에서는 본 논문에서 제안하는 측정 방법을 설명하고 3장에서 시뮬레이션을 통하여 제안한 방법의 측정정밀도를 확인한다.

data.source_sentence: 이 세 가지 오차를 모두 보정한 후 부분 개구들의 좌표를 맞추어 정합하면 고리 영역에 대한 정보를 획득할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 고리 영역 측정은 기존의 힌들 방법에 정합법을 적용하여 작은 크기의 기준 구면으로 측정이 가능하도록 하였으며 가운데 영역은 간섭계의 구면파를 이용하여 직접 측정한 후 초점벗어남 오차와 구면수차를 제거하여 비구면 형상을 구하였다.

data.source_sentence: 적외선 대역에서 그래핀은 에너지 밴드 내 전자천이에 의해 흡수 및 투과/반사 특성이 변화하므로, 그래핀의 EF나 층수에 따라 입사된 적외선의 반사도와 투과도를 용이하게 조절할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 식 (1)의 오른쪽 첫째 항은 식 (2)로 표현되며 대역 내(intraband) 전자-광자 산란에 의한 기여도를 나타내고, 식 (1)의 오른쪽 두번째 항은 식 (3)으로 표현되며 대역 간(interband) 전자 전이의 기여도를 나타낸다.
data.mt_sentence: The first term on the right of Equation (1) is expressed as Equation (2) and represents the contribution due to intraband electron-photon scattering, and the second term from the right of Equation (1) is expressed as Equation (3), and the interband ( interband) represents the contribution of electron transition.

data.source_sentence: 중적외선 및 원적외선 영역의 광이 입사되는 경우 인가된 전압에 의한 그래핀의 EF 변화는 그래핀 내 전하밀도의 변화를 유도하게 되며, 대역 내 광전도도는 Drude 가중치에 비례하여 변화하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: Where light is incident in the mid-infrared and far-infrared regions, EF change of graphene by the applied voltage induces a change of charge density in graphene, and the optical conductivity in the band changes in proportion to Drude's weight.
data.target_sentence: Where light is incident in the mid-infrared and far-infrared regions, EF change of graphene by the applied voltage induces a change of charge density in graphene and the optical conductivity in the band changes in proportion to Drude's weight.

data.source_sentence: 다층 그래핀이 유리 기판에 놓인 경우, 공기/다층 그래핀/유리기판에 의한 반사도와 공기/유리 기판의 반사도의 대비비가 매우 높으므로, 유리 기판 위에 다층 그래핀을 FZP로 형성한 반사형 프레넬 렌즈를 구현할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the multilayer graphene is placed on the glass substrate, the contrast ratio between the reflectivity of the air/multilayer graphene/glass substrate and the reflectivity of the air/glass substrate is very high, and thus a reflective Fresnel lens in which the multilayer graphene is formed of FZP on the glass substrate may be implemented.
data.target_sentence: When the multilayer graphene is placed on the glass substrate, the contrast ratio between the reflectivity of the air/multilayer graphene/glass substrate and the reflectivity of the air/glass substrate is very high, and thus a reflective Fresnel lens in which the multilayer graphene is formed of FZP on the glass substrate may be implemented.

data.source_sentence: 먼저 유리 기판 위에 전사된 다층 그래핀(7층)을 광식각(photolithography) 공정으로 FZP 형태의 패턴을 형성한 후, 단일층 그래핀을 전면에 전사함으로써 FZP의 홀수 번째 환에는 다층 그래핀(8층)이 놓이고, 짝수 번째 환에는 단일층 그래핀이 놓이게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: First, a multilayer graphene (7 layers) transferred on a glass substrate is formed using a photolithography process to form a FZP-type pattern, and then single layer graphene is transferred to the entire surface of the multilayer graphene (8 layers) on the odd-numbered ring of FZP. layer), and single-layer graphene is placed on the even-numbered ring.
data.target_sentence: First, multilayer graphene (7 layers) transferred on a glass substrate is formed to form an FZP-type pattern using a photolithography process and then single layer graphene is transferred to the entire surface so that the odd-numbered ring of FZP is placed on the multilayer graphene (8 layers), and single-layer graphene is placed on the even-numbered ring.

data.source_sentence: 전극으로 사용되는 단일층 그래핀의 반사도와 다층 그래핀이 놓인 영역의 반사도 대비비에 따른 반사형 FZP 렌즈의 초점 집속 성능을 정량화하기 위해서 finite-difference time-domain 방법을 사용하여 광학 전산모사를 진행하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to quantify the focusing performance of the reflective FZP lens according to the contrast ratio of the reflectivity of the single-layer graphene used as an electrode and the reflectivity of the region where the multi-layer graphene is placed, optical simulations were performed using the finite-difference time-domain method. did.
data.target_sentence: To quantify the focusing performance of the reflective FZP lens according to the contrast ratio of the reflectivity of the single-layer graphene used as an electrode and the reflectivity of the region where the multi-layer graphene is placed, optical simulations were performed using the finite-difference time-domain method.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 환의 수를 증가시키면 초점 집속 세기가 증가되는데, 제작 공정을 고려하여 환의 수를 적절히 선택하여 사용할 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 상측 수치구경(numeri-cal aperture, NA), 주광선의 입사각, 입사동의 반직경과 같은 설계 변수는 물리적 차원을 가지면서 광학 사양을 직접 나타나는 스케일 변수이며, 이들은 사양을 규정하지만 결상의 특성과는 무관하다.
data.mt_sentence: Design variables such as numerical aperture (NA), angle of incidence of chief ray, and radius of entrance pupil are scale variables that have physical dimensions and directly express optical specifications. do.
data.target_sentence: Design variables such as numerical aperture (NA), angle of incidence of chief ray, and radius of entrance pupil are scale variables that have physical dimensions and directly express optical specifications.

data.source_sentence: 광학 면의 결상에서 물리적 차원이 없는 구조변수로는 물체 측과 상측 매질의 굴절률 (n, n’)과 분산(δn, δn’), 면의 횡 배율 m과 주광선의 각배율 −p가 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Structural variables without physical dimensions in the imaging of the optical plane include refractive indices (n, n') and variance (,n, ),n') of the object side and the top medium, transverse magnification m of the plane, and angular magnification -p of the main ray.

data.source_sentence: 면의 결상에서 스케일 변수는 여러 가지 조합이 가능하나 이 연구에서는 주변 광선이 면에 입사하는 높이 h와 상측 NA a’(= n’u’), 주광선의 물체 측 NA −a(= n−u)를 사용하였다.

data.source_sentence: 광학계의 설계 변수를 구조변수와 스케일 변수로 분리하고, 모든 스케일 변수를 1로 정규화하고 구조변수만으로 파면수차를 계산하면 이 파면수차는 광학 사양과 무관하게 광학계의 구조적 특성에만 의존하는 파면수차가 되며, 여기에서는 이를 정규화된 파면수차라고 부르고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: If the design variables of the optical system are separated into structural variables and scale variables, all scale variables are normalized to 1, and wavefront aberration is calculated using only the structural variables, this wavefront aberration becomes a wavefront aberration that depends only on the structural characteristics of the optical system regardless of optical specifications. , we will call this normalized wavefront aberration here.
data.target_sentence: If the design variables of the optical system are separated into structural variables and scale variables, all scale variables are normalized to 1, and wavefront aberration is calculated using only the structural variables, this wavefront aberration becomes a wavefront aberration that depends only on the structural characteristics of the optical system regardless of optical specifications, we will call it normalized wavefront aberration here.

data.source_sentence: 이 연구에서는 구조변수만을 사용하여 정규화된 3차 파면수차를 해석적으로 유도하고, 이 수차가 실제 광학계의 수차가 되도록 스케일해주는 scale factor를 정의하였다.
data.mt_sentence: This study defined a scale factor that induces a normalized tertiary wavefront aberration analytically using only structural variables and scales this aberration to become an aberration of the actual optical system.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 광학면의 횡 배율을 변수로 사용하여 광학계의 3차수차를 해석적으로 보정하는 방법은 설계 변수가 비교적 적은 반사광학계의 초기설계에서 이미 널리 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As described above, the method of analytically correcting the tertiary aberration of the optical system using the transverse magnification of the optical surface as a variable is already widely used in the initial design of the reflective optical system with relatively few design parameters.

data.source_sentence: 1972년 AAA는 원추곡면 3반사광학계의 3차 수차를 물체의 횡 배율과 동의 횡 배율로 표현하고, 이를 이용하여 구면수차, 코마, 비점수차, 상면만곡이 보정된 해를 얻는 방법을 제시한 바 있다.

data.source_sentence: 그림 1은 물체 측 매질의 굴절률이 n, 상측 매질의 굴절률이 n’이고 곡률반경이 r인 광학 면에서 물체 h가 상 h’로 결상하고, 입사동 −h가 출사동 −h’으로 결상하는 것을 보여주고 있다.

data.source_sentence: Wide-angle triplet은 광시야를 목적으로 하는 설계이며, 조리개도 렌즈 후방에 위치하여 다른 설계와는 다르고, 첫 번째 볼록렌즈와 두 번째 오목렌즈에 분산은 크지만 고굴절의 소재를 사용하고 있다(표 8).

In this study, the scale variables of the optical system used the diameter of the incident, the upper diameter of the surrounding light, and the object-side diameter of the main light.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 국내에서 시판되고 있는 유도가열 조리기 주변의 다양한 위치에서 자기장을 측정하고 EMF 인체보호 기준의 기준레벨 노출 제한값과 비교하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, magnetic fields were measured at various locations around induction heating cookers commercially available in Korea and compared with the reference level exposure limit value of the EMF human protection standard.

data.mt_sentence: In this paper, harmonic waves are ignored in magnetic field measurement and equivalent source modeling, and only the influence of fundamental waves is considered.

data.source_sentence: Worst-case 노출 상황을 고려하여 측면 거리 d = 10 cm에서 측정한 자속밀도는 인체보호 기준을 초과하는 것으로 나타났으나 이러한 노출상황은 극히 제한적이며 대부분의 실제 사용환경에서는 자속밀도 기준레벨을 만족하는 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the Worst-case exposure situation, the magnetic flux density measured at the lateral distance d = 10 cm exceeded the human protection standard, but this exposure situation is extremely limited and the magnetic flux density reference level is satisfied in most practical environments.
data.target_sentence: Considering the worst-case exposure situation, the magnetic flux density measured at the lateral distance d = 10 cm exceeded the human protection standard, but this exposure situation is extremely limited, and the magnetic flux density reference level is satisfied in most practical environments.

data.source_sentence: 유도가열 조리기의 등가 소스를 원형 코일로 가정할 경우 Fig. 3에 나타낸 원형 코일에 의한 측정점 p에서의 자속밀도는 r >> r' 일 경우자기 쌍극자 모멘트로부터 다음과 같이 근사할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Assuming that the equivalent source of the induction heating cooker is a circular coil, the magnetic flux density at the measuring point p by the circular coil shown in Fig. 3 can be approximated from the magnetic dipole moment if r >> r'.
data.target_sentence: Assuming that the equivalent source of the induction heating cooker is a circular coil, the magnetic flux density at the measuring point p by the circular coil shown in Fig. 3 can be approximated from the magnetic dipole moment if r >> r'.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 μ0는 자유공간 투자율, r은 코일 중심으로부터 측정점 p까지의 거리, θ는 z축의 양의 방향으로부터 코일 중심과 p가 이루는 직선까지의 각 ar, aθ는 각각 r과 θ방향의 단위벡터이다(Fig. 3).
data.mt_sentence: Where μ0 is the free space permeability, r is the distance from the coil center to the measurement point p, θ is the angle ar from the positive direction of the z-axis to the straight line between the coil center and p, and aθ is the unit vector in the r and θ directions, respectively ( Fig. 3).
data.target_sentence: Here, μ0 is the free space permeability, r is the distance from the coil center to the measurement point p, θ is the angle ar from the positive direction of the z-axis to the straight line between the coil center and p, and aθ is the unit vector in the r and θ directions, respectively (Fig. 3).

data.source_sentence: 축 대칭 모델링을 이용하여 총 10개의 원형 코일로 등가 소스를 모델링하였으며 코일의 중심으로부터 반지름 r'i는 10개의 코일에 대해 1 cm부터 10cm까지 1 cm 간격으로 설정하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The equivalent source was modeled with a total of 10 circular coils using axisymmetric modeling, and the radius r'i from the center of the coil was set at 1 cm intervals from 1 cm to 10 cm for 10 coils.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 차폐 재료와 조리 용기 등 강자성체를 고려할 수 있는 전자기장 해석 소프트웨어에서는 조직별로 세분화된 해부학적 인체 모델의 적용이 어렵기 때문에 균일하거나 간략화한 조직분포를 가진 등가 인체 모델을 사용해야 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, electromagnetic field analysis software that can consider ferromagnetic materials such as shielding materials and cooking containers is difficult to apply anatomical human models subdivided by tissue, so equivalent human models with uniform or simplified tissue distribution should be used.
data.target_sentence: In general, electromagnetic field analysis software that can consider ferromagnetic materials such as shielding materials and cooking containers is difficult to apply anatomical human models subdivided by tissue, so equivalent human models with uniform or simplified tissue distribution should be used.

data.mt_sentence: When calculating the human-induced current density through numerical analysis simulation, the maximum value of the human-induced current density for each organization can vary significantly depending on the type of simulation software or the size or quality of the element network used to divide the human model.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 인체의 주요 조직과 기관별로 유도전류밀도 데이터를 추출하고 99 백분위수를 계산해 노출량 평가에 이용하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, induced current density data were extracted for each major tissue and organ of the human body, and the 99th percentile was calculated and used for exposure evaluation.

data.source_sentence: 인체전류밀도의 노출지수는 자속밀도의 노출지수와 마찬가지로 ICNIRP 1998 인체보호기준에서 지정하고 있는 일반인의 유도전류밀도 기본 한계 노출 제한값(28 kHz에서 J = 56 mA/m2)대비 실제 계산된 유도전류밀도의 비율을 나타낸다.

data.source_sentence: 주요 조직 중에서는 등가 코일에 가까운 방광이 유도전류밀도가 가장 높았고 유도전류밀도와 노출지수는 각각 20.67 mA/m2, 0.369였다.

data.source_sentence: 거리 d가 증가함에 따라 유도전류밀도가 감소하는 것을 확인할 수 있으며 d = 30 cm일 때의 유도전류밀도는 d = 10cm일 때의 유도전류밀도를 기준으로 심장, 눈, 뇌에서 각각66.02, 42.74, 32.74% 감소하였다.
data.mt_sentence: As the distance d increases, the induced current density decreases, and the induced current density at d=30 cm decreased by 66.02, 42.74, and 32.74% in the heart, eyes, and brain, respectively, based on the induced current density at d=10 cm.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 가까운 거리에 서 유도전류밀도가 높은 기관일수록 거리가 멀어짐에 따라 유도전류밀도의 감소율이 더 크게 나타났으며 이는 거리가 멀어질수록 인체 모델 전체에 입사하는 자기장이 더 균일해지기 때문인 것으로 추측된다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, the higher the induced current density at a short distance, the greater the decrease rate of the induced current density as the distance increases. do.

data.source_sentence: 앞에서 설명한 바와 같이 기준레벨과 기본 한계 중 기본 한계가 더 근본적인 노출기준이므로 기준레벨(실측 자속밀도)이 노출 제한값을 초과하더라도 기본 한계(인체전류밀도)가 노출 제한값보다 작으면 인체보호기준을 만족하는 것으로 판정한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the basic limit of the reference level and the basic limit is the more fundamental exposure criterion, if the basic limit (human current density) is less than the exposure limit even if the reference level (actual magnetic flux density) exceeds the exposure limit, it is determined that the human protection standard is satisfied.
data.target_sentence: Since the basic limit of the reference level and the basic limit is the more fundamental exposure criterion, if the basic limit (human current density) is less than the exposure limit, even if the reference level (actual magnetic flux density) exceeds the exposure limit, it is determined that the human protection standard is satisfied.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서 평가한 유도가열 조리기는 IEC 62233 표준 측정 기준인 30cm 거리에 인체가 위치하는 경우는 물론이고 측정 기준보다 가까운 10 cm 거리에 인체가 위치하는 경우에도 인체보호기준을 만족하는 것을 알 수 있다.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 영구자석 전동기의 운전온도와 사용 시간에 따른 전동기 수명을 예측하기 위하여 고정자 권선의 절연 열화에 기인한 전동기 토크 손상식을 제안하였다.

data.source_sentence: 계자 권선은 직류 전류로 여자되며 공극에 계자 권선의 극 수(S1)와 동일한 극 수를 갖는 고정자계를 발생시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: The field winding is excited with a direct current and generates a stator magnetic field with the same number of poles as the number of poles (S1) of the field winding in the air gap.

data.source_sentence: 이 고정자계는 S2의 극 수를 갖는 회전자 돌극의 릴럭턴스 차이에 의해 변조되며 회전자가 ωr의 각속도로 회전할 경우 2p 극 수를 갖는 전기자 권선과 자기적으로 결합하는 회전자계를 발생시킨다.

data.source_sentence: 일반적인 하이퍼써미아 시스템은 자성 나노입자의 온도 제어가 불가능하지만 외부 정적 자기장을 이용하여 나노입자의 발열 온도를 제어하는 방법이 개발되었으며 정적 자기장을 이용해 나노입자의 정렬 상태를 제어할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Although the general hyperthermia system cannot control the temperature of magnetic nanoparticles, a method has been developed to control the heating temperature of nanoparticles using an external static magnetic field, and the alignment state of nanoparticles can be controlled using the static magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 고성능 Nd-Fe-B 자석 제조의 핵심인 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 미세구조 제어기술에 대해 보고한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper reports the microstructure control technology of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase, which is the core of high-performance Nd-Fe-B magnet manufacturing.
data.target_sentence: This paper reports the microstructure control technology of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase, which is the core of high-performance Nd-Fe-B magnet manufacturing.

data.source_sentence: 현재까지 축적된 미세구조 분석 결과를 토대로, 고가의 희토류 사용량을 최소화 하면서 Nd-Fe-B 영구자석의 보자력을 극대화할 수 있는 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 구조/화학적 제어기술의 개발 방향을 제시해 보고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: Based on the results of microstructure analysis accumulated so far, the direction of development of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary structure/chemical control technology that can maximize the beam power of Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets while minimizing the use of expensive rare earths.
data.target_sentence: Based on the results of microstructure analysis accumulated so far, the direction of development of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary structure/chemical control technology that can maximize the coercive force of Nd-Fe-B permanent magnets while minimizing the use of expensive rare earths.

data.source_sentence: 모터의 구동온도(150~200 °C) 범위 내에서의 자석의 자속밀도 손실을 최소화하기 위해 자석의 보자력 특성을 향상시키는 것이 가장 중요한데, 현재 Nd-Fe-B 자석에서 구현되는 보자력은 이론값(67 kOe)의 25% 수준에 불과하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to minimize loss of magnetic flux density of a magnet within a driving temperature (150°C to 200°C) of a motor, it is most important to improve the holding force characteristics of the magnet, and the holding force implemented in the Nd-Fe-B magnet is only 25% of a theoretical value (67 kOe).
data.target_sentence: In order to minimize the loss of magnetic flux density of a magnet within a driving temperature (150°C to 200°C) of a motor, it is most important to improve the holding force characteristics of the magnet and the holding force implemented in the Nd-Fe-B magnet is only 25% of a theoretical value (67 kOe).

data.source_sentence: 최근에는, 친환경 자동차, 드론 등의 고부가가치 산업에서의 희토류 자원에 대한 수요 급증과 중국의 자원무기화가 맞물려, Nd-Fe-B 자석 산업에서의 경희토류 및 중희토류 원소의 사용은 더욱 제한적이 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, the use of light earth and heavy earth elements in the Nd-Fe-B magnet industry has become more limited due to the rapid increase in demand for rare earth resources in high value-added industries such as eco-friendly vehicles and drones and China's resource weaponization.
data.target_sentence: Recently, the use of light earth and heavy earth elements in the Nd-Fe-B magnet industry has become more limited due to the rapid increase in demand for rare earth resources in high-value-added industries such as eco-friendly vehicles and drones and China's resource weaponization.

data.source_sentence: Nd-Fe-B 자석의 보자력 발생 기구(i.e., 계면에서의 역자구핵생성 억제 및 2:14:1 상간의 자기교환결합 약화)를 고려하면, 희토류 원소의 사용량을 최소화하면서 Nd-Fe-B 자석의 보자력을 향상시키기 위해서는 다음 3가지의 미세구조제어기술이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Considering the mechanisms for generating Nd-Fe-B magnets (i.e., inhibition of reverse autologous nucleation at interfaces and weakening of self-exchange bonds between 2:14:1 phases), the following three microstructural techniques are important to improve the Nd-Fe-B magnets' visibility while minimizing the use of rare earth elements.
data.target_sentence: Considering the mechanisms for generating Nd-Fe-B magnets (i.e., inhibition of reverse autologous nucleation at interfaces and weakening of self-exchange bonds between 2:14:1 phases), the following three microstructural techniques are important to improve the Nd-Fe-B magnets' visibility while minimizing the use of rare earth elements.

data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 Nd-Fe-B자석의 보자력 향상에 핵심인 (i)의 미세구조는 열처리를 통해 구현이 가능하기 때문에, 고보자력 Nd-Fe-B 자석 개발에 있어서 열처리 공정 및 이를 통한 Nd-rich 입계상의 미세구조 제어 기술은 매우 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the microstructure of (i), which is a key to improving the holding force of the Nd-Fe-B magnet, may be realized through heat treatment, a heat treatment process and a technology for controlling the microstructure of the Nd-rich grain boundary through the microstructure may be very important.
data.target_sentence: Since the microstructure of (i), which is a key to improving the coercive force of the Nd-Fe-B magnet, may be implemented through thermal treatment, a thermal treatment process and a technology for controlling the microstructure of the Nd-rich grain boundary through the microstructure may be very important.

data.source_sentence: 열처리에 의한 Cu-첨가 자석 내 미세구조 변화의 근원을 이해하면, 자석의 미세구조적 결점을 파악할 수 있고, 이를 보완함으로써 Cu-첨가 자석의 보자력을 극대화할 수 있는 실마리를 얻을 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: By understanding the source of microstructural changes in Cu-added magnets due to heat treatment, microstructural defects of magnets can be identified, and by complementing them, a clue can be obtained to maximize the coercive force of Cu-added magnets.
data.target_sentence: By understanding the source of microstructural changes in Cu-added magnets due to thermal treatment, microstructural defects of magnets can be identified, and by complementing them, a clue can be obtained to maximize the coercive force of Cu-added magnets.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 현재까지 필자가 얻은 연구 결과를 중심으로 Nd-Fe-B 자석 내 Nd-rich 삼중점상 및 입계상의 구조/화학적 제어기술을 제안하였다.
data.mt_sentence: In this paper, the structure/chemical control technology of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase in Nd-Fe-B magnet is proposed based on the research results obtained so far.
data.target_sentence: This paper proposes the structure/chemical control technology of Nd-rich triple point phase and grain boundary phase in Nd-Fe-B magnet based on the research results obtained so far.

data.source_sentence: 중희토류 금속 또는 Nd를 저감하고도 고특성을 지니는 영구 자석을 제조하기 위해서는 내부 결정립을 단자구 크기까지 미세화하고, 결정립계를 비자성상으로 균일하고 연속적으로 형성시키는 것이 중요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to manufacture a permanent magnet with high properties while reducing heavy rare earth metals or Nd, it is important to refine the internal crystal grains to the size of a single sphere, and to uniformly and continuously form the grain boundaries in a non-magnetic phase.
data.target_sentence: In order to manufacture a permanent magnet with high properties while reducing heavy rare earth metals or Nd, it is important to refine the internal crystal grains to the size of a single sphere and to uniformly and continuously form the grain boundaries in a non-magnetic phase.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형공정법으로 제조된 자석은 결정립 크기가 약 300 nm 정도로 미세하여 일반 소결 자석에 비해 높은 보자력을 확보할 수 있어 희토류 저감형 영구자석으로써 잠재력이 매우 크다.
data.mt_sentence: The magnet manufactured by the hot deformation process has a fine grain size of about 300 nm, so it can secure a higher coercive force compared to a general sintered magnet, so it has great potential as a rare earth reduction type permanent magnet.
data.target_sentence: The magnet manufactured by the hot deformation process has a fine grain size of about 300 nm so that it can secure a higher coercive force compared to a general sintered magnet, and so it has great potential as a rare earth reduction type permanent magnet.

data.source_sentence: 본 논문에서는 중희토류 금속을 사용하지 않거나 Nd를 저감하고도 고특성 지니는 Nd-Fe-B계 영구자석을 개발하기 위한 열간 변형 공정 기술에 대한 전반적인 연구 개발 동향에 대해서 기술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: This paper seeks to describe the overall R&D trends on the hot deformation process technology to develop an Nd-Fe-B system permanent magnet that does not use heavy earth metals or reduces Nd.
data.target_sentence: This paper seeks to describe the overall R&D trends on the hot deformation process technology to develop an Nd-Fe-B system permanent magnet that does not use heavy earth metals or reduces Nd.

data.source_sentence: 자원 수급에 있어 희토류 금속 대부분은 중국에서 생산되고 있는데, 그 중에서도 중희토류 금속은 중국 남부 지역에서만 분리, 정제되고 있기 때문에 자원 수급이 불안정하고 다른 희토류 금속에 비해 가격이 상당히 높다.
data.mt_sentence: In terms of resource supply and demand, most of the rare earth metals are produced in China, and among them, the heavy rare earth metals are separated and refined only in southern China, so the supply and demand of resources is unstable and the price is considerably higher than other rare earth metals.
data.target_sentence: In terms of resource supply and demand, most of the rare earth metals are produced in China, and among them, the heavy rare earth metals are separated and refined only in southern China, so the supply and demand of resources are unstable, and the price is considerably higher than other rare earth metals.

data.source_sentence: 일반 소결 자석은 합금을 기계적으로 분쇄한 후 일방향 자장 하에서 가압하여 성형하고, 이 성형체를 다시 1000°C 이상의 고온에서 소결하여 제조하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: A general sintered magnet is molded by mechanically pulverizing an alloy and then pressing it under a one-way magnetic field, and is produced by sintering the molded body again at a high temperature of 1000°C or higher.
data.target_sentence: A general sintered magnet is molded by mechanically pulverizing an alloy and then pressing it under a one-way magnetic field and is produced by sintering the molded body again at a high temperature of 1000°C or higher.

data.source_sentence: 소결 동안결정립은 초기 분말 크기의 1.5배 이상으로 성장되게 되는데, 합금 분쇄 시 분말의 산화 문제와 입자 미세화에 따른 성형의 어려움으로 sub-micron 크기 이하로 결정립을 미세화하기 어렵다.
data.mt_sentence: During sintering, the crystal grains grow to 1.5 times or more of the initial powder size, and it is difficult to refine the grains to a sub-micron size or less due to the oxidation problem of the powder during alloy pulverization and the difficulty in forming due to particle refinement.
data.target_sentence: During sintering, the crystal grains grow to 1.5 times or more of the initial powder size, and it is difficult to refine the grains to a sub-micron size or less due to the oxidation problem of the powder during alloy pulverization and the difficulty in forming due to particle refinement.

data.source_sentence: 일반적으로 열간변형 자석은 등방성의 나노결정립 자분을 650~850°C 온도 범위에서 가압 소결하여 고밀도의 성형체로 제조한 후 동일 온도 범위에서 열간 변형하여 이방성 벌크자석으로 제조된다.
data.mt_sentence: In general, hot deformable magnets are manufactured as anisotropic bulk magnets by hot deforming isotropic nanocrystal grains into a high-density compact by pressure sintering at a temperature range of 650 to 850 °C, and then hot deforming in the same temperature range.
data.target_sentence: In general, hot deformable magnets are manufactured as anisotropic bulk magnets by hot deforming isotropic nanocrystal grains into a high-density compact by pressure sintering at a temperature range of 650 to 850 °C and then hot deforming in the same temperature range.

data.source_sentence: 열간 변형 공정법은 변형 방식에 따라 크게 다이업셋 법, 후방 압출법, 전방 압출법으로 나뉘며, Fig. 1에 공정 모식도를 나타내었다.
data.mt_sentence: The hot deformation process is largely divided into a die-upset method, a rear extrusion method, and a front extrusion method according to the deformation method, and Fig. 1 shows the process schematic diagram.
data.target_sentence: The hot deformation process is largely divided into a die-upset method, a rear extrusion method, and a front extrusion method according to the deformation method; Fig. 1 shows the process schematic diagram.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2에서 확인 가능하듯이 본 연구팀 공정조건에서는 결정립 성장 및 형상 변화는 열간변형공정이 아니라 hot-press 단계에서 일어나며, 열간변형 공정중 결정립 배열은 결정립 성장과 크게 관련이 없음을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: As can be seen from Fig. 2, in the process conditions of this research team, grain growth and shape change occur in the hot-press stage, not in the hot-deformation process, and the grain arrangement during the hot-deformation process is not greatly related to grain growth.
data.target_sentence: As can be seen from Fig. 2, in the process conditions of this research team, grain growth and shape change occur in the hot-press stage, not in the hot-deformation process, and the grain arrangement during the hot-deformation process is not greatly related to grain growth.

data.source_sentence: 이 메커니즘은 본 연구 결과와도 잘 일치되며, 표면 에너지 차이에 의한 일방향 결정립 성장 및 결정립계 미끄러짐에 의해 결정립들이 배열된다는 주장에 타당성이 있는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: This mechanism is well consistent with the results of this study, and it is considered valid to argue that crystal grains are arranged by unidirectional grain growth and grain boundary sliding due to surface energy differences.
data.target_sentence: This mechanism is well consistent with the results of this study, and it is considered valid to argue that crystal grains are arranged by unidirectional grain growth and grain boundary sliding due to surface energy differences.

data.source_sentence: 0.001 s-1의 속도로 상대적으로 느리게 변형한 시료의 경우 변형률 0.7 이상에서 급격하게 응력이 증가되고 0.9 근처에서 더이상 변형이 일어나지 않았다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a sample deformed relatively slowly at a rate of 0.001 s-1, the stress increased rapidly at a strain rate of 0.7 or higher, and no further deformation occurred near 0.9.
data.target_sentence: In the case of a sample deformed relatively slowly at a rate of 0.001 s-1, the stress increased rapidly at a strain rate of 0.7 or higher, and no further deformation occurred near 0.9.

data.source_sentence: 초반 변형률이 0.5일 때, 빠르게 변형을 진행한 자석에 비해 느리게 진행한 자석의 결정립이 일방향으로 더 잘 배열되었고, 이로 인해 잔류자화가 상대적으로 높은 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: When the initial strain is 0.5, it can be seen that the crystal grains of the slow-advancing magnet are better aligned in one direction compared to the fast-deforming magnet, and thus the residual magnetization is relatively high.
data.target_sentence: When the initial strain is 0.5, it can be seen that the crystal grains of the slow-advancing magnet are better aligned in one direction compared to the fast-deforming magnet, and thus the residual magnetization is relatively high.

data.source_sentence: Nd-rich 상은 열간 변형 공정 중 결정립의 c-축이 가압 방향과 평행하게 회전할 수 있도록 윤활제 역할을 하게 되는데, 이러한 Nd-rich 입계상의 부재는 결정립의 배향을 억제하면서 변형 중 큰 응력을 발생시키는 원인이 된다.
data.mt_sentence: The Nd-rich phase serves as a lubricant so that the c-axis of the grain may rotate in parallel with the pressing direction during the hot deformation process, and the member of the Nd-rich grain boundary suppresses the orientation of the grains and generates high stress during the deformation.
data.target_sentence: The Nd-rich phase serves as a lubricant so that the c-axis of the grain may rotate in parallel with the pressing direction during the hot deformation process, and the member of the Nd-rich grain boundary suppresses the orientation of the grains and generates high stress during the deformation.

data.source_sentence: 결정립 계면에 불균질하고 흐리게 형성된 Nd-rich 상은 이웃한 결정립 간의 자기적 상호작용을 차폐할 수 없을 뿐만 아니라, Nd-rich 상이 크게 뭉쳐있는 부분에서는 국소 반자장이 생성되기 때문에 보자력이 크게 감소된다.
data.mt_sentence: The non-homogeneous and blurred Nd-rich phase at the grain interface cannot shield the magnetic interaction between neighboring grains, and the coercive force is greatly reduced because a local anti-magnetic field is generated in the portion where the Nd-rich phase is largely agglomerated.
data.target_sentence: The non-homogeneous and blurred Nd-rich phase at the grain interface cannot shield the magnetic interaction between neighboring grains, and the coercive force is greatly reduced because a local anti-magnetic field is generated in the portion where the Nd-rich phase is largely agglomerated.

data.source_sentence: 비정상 결정립 성장이 일어난 영역에서 역자구 핵생성이 비교적 쉽게 일어나는 것으로 보고되고 있고, 따라서 보자력 역시 크게 감소하게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: It is reported that reverse magnetic domain nucleation occurs relatively easily in the region where abnormal grain growth has occurred, and thus the coercive force is also greatly reduced.
data.target_sentence: It is reported that reverse magnetic domain nucleation occurs relatively easily in the region where abnormal grain growth has occurred, and thus the coercive force is also greatly reduced.

data.source_sentence: 보고에 따르면, Nb를 소량 첨가함으로써, 분말계면 결정립 성장이 억제되었고, 이와 더불어 입계상의 Nd 농도가 증가하여 인접한 결정립 간의 자기적 차폐능이 개선되어 제조된 자석의 자기 특성이 크게 개선되는 결과를 얻었다.
data.mt_sentence: According to the report, by adding a small amount of Nb, grain growth at the powder interface was suppressed, and the magnetic shielding ability between adjacent grains was improved by increasing the concentration of Nd in the grain boundary phase, thereby significantly improving the magnetic properties of the manufactured magnet. .
data.target_sentence: According to the report, by adding a small amount of Nb, grain growth at the powder interface was suppressed, and the magnetic shielding ability between adjacent grains was improved by increasing the concentration of Nd in the grain boundary phase, thereby significantly improving the magnetic properties of the manufactured magnet.

data.source_sentence: 결정립 크기가 미세한 열간 변형 자석의 경우, 소결자석에 비해 결정립 성장 구동력이 크기 때문에 융점이 낮은 Nd-Cu, Nd-Al, Pr-Cu 등의 경희토류 기반 공정 합금이 확산물질로 사용되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of hot-deformed magnets with fine grain sizes, light rare earth-based eutectic alloys such as Nd-Cu, Nd-Al, and Pr-Cu, which have a low melting point, are used as diffusion materials because of greater grain growth driving force than sintered magnets.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 11에 NdHx와 Cu 나노 분말을 이용하여 확산 처리된 자석과 다른 문헌에 보고된 Nd-Cu 합금 입계 확산 연구 결과들을 Nd-Cu 입계확산 함량에 따른 보자력 증가분에 대한 그래프로 정리하여 나타내었다.

data.mt_sentence: In order for the c-axis of the plate-shaped deformed crystal grains to be oriented parallel to the pressing direction during the process of a hot deformable magnet, it is important to have a liquid phase boundary phase, which acts as a lubricant, and to have a homogeneous distribution.

data.mt_sentence: These solid secondary phases can interfere with the orientation of the grains.

data.source_sentence: La을 첨가하게 되면 RE-rich 상의 젖음성이 감소되어 액상의 RE-rich 상이 입계가 아닌 삼중점에 쉽게 응집되고 입계의 RE-rich 상은 La을 첨가하지 않은 자석보다 오히려 더 불균질하게 분포하였다.

data.source_sentence: 코딩 과정이 모두 광학적으로 수행되므로 액세스 지연 시간이 최소화되고, 비동기(asynchronous)방식으로 작동하기 때문에 네트워크 시스템을 매우 간단하게 만들 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the coding process is all optically performed, the access latency is minimized, and the network system can be made very simple because it operates in an asynchronous manner.

data.source_sentence: OCDMA는 시간 영역 또는 주파수 영역에서만 위상 코딩을 하는 일차원 코딩 형태이거나, 파장 호핑 코딩 및 스펙트럼 위상 코딩의 조합으로 구성되는 이차원 코딩 형태로 구현된다.
data.mt_sentence: OCDMA is implemented as a one-dimensional coding form in which phase coding is performed only in the time domain or frequency domain, or a two-dimensional coding form consisting of a combination of wavelength hopping coding and spectral phase coding.
data.target_sentence: OCDMA is implemented as a one-dimensional coding form in which phase coding is performed only in the time domain or frequency domain, or a two-dimensional coding form consisting of a combination of wavelength hopping coding and spectral phase coding.

data.source_sentence: 인코히어런트 일차원 OCDMA 네트워크에서의 상대적으로 불리한 특성은 코딩 과정이 시간 영역 및 스펙트럼 영역 모두에서 수행되는 코히어런트 이차원OCDMA 시스템을 통하여 개선될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The relatively unfavorable nature of incoherent one-dimensional OCDMA networks can be improved through coherent two-dimensional OCDMA systems in which the coding process is performed in both the time domain and the spectral domain.
data.target_sentence: The relatively unfavorable nature of incoherent one-dimensional OCDMA networks can be improved through coherent two-dimensional OCDMA systems in which the coding process is performed in both the time domain and the spectral domain.

data.source_sentence: 코히어런트 이차원 OCDMA 시스템에서는 상관 특성, 주파수 효율, 용량, 보안 및 분산 측면에서 추가적인 특성 개선을 얻는다.
data.mt_sentence: In a coherent two-dimensional OCDMA system, additional characteristic improvements are obtained in terms of correlation characteristics, frequency efficiency, capacity, security and dispersion.

data.source_sentence: 위성-지상 광통신 시스템의 경우 신호가 대기권을 통과하며 대기 손실(atmospheric loss)을 겪으며, 이로 인하여 전송 성능이 크게 열화된다.

data.source_sentence: 정확한 링크 가용성 계산을 위해 액체수함량별로 야기되는 최대 흡수 및 산란 손실을 예상 및 활용하여, 흡수 및 산란 손실의 확률 분포함수를 구하였다.
data.mt_sentence: For accurate link availability calculation, the probability distribution function of absorption and scattering loss was obtained by predicting and utilizing the maximum absorption and scattering loss caused by each liquid water content.
data.target_sentence: For accurate link availability calculation, the probability distribution function of absorption and scattering loss was obtained by predicting and utilizing the maximum absorption and scattering loss caused by each liquid water content.

data.source_sentence: 대기 난류가 유발하는 광전력 변화와 에어로졸 손실은 구름이나 안개에 의한 흡수 및 산란 손실과 독립이라는 가정 하에 신틸레이션, 에어로졸 손실까지 포함하있다.
data.mt_sentence: Under the assumption that the optical power change and aerosol loss caused by atmospheric turbulence are independent of absorption and scattering loss caused by clouds or fog, scintillation and aerosol loss are included.
data.target_sentence: Under the assumption that the optical power change and aerosol loss caused by atmospheric turbulence are independent of absorption and scattering loss caused by clouds or fog, scintillation and aerosol loss are included.

data.source_sentence: 우리나라 위성-지상 하향 무선 광통신시스템의 링크 가용성에 대해 서술하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: The link availability of the satellite-ground downstream wireless optical communication system in Korea is to be described.
data.target_sentence: The link availability of the satellite-ground downlink wireless optical communication system in Korea is to be described.

data.source_sentence: 기상 데이터는 유럽중기예보센터의 ERA5 dataset에서 다운로드하였으며, 여기에는 대류권 범위(고도 1 km부터 11 km까지, 500 m 간격)에서의 액체수함량을 매 1시간마다 측정한 정보가 들어있다.
data.mt_sentence: The meteorological data were downloaded from the ERA5 dataset of the European Center for Medium-term Forecasting, which contains hourly measurements of liquid water content in the tropospheric range (from 1 km to 11 km in altitude, at intervals of 500 m).
data.target_sentence: The meteorological data were downloaded from the ERA5 dataset of the European Center for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts, which contains hourly measurements of liquid water content in the tropospheric range (from 1 km to 11 km in altitude, at intervals of 500 m).

data.source_sentence: 대기의 흡수 및 산란 손실의 확률 분포 함수를 다음과 같이 표현했는데 여기서 p0는 맑은 날의 확률이며, 확률 분포 함수의 면적이 1이 되도록 지수 q로 정규화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: The probability distribution function of the absorption and scattering loss of the atmosphere is expressed as follows, where p0 is the probability of a clear day, and the area of the probability distribution function is normalized by an exponent q so that it becomes 1.
data.target_sentence: The probability distribution function of the absorption and scattering loss of the atmosphere is expressed as follows, where p0 is the probability of a clear day, and the area of the probability distribution function is normalized by an exponent q so that it becomes 1.

data.source_sentence: 그림 7은 피팅한 확률분포함수의 3가지 파라미터(맑은 날의 확률, 평균, 표준편차)를 도시별, 월별로 각각 나타낸 것이 다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 7 shows the three parameters of the fitted probability distribution function (probability of a sunny day, mean, and standard deviation) by city and month, respectively.
data.target_sentence: Figure 7 shows the three parameters of the fitted probability distribution function (probability of a sunny day, average, and standard deviation) by city and month, respectively.

data.source_sentence: 마지막 그래프를 보면 강수량이 적은 봄, 겨울에도 표준편차가 대체적으로 높은데, 이로써 여름이 아니더라도 흡수 및 산란 손실이 높은 흐린 날이 여전히 있음을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Looking at the last graph, the standard deviation is generally high even in spring and winter when precipitation is low, indicating that there are still cloudy days with high absorption and scattering losses even if it is not summer.
data.target_sentence: Looking at the last graph, the standard deviation is generally high even in spring and winter when precipitation is low, indicating that there are still cloudy days with high absorption and scattering losses even if it is not summer.

data.source_sentence: 대기 손실에 할당한 링크 버짓에 따른 도시별, 월별 링크 가용성 계산 결과는 그림 8과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 8 shows the results of calculating link availability by city and month according to the link budget allocated to the standby loss.
data.target_sentence: Figure 8 shows the results of calculating link availability by city and month according to the link budget allocated to the standby loss.

data.source_sentence: 링크 버짓을 높게 할당할수록, 운용 시간 중 요구 비트 오율을 충족하는 시간의 비율이 높아지는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: It can be seen that the higher the link budget is allocated, the higher the ratio of the time to satisfy the requested bit error rate during the operation time.
data.target_sentence: It can be seen that the higher the link budget is allocated, the higher the ratio of the time to satisfy the requested bit error rate during the operation time.

data.source_sentence: 같은 월이라도 링크 가용성은 도시에 따라 큰 차이를 보였는데, 대구에서 가장 낮고 광주에서 가장 높은 수준을 보였다.
data.mt_sentence: Even in the same month, link availability showed a big difference by city, with the lowest in Daegu and the highest in Gwangju.
data.target_sentence: Even in the same month, link availability showed a big difference by city, with the lowest in Daegu and the highest in Gwangju.

data.source_sentence: 오른쪽은 서울의 각 월별 링크 가용성을 분석한 결과로, 한 도시 내에서도 월에 따라 가용성이 크게 변화함을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: On the right is the result of analyzing the link availability for each month in Seoul, and it can be seen that the availability varies greatly depending on the month even within a city.
data.target_sentence: On the right is the result of analyzing the link availability for each month in Seoul, and it can be seen that the availability varies greatly depending on the month even within a city.

data.source_sentence: 그림 9는 2개, 3개, 5개의 도시에서 위치 다이버시티를 적용했을 때 링크 버짓에 따른 링크 가용성 변화를 예측한 것이 다.
data.mt_sentence: Figure 9 predicts link availability changes according to link budget when location diversity is applied to 2, 3, and 5 cities.
data.target_sentence: Figure 9 predicts link availability changes according to link budget when site diversity is applied to 2, 3, and 5 cities.

data.source_sentence: 5개 도시 모두에서 위치 다이버시티를 적용할 경우, 링크 가용성의 월간 변화를 분석한 결과는 그림 11과 같다.
data.mt_sentence: When location diversity is applied in all five cities, the results of analyzing the monthly change in link availability are shown in Figure 11.
data.target_sentence: When site diversity is applied in all five cities, the results of analyzing the monthly change in link availability are shown in Figure 11.

data.source_sentence: 이를 통해 1 Gb/s급 위성-지상 하향 무선 광통신 시스템을 구현하기 위해서는 신호를 sub-milliradian 수준의 협소한 발산각으로 전송해야 한다는 것을 알 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: This shows that in order to implement a 1 Gb/s-class satellite-terrestrial downlink wireless optical communication system, signals must be transmitted with a narrow divergence angle of sub-milliradian level.
data.target_sentence: This shows that in order to implement a 1 Gb/s-class satellite-ground downlink wireless optical communication system, signals must be transmitted with a narrow divergence angle of sub-milliradian level.

data.source_sentence: 구름에 의한 흡수 및 산란손실은 도시별, 월별로 큰 차이를 보였으며, 링크 가용성도 이와 같이 크게 변화하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Absorption and scattering loss due to clouds showed large differences by city and month, and link availability also changed significantly.
data.target_sentence: Absorption and scattering loss due to clouds showed large differences by city and month, and link availability also changed significantly.

data.source_sentence: 나아가 원자 단위 조작을 통해 표면 위 자성 원자 나노 구조를 만들고, 이를 통한 기억 및 연산 소자의 소형화 연구는 STM을 이용한 연구 분야의 한 축으로 자리잡았다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, through atomic unit manipulation, magnetic atomic nanostructures are made on the surface, and the research on miniaturization of memory and computing devices has become one of the pillars of the research field using STM.
data.target_sentence: Furthermore, through atomic unit manipulation, magnetic atomic nanostructures are made on the surface, and the research on miniaturization of memory and computing devices has become one of the pillars of the research field using STM.

data.source_sentence: 이 글에서는 먼저 전자스핀공명(electron spin resonance, ESR)을 STM에 결합하여 두 가지 실험 방법의 장점인 높은 에너지 분해능과 공간 분해능을 이용한 단일 원자의 스핀공명 실험연구들을 소개한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this article, we first introduce spin resonance experimental studies of a single atom using high energy resolution and spatial resolution, which are the advantages of two experimental methods by combining electron spin resonance (ESR) with STM.
data.target_sentence: In this article, we first introduce spin resonance experimental studies of a single atom using high energy resolution and spatial resolution, which are the advantages of two experimental methods by combining electron spin resonance (ESR) with STM.

data.source_sentence: 다음으로 펄스-ESR 방법을 적용해 원자 스케일에서 전자 스핀 양자비트 구현을 향한 표면 위 단일 원자/분자 스핀에 대한 결맞음 제어 및 측정 연구를 소개한다.
data.mt_sentence: Next, we present a study of coherence control and measurement of single atom/molecular spins on the surface towards the realization of electron spin quantum bits at the atomic scale by applying the pulsed-ESR method.
data.target_sentence: Next, we present a study of coherent control and measurement of single atom/molecular spins on the surface towards the realization of electron spin quantum bits at the atomic scale by applying the pulsed-ESR method.

data.source_sentence: 최근 양자 센싱(quantum sensing), 양자 시뮬레이션(quantumsimulation), 양자 컴퓨팅(quantum computing) 등을 아우르는 양자 기술의 발전 과정에서, 양자 점(quantum dots), 반도체 불순물, 절연체 스핀 결함 등의 고체-기반 양자비트(qubit) 연구도 진보를 거듭해 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In the recent development of quantum technology encompassing quantum sensing, quantum simulation, and quantum computing, solid-based quantum bits such as quantum dots, semiconductor impurities, and insulator spin defects, etc. (qubit) research has also made progress.
data.target_sentence: In the recent development of quantum technology encompassing quantum sensing, quantum simulation, and quantum computing, solid-based quantum bits (qubit) researches such as quantum dots, semiconductor impurities, and insulator spin defects, etc. have also made progress.

data.source_sentence: 표면에 놓인 원자는 주변 환경과의 상호작용으로 인하여 양자 특성이 쉽게 변하기 때문에, 양자 정보 공정을 위해 필요한 스핀의 양자 결맞음(quantum coherence)에 대한 연구는 기존의 접근을 넘어서는 기술적인 진보를 요구한다.
data.mt_sentence: Since the quantum properties of atoms placed on the surface are easily changed due to interactions with the surrounding environment, the study of quantum coherence of spins required for quantum information processing requires technological advances beyond conventional approaches.
data.target_sentence: Since the quantum properties of atoms placed on the surface are easily changed due to interactions with the surrounding environment, the study of quantum coherence of spins required for quantum information processing requires technological advances beyond conventional approaches.

data.source_sentence: ESR-STM 기술은 실험 온도에 제한되었던 기존의 측정 기술의 한계를 넘어, 높은 에너지 분해능으로 표면 원자의 스핀 상태에 대한 연구가 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: ESR-STM technology is capable of studying the spin state of surface atoms with high energy resolution beyond the limitations of the existing measurement technology, which was limited to the experimental temperature.
data.target_sentence: ESR-STM technology is capable of studying the spin state of surface atoms with high energy resolution beyond the limitations of the existing measurement technology, which was limited to the experimental temperature.

data.source_sentence: 1980년대 STM의 발명으로 처음으로 원자 단위의 정확도로 금속 또는 반도체 표면의 3차원 형상을 측정하는게 가능해졌다.
data.mt_sentence: The invention of STM in the 1980s made it possible for the first time to measure the three-dimensional shape of a metal or semiconductor surface with atomic-level accuracy.
data.target_sentence: The invention of STM in the 1980s made it possible for the first time to measure the three-dimensional shape of a metal or semiconductor surface with atomic-level accuracy.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1a에서 보이는 바와 같이 STM 실험은 뾰족한 금속 탐침과 원자 수준으로 깨끗한 표면의 시료로 구성되어 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. As shown in 1a, the STM experiment consists of a pointed metal probe and a sample with an atomic level clean surface.
data.target_sentence: As shown in Fig. 1a, the STM experiment consists of a pointed metal probe and a sample with an atomic level clean surface.

data.source_sentence: STM 탐침은 압전체에 고정되어 있으며, 압전체에 전압을 인가하여 탐침의 x, y, z 방향 움직임을 원자 수준으로 조절한다.
data.mt_sentence: The STM probe is fixed to the piezoelectric body, and by applying a voltage to the piezoelectric body, the movement of the probe in the x, y, and z directions is controlled at the atomic level.
data.target_sentence: The STM probe is fixed to the piezoelectric body, and by applying a voltage to the piezoelectric body, the movement of the probe in the x, y, and z directions is controlled at the atomic level.

data.source_sentence: 이에 따른 탐침의 움직임을 기록함으로써 시료 표면 형상을 영상화한다.
data.mt_sentence: The surface shape of the sample is imaged by recording the movement of the probe accordingly.
data.target_sentence: The surface shape of the sample is imaged by recording the movement of the probe accordingly.

data.source_sentence: STM은 탐침과 시료 사이의 전류 측정에 기반하기 때문에, 측정된 영상은 표면의 기하학적인 모양뿐 아니라 조사하는 위치의 전자 밀도에 대한 정보도 함께 포함하고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Since STM is based on the measurement of the current between the probe and the sample, the measured image contains information about the electron density at the irradiated location as well as the geometric shape of the surface.
data.target_sentence: Since STM is based on the measurement of the current between the probe and the sample, the measured image contains information about the electron density at the irradiated location as well as the geometric shape of the surface.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 1b는 STM의 공간분해능을 보여주는 전형적인 표면구조 데이터이며, 단결정 Ag(100) 표면에 증착한 두 원자층 두께의 산화마그네슘(MgO) 표면 위에 철(Fe) 원자들이 놓인 시료로부터 얻은 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 1b is typical surface structure data showing the spatial resolution of STM, obtained from a sample in which iron (Fe) atoms are placed on the surface of magnesium oxide (MgO) having a thickness of two atomic layers deposited on the surface of single crystal Ag (100).
data.target_sentence: Fig. 1b is typical surface structure data showing the spatial resolution of STM, obtained from a sample in which iron (Fe) atoms are placed on the surface of magnesium oxide (MgO) having a thickness of two atomic layers deposited on the surface of single crystal Ag (100).

data.source_sentence: 두 개의 큰 구 모양 형상은 철 원자들이며, 잘 정렬된 사각 패턴 내 작은 돌기들은 산화마그네슘의 산소 원자들이다.
data.mt_sentence: The two large spherical shapes are iron atoms, and the small projections in the well-ordered square pattern are oxygen atoms of magnesium oxide.
data.target_sentence: The two large spherical shapes are iron atoms, and the small projections in the well-ordered square pattern are oxygen atoms of magnesium oxide.

data.source_sentence: 물질 표면의 전자 밀도는 표면의 물리적인 변화뿐만 아니라, 에너지에 따라서도 변화한다.
data.mt_sentence: The electron density on the surface of a material changes not only with the physical change of the surface, but also with energy.
data.target_sentence: The electron density on the surface of a material changes not only with the physical change of the surface, but also with energy.

data.source_sentence: STM 탐침을 표면의 원자 위에 위치 시킨 후, 전압을 인가하면, 전압에 해당하는 에너지를 가진 터널링 전자가 원자를 통해 흐르게 된다.
data.mt_sentence: After placing the STM probe on an atom on the surface, when a voltage is applied, tunneling electrons with energy corresponding to the voltage flow through the atom.
data.target_sentence: After placing the STM probe on an atom on the surface, when a voltage is applied, tunneling electrons with energy corresponding to the voltage flow through the atom.

data.source_sentence: IETS에서 전도성이 급증하는 전압은 외부 자기장이 증가함에 따라 함께 증가한다.
data.mt_sentence: In IETS, the voltage at which the conductivity surges increases with the increase of the external magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: In IETS, the voltage at which the conductivity surges increases with the increase of the external magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 IETS측정을 위해 Al2O3 절연체 박막은 기판 전자에 의한 Mn 원자의 스핀 산란을 줄이기 위해 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, for IETS measurement, an Al2O3 insulator thin film is required to reduce spin scattering of Mn atoms by substrate electrons.
data.target_sentence: Here, for IETS measurement, an Al2O3 insulator thin film is required to reduce spin scattering of Mn atoms by substrate electrons.

data.source_sentence: 같은 원리로 얇은 절연체 박막은 기판의 전자로부터 표면 분자를 전기적으로 분리함으로써 분자의 전자 궤도를 시각화하기 위해서도 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: By the same principle, thin insulator thin films are also used to visualize electron orbitals of molecules by electrically separating surface molecules from electrons on the substrate.
data.target_sentence: By the same principle, thin insulator thin films are also used to visualize electron orbitals of molecules by electrically separating surface molecules from electrons on the substrate.

data.source_sentence: 여기서 STM 탐침의 전자 상태가 스핀 편극된(spin-polarized)경우, 나노 구조체의 스핀 상태를 분석하고 선택적으로 들뜬 상태로 유도하는 것이 가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: Here, when the electronic state of the STM probe is spin-polarized, it is possible to analyze the spin state of the nanostructure and selectively induce it to an excited state.
data.target_sentence: Here, when the electronic state of the STM probe is spin-polarized, it is possible to analyze the spin state of the nanostructure and selectively induce it to an excited state.

data.source_sentence: 나아가 STM 탐침을 이용하여 자성 원자를 하나씩 배열함으로서, 스핀에 기반한 논리 게이트(logic gate) 또는 자기저장소자를 원자 단위로 제작할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, by arranging magnetic atoms one by one using an STM probe, a spin-based logic gate or magnetic storage device can be fabricated in atomic units.
data.target_sentence: Furthermore, by arranging magnetic atoms one by one using an STM probe, a spin-based logic gate or magnetic storage device can be fabricated in atomic units.

data.source_sentence: 스핀 자기모멘트가 전자기파와 공명 반응할 때 에너지의 흡수와 방출이 일어나며, 이는 물질 또는 생체분자의 자성 구조를 영상화하기 위해 사용된다.
data.mt_sentence: When the spin magnetic moment resonates with electromagnetic waves, energy is absorbed and released, which is used to image the magnetic structure of materials or biomolecules.
data.target_sentence: When the spin magnetic moment resonates with electromagnetic waves, energy is absorbed and released, which is used to image the magnetic structure of materials or biomolecules.

data.source_sentence: 전통적인 스핀 공명 실험에서는 신호를 측정하기 위해 107~1010개의 스핀 앙상블(ensemble)이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In a traditional spin resonance experiment, 107 to 1010 spin ensembles are required to measure the signal.
data.target_sentence: In a traditional spin resonance experiment, 107 to 1010 spin ensembles are required to measure the signal.

data.source_sentence: 단일 원자/분자 스핀의 경우 스핀 위치에 대한 원자 스케일의 정확한 접근이 필요하고 스핀 앙상블 시료와 비교해서 매우 높은 신호 민감도를 요구하므로 기존 방법으로는 측정이 불가능하다.
data.mt_sentence: For single-atomic/molecular spins, accurate access to the atomic scale to the spin position is required and very high signal sensitivity is required compared to spin ensemble samples, making measurements impossible with conventional methods.
data.target_sentence: For single-atomic/molecular spins, accurate access to the atomic scale to the spin position is required and very high signal sensitivity is required compared to spin ensemble samples, making measurements impossible with conventional methods.

data.source_sentence: ESR 측정에서는 ‘라비주파수’ Rabi, ‘열적완화시간’ T1, ‘결맞음시간’ T2에 의해 결정되는 공명선 폭에 의해서 에너지분해능이 결정된다.
data.mt_sentence: In ESR measurement, the energy resolution is determined by the resonance line width determined by the 'Rabi frequency' Rabi, the 'thermal relaxation time' T1, and the 'coherence time' T2.
