data.source_sentence: 이와 같이 STM을 이용한 표면 위 단일 원자/분자 스핀Rabi을 향상시키기 위해서 다음과 같은 두 가지 접근이 필요하다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to improve single atom/molecular spin Rabi on the surface using STM, the following two approaches are required.
data.target_sentence: In order to improve single atom/molecular spin Rabi on the surface using STM, the following two approaches are required.

data.source_sentence: 금속 기판의 자유 전자로부터 산란을 줄이기 위해서 스핀과 기판과의 거리를 늘릴 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: In order to reduce scattering from free electrons of the metal substrate, the distance between the spin and the substrate may be increased.
data.target_sentence: In order to reduce scattering from free electrons of the metal substrate, the distance between the spin and the substrate may be increased.

data.source_sentence: 이 경우 기판으로부터의 산란 영향을 10배 가량 줄일 수 있을 것으로 본다.
data.mt_sentence: In this case, it is expected that the scattering effect from the substrate can be reduced by about 10 times.
data.target_sentence: In this case, it is expected that the scattering effect from the substrate can be reduced by about 10 times.

data.source_sentence: 직접적인 방법은 터널 접합 외에 있는 원자/분자 스핀에 대한 원거리 제어 및 측정이다.
data.mt_sentence: A direct method is the remote control and measurement of the atomic/molecular spin outside the tunnel junction.
data.target_sentence: A direct method is the remote control and measurement of the atomic/molecular spin outside the tunnel junction.

data.source_sentence: 또 다른 접근법은 자기장의 요동에 덜 민감한, 특별한 스핀 상태를 이용하는 것이 다.
data.mt_sentence: Another approach is to use special spin states, which are less sensitive to fluctuations in the magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: Another approach is to use special spin states, which are less sensitive to fluctuations in the magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 고체 표면 연구 분야에서 STM을 이용한 연구가 갖는 차별점은 국소적인 환경의 정밀한 조절이 가능하고, 원자 하나씩 이용하여 스핀 구조를 원하는 형태로 제작할 수 있다는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: The difference of research using STM in the field of solid surface research is that it is possible to precisely control the local environment, and the spin structure can be manufactured in a desired shape using atoms one by one.
data.target_sentence: The difference of research using STM in the field of solid surface research is that it is possible to precisely control the local environment, and the spin structure can be manufactured in a desired shape using atoms one by one.

data.source_sentence: 최근 STM으로 표면 원자의 양자 결맞음을 제어, 측정, 나아가 향상시키는 연구가 진행되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, research on controlling, measuring, and further improving the quantum coherence of surface atoms with STM is in progress.
data.target_sentence: Recently, a research on controlling, measuring, and further improving the quantum coherence of surface atoms with STM is in progress.

data.source_sentence: 이는 미시 물리계의 성질을 규명하는 역할을 넘어서 새로운 실험 기술 정립을 통해 양자 특성 연구에 또 다른 플렛폼을 형성하는 과정이다.
data.mt_sentence: This is a process that forms another platform for quantum property research by establishing new experimental technology beyond the role of identifying the properties of the microphysical system.
data.target_sentence: This is a process that forms another platform for the quantum property research by establishing new experimental technology beyond the role of identifying the properties of the microphysical system.

data.source_sentence: 나아가 단일 원자/분자의 위치 조작 기반 상향식 접근법(bottom-up approach)을 이용한 표면 위 원자-정확도로 제어된 나노 구조에서 전자 스핀 양자비트 시스템 구현도 기대해 볼 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Furthermore, it is expected to implement an electron spin quantum bit system in an atom-accurately controlled nanostructure on the surface using a bottom-up approach based on the position manipulation of single atoms/molecules.
data.target_sentence: Furthermore, it is expected to implement an electron spin quantum bit system in an atom-accurately controlled nanostructure on the surface using a bottom-up approach based on the position manipulation of single atoms/molecules.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀(graphene)은 독특한 물리적 성질로 인하여 나노전자소자에 응용에 최적의 2차원 소재로 인식되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Graphene has been recognized as an optimal two-dimensional material for application to nanoelectronic devices due to its unique physical properties.
data.target_sentence: Graphene has been recognized as an optimal two-dimensional material for application to nanoelectronic devices due to its unique physical properties.

data.source_sentence: 최근 그래핀에 스핀-궤도 상호작용을 인가시키고 그로 인한 수송특성을 다양한 형태의 소자에서 연구한 결과들이 활발히 발표되고 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Recently, the results of applying a spin-orbital interaction to graphene and studying the transport characteristics thereof in various types of devices are being actively published.
data.target_sentence: Recently, the results of applying a spin-orbital interaction to graphene and studying the transport characteristics thereof in various types of devices are being actively published.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀(graphene)은 선형의 전자분산관계(electron dispersionrelation)로 인한 우수한 전기적 성질과 단일원자 층의 궁극적인 2차원 소재로서 차세대 나노전자소자 응용에 있어서 많은 관심을 받아왔다.
data.mt_sentence: Graphene has attracted much attention in the application of next-generation nanoelectronic devices as the ultimate two-dimensional material with excellent electrical properties and single atomic layer due to a linear electron dispersion relation.
data.target_sentence: Graphene has attracted much attention in the application of next-generation nanoelectronic devices as the ultimate two-dimensional material with excellent electrical properties and single atomic layer due to a linear electron dispersion relation.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀의 스핀트로닉스(spintronics) 응용 연구는 초기에는 전자스핀 전달 매개체로서 탁월한 성능을 지니는 것에 초점이 맞춰졌었다.
data.mt_sentence: Research on the spintronics application of graphene was initially focused on having excellent performance as an electron spin transport medium.
data.target_sentence: Research on the spintronics application of graphene was initially focused on having excellent performance as an electron spin transport medium.

data.source_sentence: 그래핀의 높은 전자이동도(electron mobility)와 낮은 스핀-궤도 상호작용(spin-orbitinteraction)으로 스핀산란(spin diffusion) 거리가 수십 m까지 이른다는 보고도 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: It has also been reported that the spin diffusion distance reaches several tens of m due to graphene's high electron mobility and low spin-orbit interaction.
data.target_sentence: It has also been reported that the spin diffusion distance reaches several tens of m due to graphene's high electron mobility and low spin-orbit interaction.

data.source_sentence: 최근의 스핀트로닉스 연구에 있어서 스핀-궤도 상호작용의 중요성과 활용도가 날로 부각되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: In recent spintronics research, the importance and utility of spin-orbit interaction has been highlighted day by day.
data.target_sentence: In the recent spintronics research, the importance and utility of spin-orbit interaction has been highlighted day by day.

data.source_sentence: 스핀-궤도 상호작용은 스핀전류(spin current)와 전하전류간의 상호 변환을 가져다 줄 수 있기에 강자성체(ferromagnet) 없이 스핀전류를 생성하거나 또는 주입된 스핀전류를 전하전류로 변환시켜주는 등 다양한 활용도를 가져다 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Spin-orbit interactions can lead to interconversion between spin current and charge current, so they can be used in various ways, such as generating spin current without a ferromagnet or converting injected spin current into charge current.
data.target_sentence: Spin-orbit interactions can lead to interconversion between spin current and charge current, so they can be used in various ways, such as generating spin current without a ferromagnet or converting injected spin current into charge current.

data.source_sentence: 스핀-궤도 돌림힘(spin-orbittorque)으로 강자성체의 자화방향 제어가 가능하게 하는등 새로운 물리적 현상과 소자 응용을 가능하게 하여 “스핀오비트로닉스(spin-orbitronics)”라 불리우는 새로운 연구분야와 학명이 태동하게 되었다.
data.mt_sentence: A new field of research and scientific name called "spin-orbitronics" was born by enabling new physical phenomena and device applications, such as controlling the magnetization direction of ferromagnetism with spin-orbitronics.
data.target_sentence: A new field of research and scientific name called "spin-orbitronics" was born by enabling new physical phenomena and device applications, such as controlling the magnetization direction of ferromagnetism with spin-orbit torque.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 이유로 그래핀의 스핀트로닉스 응용에 있어서도 다양한 새로운 기능과 활용성을 가져다줄 수 있는 스핀-궤도 상호작용을 인위적으로 증가시키는 연구가 활발히 진행되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: For this reason, research on artificially increasing the spin-orbit interaction, which can bring various new functions and utility, has been actively conducted in the spintronics application of graphene.
data.target_sentence: For this reason, the research on artificially increasing the spin-orbit interaction, which can bring various new functions and utility, has been actively conducted in the spintronics application of graphene.

data.source_sentence: 이를 검증하기 위해서는 저온에서의 양자 간섭효과(quantuminterference)에 의한 자기저항(magnetoresistance) 분석이나 소자에서의 스핀전류 생성 및 전기적 신호를 바탕으로 한 스핀전류 검출 연구가 진행되어 왔다.
data.mt_sentence: To verify this, magnetoresistance analysis by quantum interference at low temperature, spin current generation in devices, and spin current detection studies based on electrical signals have been conducted.
data.target_sentence: To verify this, magnetoresistance analysis by quantum interference at low temperature, spin current generation in devices, and spin current detection studies based on electrical signals have been conducted.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 그래핀의 스핀트로닉스 연구에 있어서 스핀궤도 상호작용과 그에 수반하는 수송특성과 관련하여 그동안 진행되어 왔던 동향에 대해서 간단히 소개하고자 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In this study, we would like to briefly introduce the trends that have been conducted in relation to the spin orbital interaction and the accompanying transport characteristics in the spintronics study of graphene.
data.target_sentence: In this study, we would like to briefly introduce the trends that have been conducted in relation to the spin orbital interaction and the accompanying transport characteristics in the spintronics study of graphene.

data.source_sentence: 스핀-궤도 상호작용이 강하게 작용하는 경우에는 Fig.1(b)와 같이 전하의 스핀이 각각의 운동량과 결합하여 닫힌 경로에서 반대방향의 위상으로 인하여 닫힌 고리구조를 깨는 간섭이 일어나게 한다.
data.mt_sentence: In the case of a strong spin-orbit interaction, as shown in Fig. 1(b), the spin of the charge is combined with each momentum to cause the interference to break the closed ring structure due to the opposite phase in the closed path.
data.target_sentence: In case of a strong spin-orbit interaction, as shown in Fig. 1(b), the spin of the charge is combined with each momentum to cause the interference to break the closed ring structure due to the opposite phase in the closed path.

data.source_sentence: Fig. 2(a)는 전이 금속 디칼코제나이드 물질과 이중 접합된그래핀을 도식적으로 나타낸 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 2(a) schematically shows graphene double-bonded to a transition metal dichalcogenide material.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 2(a) schematically shows graphene double-bonded to a transition metal dichalcogenide material.

data.source_sentence: 전이 금속 디칼코제나이드 물질(WSe2)의 저항은 그래핀보다 훨씬 높아, 전하 수송이 대부분 그래핀에서 이루어지고 그래핀의 디락(Driac) 밴드구조 특성에 따라 저항 값이 변하는 것을 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The resistance of the transition metal dichalcogenide material (WSe2) is much higher than that of graphene, so it can be seen that most of the charge transport is performed in graphene, and the resistance value changes according to the Driac band structure characteristics of graphene.
data.target_sentence: The resistance of the transition metal dichalcogenide material (WSe2) is much higher than that of graphene, so it can be seen that most of the charge transport is performed in graphene, and the resistance value changes according to the Dirac band structure characteristics of graphene.

data.source_sentence: 전이 금속 디칼코제나이드 물질의 근접 효과로 증가된 스핀궤도 상호작용은 weak anti-localization을 유도하며 자기전도도 측정과 분석으로 그 크기를 추정할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The increased spin orbital interaction due to the proximity effect of the transition metal dichalcogenide material induces weak anti-localization, and its size can be estimated by measuring and analyzing magnetic conductivity.
data.target_sentence: The increased spin orbital interaction due to the proximity effect of the transition metal dichalcogenide material induces weak anti-localization, and its size can be estimated by measuring and analyzing magnetic conductivity.

data.source_sentence: 앞서 언급한대로, 그래핀에서 스핀-궤도 결합을 증가시키기 위한 또 다른 대표적인 방법은 불순물을 그래핀에 흡착 시키는 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: As mentioned earlier, another representative method for increasing spin-orbit coupling in graphene is to adsorb impurities onto graphene.
data.target_sentence: As mentioned earlier, another representative method for increasing spin-orbit coupling in graphene is to adsorb impurities onto graphene.

data.source_sentence: 불순물 흡착은 또 다시 화학적 방법(chemisorb)과 물리적 방법(physical adsorption)으로 나눌 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Impurity adsorption can be further divided into a chemical method (chemisorb) and a physical method (physical adsorption).
data.target_sentence: Impurity adsorption can be further divided into a chemical method (chemisorb) and a physical method (physical adsorption).

data.source_sentence: Fig. 3(a)는 화학적 흡착에 의해 그래핀의 오비탈 구조가 sp2에서 sp3로 바뀌게 되는 것을 보여주며, 이론적으로 그래핀의 스핀-궤도 결합이 수 meV까지 향상 되는 것을 예측하였다.
data.mt_sentence: Fig. 3(a) shows that the orbital structure of graphene is changed from sp2 to sp3 by chemical adsorption, and theoretically, it is predicted that the spin-orbit coupling of graphene is improved to several meV.
data.target_sentence: Fig. 3(a) shows that the orbital structure of graphene is changed from sp2 to sp3 by chemical adsorption, and theoretically, it is predicted that the spin-orbit coupling of graphene is improved to several meV.

data.source_sentence: 화학적 흡착의 대표적인 원소는 수소와 플루오린(불소)이 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Representative elements of chemical adsorption are hydrogen and fluorine (fluorine).
data.target_sentence: Representative elements of chemical adsorption are hydrogen and fluorine.

data.source_sentence: 플루오린 역시 혼성 sp3 오비탈이 형성되지만 수소와 다르게 플루오린 스스로의 스핀-궤도 결합이 더 큰 영향을 준다.
data.mt_sentence: Fluorine also forms a hybrid sp3 orbital, but unlike hydrogen, fluorine's own spin-orbital bond has a greater effect.
data.target_sentence: Fluorine also forms a hybrid sp3 orbital, but unlike hydrogen, fluorine's own spin-orbital bond has a greater effect.

data.source_sentence: DFT(density functionaltheory)에 의해 예측된 스핀-궤도 결합은 플루오린이 화학적으로 흡착된 그래핀에서 가장 큰 값을 가지며, 수소가 흡착된 그래핀보다 10배 이상 큰 값을 가지는 것으로 계산되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin-orbit coupling predicted by the density functional theory (DFT) was calculated to have the largest value in graphene where fluorine was chemically adsorbed, and a value more than 10 times greater than that of graphene where hydrogen was adsorbed.
data.target_sentence: The spin-orbit coupling predicted by the density functional theory (DFT) was calculated to have the largest value in graphene where fluorine was chemically adsorbed, and a value more than 10 times greater than that of graphene where hydrogen was adsorbed.

data.source_sentence: 금은 무거운 원소 중에 하나로 스핀-궤도 결합이 큰 물질이며 금 입자들이 그래핀 표면에 물리적으로 흡착이 되면 공간반전 대칭이 깨져 고유한 스핀-궤도 결합 혹은 라쉬바 스핀-궤도 결합이 강화될 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: Gold is one of the heavy elements and is a material with large spin-orbit bonds, and when gold particles are physically adsorbed to the graphene surface, spatial inversion symmetry can be broken, which can strengthen unique spin-orbit bonds or Rashba spin-orbit bonds.
data.target_sentence: Gold is one of the heavy elements and is a material with large spin-orbit coupling, and when gold particles are physically adsorbed to the graphene surface, spatial inversion symmetry can be broken, which can strengthen unique spin-orbit bonds or Rashba spin-orbit bonds.

data.source_sentence: 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀에서 스핀-궤도 결합의 증가는 스핀홀 효과(spin Hall effect, SHE)의 비국소적 수송(nonlocaltransport) 실험으로 확인할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The increase in spin-orbit coupling in impurity-adsorbed graphene can be confirmed by nonlocal transport experiments with spin Hall effect (SHE).
data.target_sentence: The increase in spin-orbit coupling in impurity-adsorbed graphene can be confirmed by nonlocal transport experiments with spin Hall effect (SHE).

data.source_sentence: 스핀 홀 효과는 비자성물질에서 외부의 자기장 없이, 전하 전류의 흐름에 수직인 방향으로 스핀 전류(spin current)가 생성되는 현상이다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin Hall effect is a phenomenon in which a spin current is generated in a direction perpendicular to the flow of a charge current in a nonmagnetic material without an external magnetic field.
data.target_sentence: The spin Hall effect is a phenomenon in which a spin current is generated in a direction perpendicular to the flow of a charge current in a nonmagnetic material without an external magnetic field.

data.source_sentence: 스핀 홀 효과는 스핀-궤도 결합과 베리 곡률(Berry curvature)에 의한 비정상 속도(anomalous velocity)에 의해서 나타난다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin-hole effect is caused by spin-orbit coupling and an abnormal velocity by the Berry curvature.
data.target_sentence: The spin Hall effect is caused by spin-orbit coupling and an abnormal velocity by the Berry curvature.

data.source_sentence: 스핀 홀 효과는 Fig. 3(b)와 같이 H 형태의 소자로 강자성체 없이도 스핀전하 변환 효과를 전기적인 신호로 관측할 수 있다.
data.mt_sentence: The spin hole effect is an H-type device as shown in Figure 3(b), and the spin charge conversion effect can be observed with an electrical signal without a ferromagnetic material.
data.target_sentence: The spin Hall effect is an H-type device as shown in Figure 3(b), and the spin charge conversion effect can be observed with an electrical signal without a ferromagnetic material.

data.source_sentence: 이때 발생한 스핀 전류의 스핀 분극은 그래핀 표면에 수직인 방향으로 분극(z 방향)된다.
data.mt_sentence: At this time, the spin polarization of the generated spin current is polarized in a direction perpendicular to the graphene surface (z direction).
data.target_sentence: At this time, the spin polarization of the generated spin current is polarized in a direction perpendicular to the graphene surface (z direction).

data.source_sentence: 불순물이 흡착된 그래핀에서의 스핀 홀 효과에 의한 스핀전류의 Hanle spin precession을 보여주는 연구 결과는 가장 먼저 수소가 화학적으로 흡착된 그래핀에서 2013년에 보고되었다.
data.mt_sentence: The study result showing the Hanle spin precession of spin current due to the spin Hall effect in graphene adsorbed with impurities was first reported in 2013 in graphene to which hydrogen is chemically adsorbed.
data.target_sentence: The study result showing the Hanle spin precession of spin current due to the spin Hall effect in graphene adsorbed with impurities was first reported in 2013 in graphene to which hydrogen is chemically adsorbed.

data.source_sentence: 전자 빔을 이용해서 그래핀에 수소를 흡착 시킨후 Fig. 3(b)의 H 형태의 소자에서 비국소적 측정 방식으로 스핀홀 효과를 보고하였다.
data.mt_sentence: After adsorbing hydrogen on graphene using an electron beam, the spinhole effect was reported as a non-local measurement method in the H-type device of Fig. 3(b).
data.target_sentence: After adsorbing hydrogen on graphene using an electron beam, the spin hall effect was reported as a nonlocal measurement method in the H-type device of Fig. 3(b).

data.source_sentence: 수소가 흡착된 그래핀 소자에서 측정된 스핀 홀 각은 0.18이었으며 이때 스핀-궤도 결합은 2.5 meV로 순수한 그래핀보다 1000배 이상 증가되었다.

data.source_sentence: 향후, 전기차 수요 증대로 인해 전기차 구동 모터 수요는 계속하여 증대될 것이다.
data.mt_sentence: In the future, demand for electric vehicle driving motors will continue to increase due to increased demand for electric vehicles.
data.target_sentence: In the future, demand for electric vehicle driving motors will continue to increase due to increased demand for electric vehicles.

data.source_sentence: 산-염기 항상성을 조절하는 데는 체내 면역세포들이 기여한다.
data.mt_sentence: Immune cells in the body contribute to controlling acid-base homeostasis.
data.target_sentence: Immune cells in the body contribute to controlling acid-base homeostasis.

data.source_sentence: 면역세포가 염증을 인지하였을 때 염증 매개 분자를 방출하며 세포외 pH는 감소하게 된다.

data.target_sentence: When immune cells recognize inflammation, they release inflammatory mediators and the extracellular pH decreases.

data.source_sentence: 본 연구에서는 다양한 면역세포 중 대식세포의 세포외 산성 환경 개선에 대한 펄스자기장의 효과를 밝히고자 한다.

data.target_sentence: This study aims to reveal the effect of pulse magnetic fields on improving the extracellular acidic environment of macrophages among various immune cells.

data.source_sentence: 대식세포에 인위적으로 염증을 유도하기 위해 LPS를 사용하였으며 LPS 처리 후 세포 모양을 관찰하였다.
data.mt_sentence: LPS was used to artificially induce inflammation in macrophages, and the cell shape was observed after LPS treatment.
data.target_sentence: LPS was used to artificially induce inflammation in macrophages, and the cell shape was observed after LPS treatment.

data.source_sentence: 세포 모양 관찰 결과 대식세포가 활성화됨에 따라 가지 모양으로 뻗어가는 것을 확인할 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: As a result of observing the cell shape, it was confirmed that the macrophage expanded in a branched shape as the macrophages were activated.
data.target_sentence: As a result of observing the cell shape, it was confirmed that the macrophage expanded in a branched shape as the macrophages were activated.

data.source_sentence: 펄스자기장에 세기에 따른 세포외 pH 측정 실험에서 2700 G의 세기일 때 세포외 산성 환경이 가장 크게 개선됨을 알 수 있었다.
data.mt_sentence: In the extracellular pH measurement experiment according to the intensity of the pulsed magnetic field, it was found that the extracellular acidic environment was most significantly improved at the intensity of 2700 G.
data.target_sentence: In the extracellular pH measurement experiment according to the intensity of the pulse magnetic field, it was found that the extracellular acidic environment was most significantly improved at the intensity of 2700 G.

data.source_sentence: 펄스자기장을 인가한 후 시간에 따른 pH 측정 실험에서는 18 h 시간이 지난 후 세포 외 pH가 가장 효과가 좋은 것으로 나타났다.
data.mt_sentence: In the pH measurement experiment according to time after applying the pulsed magnetic field, it was found that the extracellular pH was the most effective after 18 h.
data.target_sentence: In the pH measurement experiment according to time after applying the pulse magnetic field, it was found that the extracellular pH was the most effective after 18 h.

data.source_sentence: 펄스자기장은 체내 염증 완화 및 산-염기 항상성 조절에 영향을 주어 세포 외 산성 환경을 개선해 주는 것으로 판단된다.
data.mt_sentence: The pulsed magnetic field is believed to improve the extracellular acidic environment by affecting the alleviation of inflammation in the body and the regulation of acid-base homeostasis.

data.source_sentence: 인체에서 산-염기 항상성 유지는 호흡과 적혈구 내 헤모글로빈 등으로 체내에 산소와 이산화탄소를 운반하여 산-염기평형을 유지한다.
data.mt_sentence: Maintaining acid-base homeostasis in the human body maintains acid-base equilibrium by transporting oxygen and carbon dioxide into the body through breathing and hemoglobin in red blood cells.
data.target_sentence: Maintaining acid-base homeostasis in the human body maintains acid-base equilibrium by transporting oxygen and carbon dioxide into the body through breathing and hemoglobin in red blood cells.

data.source_sentence: 산소를 방출한 헤모글로빈에 이산화탄소 분자가 결합하여 폐로 운반될 때 이산화탄소와 결합된 헤모글로빈은 혈장과 적혈구에서 물과 결합해 수소와 중탄산이온을 만들게 되어 체내의 pH 변화를 발생시킨다.
data.mt_sentence: When carbon dioxide molecules are combined with oxygen-releasing hemoglobin and transported to the lungs, hemoglobin combined with carbon dioxide combines with water in plasma and red blood cells to form hydrogen and bicarbonate ions, causing a change in pH in the body.
data.target_sentence: When carbon dioxide molecules are combined with oxygen-releasing hemoglobin and transported to the lungs, hemoglobin combined with carbon dioxide combines with water in plasma and red blood cells to form hydrogen and bicarbonate ions, causing a change in pH in the body.

data.source_sentence: 이러한 과정에서 산-염기의 불균형이 지속되면 혈액 내 H+ 이온이 과도하게 증가 또는 감소하게 되고 급성 폐 질환, 호흡근 기능성장애, 뇌질환, 저산소증 등을 유발한다.

data.source_sentence: 염증반응은 체내에 외상이나 병원체가 감지되었을 때 신체조직 손상에 반응하는 과정으로 염증반응이 진행되는 동안 호중구(neutrophils), 대식세포(macrophage) 등의 면역세포다.

data.source_sentence: MNP 용액이 담겨 있는 수조에 삽입한 Cu 전극을 통과하여 외부자기장 최대 ± 1000 Oe 범위에서 MNPs의 이동함에 따라 변화하는 저항값을 측정하여 얻은 자기저항곡선을 분석한다.

data.target_sentence: When an external magnetic field is created with permanent magnets at both edges of the tube, MNPs are attracted to positions close to the permanent magnets by magnetic force.
